Job Description:
1. Good knowledge about Air & Ocean for export and import.
2. Be aware of e-filing requirements for export shipments to USA, CANADA, JAPAN…etc.
3. Mainly responsible for coordinating the daily operation and co-operation between the operation team and the customs clearance team, customer service (including booking, customs declaration, box making, expenses, inspection, compensation, etc.).
4. For customers maintained by customer service, if customer service is not in the company or can't be contacted, the operation manager has the responsibility to contact customers at the first time, solve problems and act as customer service.
5. Check the expenses with suppliers and cooperate with finance department to check the payment content.
6. Supervise the daily operation and standardize the operation process.
7. System input management.
8. Convey the tasks assigned by the company leaders and express the feedback information of subordinates.
9. Staffing, job adjustment, job assignment, weekly meetings for operation team, analysis of recent work.
10. Manage and coordinate the overall operation of the operation Department and be responsible for formulating the service and document process of the operation Department.
11. Daily management of subordinates, work guidance, training, work arrangement, inspection and supervision, follow-up.
12. Other assigned jobs.
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor’s degree or above.
2. At least 5 years of operation and management experience in shipping or international freight forwarding and other related fields, including at least 3 years of freight forwarding operation team management experience.
3. Familiar with ocean import and export process and operation, familiar with customs clearance and inspection process, with import and export trade knowledge of documents, freight forwarding, customs declaration, inspection, port operation, container transportation, etc.
4. Familiar with the operation process of refrigerators and other special containers is preferred.
5. Be able to operate related office software skillfully.
6. Good communication skills and team management skills.
7. Careful work, strong sense of responsibility, strong sense of service and team spirit.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   068 78 00 63 / 081 80 69 91  hr@big-link.group Room 2010, Building C7, Fortune Tower, Olympia City, Sangkat Veal Vong, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia.  068 78 00 63 / 081 80 69 91

Job Description:
Handover Work
•  Inspect the condo units are handed over to customers on time and in good quality
•  Support and coordinate with smooth handover of units and on time
•  Work closely within and across department to deal with customer complaints related to handover and defect modification
•  Check and maintain building handover documents include As-Built Drawing, MEP Drawing, T&C, Training, Operations Manual, Material & Equipment list, etc.


Emergency & Safety Monitoring
•  Manage working safety within the building include teamwork, sub-contractors, or technician
•  Train the team of emergency rescue & emergency evacuation plans and Fire Drill Training 


Technical and Daily Works
•  To prepare maintenance schedule and ensure its properly conducted
•  To manage the facilities and building system run smoothly and well maintenance including but not limited to;
a.  Water Treatment System, & Plumbing System
b.  CCTV, Access Control, Parking System, and Internet Connection
c.  Firefighting, Fire Alarm, Smoke and Head Detector, Fire Hose Reel & Hydrant, Alarm system, Firefighting & pump, Emergency Light
d.  Elevator, Generator, Swimming Pool, Control Room
•  Coordinate with other department such design team, MEP team and modification team for any request to change the internal unit from unit owner
•  Monitor team in monthly record utilities and submit report to Assistant Property Manager
•  Arrange monthly staff working schedule to submit to Property Manager
•  PR & PO of technical tools and stocks, and control it properly 
•  Support other tasks assignment by Property Manager or Assistant Property Manager
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements

•  Vocational Certificate in Electrical / Mechanical / Civil Engineering 
•  At least 3-year experiences in construction of high rise building and building maintenance
•  Knowledge of experience in handover the building from construction to management team
•  Experience in managing condominium building system is a plus
•  Good at Excel, Word, and PowerPoint 
•  Good in written communication, and report-writing skills in English and Khmer
•  Strong interpersonal skills
•  Ability to work under pressure. 


What we offer:

We offer attractive remuneration and fringe benefits including free meals, seniority pay, bonus, and insurance, etc. with excellent career development opportunities to the right candidates.

Job Requirement: •  ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែក ទុតិយភូមិឬ ក្នុងឆ្នាំសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រ គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធកាន់តែប្រសើរ•  មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ បើមានរឹតតែល្អ•  ត្រូវមានភាពរហ័សរហួនក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ដែលបានកើតឡើងចំពោះមុខ និងផ្តល់ដំណោះសមហេតុផលជូនអតិថិជន•  មានក្រមសីលធម៏វិជ្ជាជីវះជាបេឡាករ និង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់• អាចធ្វើការប្តូរវេនតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
Company Profile: Bayon Bakery is a local and one of the leading bakeries in Cambodia and was established in 1998. In order to fulfill customer's demands, we have expanded our stores to 12 branches in Phnom Penh with our signature Num Pang Bayon, Bakyong Bayon, cake, wedding cake, and a wide range of fresh baked products.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  070555337 hr@bayonbakery.com 78eo, st.128 Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070555337

Job Requirement: •  ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែក ទុតិយភូមិឬ ក្នុងឆ្នាំសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រ គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធកាន់តែប្រសើរ•  មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ បើមានរឹតតែល្អ•  ត្រូវមានភាពរហ័សរហួនក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ដែលបានកើតឡើងចំពោះមុខ និងផ្តល់ដំណោះសមហេតុផលជូនអតិថិជន•  មានក្រមសីលធម៏វិជ្ជាជីវះជាបេឡាករ និង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់• អាចធ្វើការប្តូរវេនតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន

Job Requirement: •  ត្រូវបញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាផ្នែក ទុតិយភូមិឬ ក្នុងឆ្នាំសិក្សាបរិញ្ញាបត្រ គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ និងសញ្ញាបត្រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធកាន់តែប្រសើរ•  មិនត្រូវការបទពិសោធន៍ បើមានរឹតតែល្អ•  ត្រូវមានភាពរហ័សរហួនក្នុងការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា ដែលបានកើតឡើងចំពោះមុខ និងផ្តល់ដំណោះសមហេតុផលជូនអតិថិជន•  មានក្រមសីលធម៏វិជ្ជាជីវះជាបេឡាករ និង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់• អាចធ្វើការប្តូរវេនតាមការចាត់ចែងរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន

Job Description: OSTRO NIGHTLIFE GROUP is urgently looking for various positions.- Interested applicants, please send your CV to Email :  job@ostrogroup.asia- Contact number : 085877855 (telegram)-Web: ostronightlife.com-Location: street 130, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh
Job Requirement: MAIN DUTIES: * Handle for all purchasing activities within the company.* Responsible for sourcing the suppliers and quotations for all purchases.* Follow the purchasing flow and policy.* Responsible for daily and monthly reports on purchasing progress and status.* Monthly reports of update suppliers and contact list.* Weekly update the price list of purchasing items and comparison with other suppliers.* Searching and updating the supplier list monthly as the choice and suggesting to management for decision making. * Handle on all purchasing request items with suppliers and on time delivery to each outlet.* Build good communication and keep in touch with suppliers for the proposal and event support, etc. * Other tasks that are assigned by management.

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនួយការ
position: មន្រ្តីជំនួយការ
Job Description:
 ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
• ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
• សញ្ជាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
 ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប 

 ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើវិញ្ញាសាសរសេរ និងការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។
Job Requirement:
 គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
• មានសញ្ញាបត្រកម្រិតបរិញ្ញាបត្រ ផ្នែកសេដ្ឋកិច្ច ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ គ្រប់គ្រង ឬប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទងការងារជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិក យ៉ាងតិច០៣ឆ្នាំ
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការចរចាកិច្ចសន្យា និងការសម្របសម្រួល
• មានជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ជាខេមរភាសា និងភាសាអង់គ្លេស
• មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេសស្ទាត់ជំនាញ ទាំងភាសានិយាយ និងសរសេរ 
• មានកម្រឹត IELT 5.5 ឬសញ្ញាបត្រភាសាអង់គ្លេស 
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនង និងអាចបំពេញការងារជាក្រុម
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃចន្ទ ១រោច ខែបឋមាសាឍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣ ខែ     កក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។

ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកធ្វើតេស្តវិញ្ញាសារសរសេរ និងសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។

ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ	
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “ក” ជាន់ទី៣
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : ០៧៧ ៣៥៩ ៩៤៩ /អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

job title: មន្រ្តីជំនួយការគណនេយ្យ
position: មន្រ្តីជំនួយការគណនេយ្យ
Job Description:
	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានកំរិតវប្បធម៌ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រគណនេយ្យ ឬសញ្ញាប័ត្រប្រហាក់ប្រហែល
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារគណនេយ្យ និងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ យ៉ាងតិច២ឆ្នាំ
•	មានជំនាញកុំព្យូទ័រMS Excel, MS word, MS PowerPoint
•	មានជំនាញផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធកុំព្យូទ័រគណនេយ្យ ឬ ចេះប្រើប្រាស់ប្រព័ន្ធ Peachtree Accounting System
•	ស្ទាត់ជំនាញក្នុងការសេសេរនិងនិយាយភាសាខ្មែរ និងអង់គ្លេស

	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
Job Requirement:
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ជាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប 

	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើវិញ្ញាសាសរសេរ និងការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន

	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃចន្ទ ១រោច ខែបឋមាសាឍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី៣ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។

ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកធ្វើតេស្តវិញ្ញាសារសរសេរ និងសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE

ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ	
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ

Job Description: Job SummaryThe overall role of Senior Officer, Accounting and Taxation is to assist line manager to perform bookkeeping and financial reports and compliance reports accurately and within required time frame.Key Responsibilities 1.	Responsible for inventory recording in systems and ensure correct costing and cost allocation2.	Analyze inventory movement and prepare inventory reports for managers3.	Maintain and reconcile fixed assets listing and SAP system4.	Perform general ledger account reconciliation5.	Prepare monthly and yearly tax declaration6.	Supervise and coach junior officers7.	Other tasks assign by line manager

Experiences: o	More than three years of general accounting and tax experienceo	Familiarity with inventory and tax accounting software3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Highly detail-oriented and organized o	Ability to meet a constant stream of deadlines o	Proficient in Microsoft office o	Proficient in English language for business
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

Job Description: • Provide a good steel design that can have vales to all concerned parties• Advise sales, site people, contractors, customers, suppliers with the best knowledge in Engineering to ensure the work can be done and safely• Always step up to the design solution with the right Code and regulations to ensure the work can be done based on the codes and regulations• Advise the concerned parties if found any unsafety working either at the office, the site, or the factory• Develop and design procedures to ensure systems and workflow are corrected and traceable• Provide Engineering Training to the concerned designs and draftsman staff promptly• Always monitor Work KPIs weekly and monthly. Consult with managers for improvement and actions so that KPIs can be achieved• Always advise the new or suitable engineering software that can improve Design Productivities and Design Efficiency, including Cost Effectiveness• Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in civil engineering, or equivalent• Minimum 5 years of experience in Steel Structural Design (Warehouse, factory…)• Familiarity with design in Cold-Formed Steel products will be an advantage.• Fluency in Structural design software is required.• Proficiency in English (Speaking & Writing)• Self-starter, independent, advisory, and approachable person with leadership skills.Competitive offer:•	Annual Salary Increment•	Annual Performance Bonus•	Learning and Development•	Lunch Allowance•	Coffee and fruit serve•	Group Personal Accident Insurance ( Forte )•	Working Accident and Health care Insurance ( NSSF )•	Company Events•	Uniforms•	Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description: 1.	Prepare and review monthly account reconciliations of all income statement and balance sheet account;2.	Ensure all revenues and expenditures are correctly recorded with sufficient supporting documentations;3.	Ensure appropriate financial policies and processes are in place and reviewed regularly, in accordance with donor requirements and authorization level;4.	Provide training across the organization on these policies and processes including induction training for new team members;5.	Prepare and submit all month end reporting requirements for review and approval to the management team by the reporting deadline;6.	Work with suppliers to negotiate contracts for the purchase of required goods and keep accurate records of transactions trends;7.	Prepare asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analysing account information;8.	Perform other tasks as required.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting/Finance or relevant field;•	Minimum 2 years of accounting and/or financial management;•	Excellent English communication skill (Written & Verbal);•	Proficiency in MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, POS, QuickBooks and software; •	Flexibility to work shifts including weekends and public holidays subject to rota.
Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

1- HLH Agriculture (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.

Company Profile: Our vision as a school is to prepare and equip our young people with the knowledge, skills, understanding, and attitude to thrive and then take on the world.Our mission is to provide exceptional care and education to children while fostering each child’s intellectual, social, physical, emotional, and moral development in an academic-rich environment.The curriculum at BISPP has derived from Vision and Mission statements, along with our definition of teaching and learning adapted from the International Early Year Curriculum (IEYC) and Cambridge Curriculum. These curriculums are to ensure great learning, great teaching, and great fun and to prepare our young children to take on the world. Teaching and learning: BISPP is seeking to develop self-esteem and pleasure in learning through a stimulating, supportive and happy environment that provides all students and staff with opportunities to achieve their full potential in knowledge, skills, understanding, and behavior to be globally competitive. Personal development: BISPP values punctuation, honesty, creativity, kindness, independence, and interdependence, communication, exploring, healthy living, trust, and tolerance. Respect: BISPP is requiring our staff and students to show respect for ourselves, other people, our environment, school property, and individual property.

position: Farm Manager អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងកសិកម្ម
Job Description: - Reporting to: Gerneral Manager - Location: Oral, Kompong Speu- Salary Negotiate ** Knowledge; Skill & Abilities:- Good attitude and energy level- Good communication- Good in financial analyze - Good in budget planning- Good in management skill- Fluency English - Strategic thinking capability - Personal Effectiveness - Initiative and Leadership - Adding value through people development ** Duties  & Responsibilities:- Bachelor degree in agriculture or related field - Handle and manage cassava plantation at least 600 Hectares (in the block ………)- Manage and make planting schedule with farm manager according to annual planting plan- Prepare planting claim request with sub-contractor and submit to farm manager for approval - Oversee on plant status which under supervise from planting to harvesting- Observe and take action on disease, insect, fertilizer, watering, weeding, spraying herbicide, pesticide and harvesting - Observe workers to detect inefficient and unsafe work procedures or to identify problem, initiating corrective action as necessary- Prepare reports regarding farm condition, crop yields, diesel usage, machinery breakdown, or labor problem.- Estimate labor requirements for jobs, and plan work schedules accordingly;- Direct or assist with the adjustment and repair of farm equipment and machinery- Assist in drive and operate farm machinery such as trucks, tractors, or self –propelled harvester in order to transport workers and supplies, or to cultivate and harvest fields- Report to farm Manager of the cassava plantation regarding the farm progressing report- Other duties assign by the farm Manager of the cassava plantation.
Job Requirement:
** Qualifications:
Exposure:
- Bachelor or diploma degree in agriculture or related field
- Have minimum 2 years working experiences in cassava farming or related field  
- Have a good communication with multiple cultures
- Able to communication in Khmer and English
- Able to work with local communities
- Good in written and speak in English (Speaking and reporting)
- Able to stay and work in the farm
- Initiative do a research for new agriculture technology for yield improvement
- Be honesty and working hard

Job Description:
 Assist the CEO/ President’s in carrying out the Division’s mission, essentially pertaining 
to the planning, organization, management, coordination and supervision of protocol 
services.
 Plan and execute the CEO/ President’s participation in official events both locally and 
internationally
 Arrange detailed itineraries for the CEO/ President and Guests.
 Ensure events or ceremonies run smoothly, and oversee the security operations during 
events, such as security personnel, equipment, and facilities. Arrange a time for taking 
photos and make sure all important individuals, Bank’s logo, and uniforms are good for 
Bank’s reputation. 
 Receive and escort special guests.
 Accompany the CEO/ President on official events and ceremonies.
 Arrange for official gifts.
 Coordinate with relevant focal points of special guests for smooth and seamless visits.
 Prepare briefs and recommendations to the CEO / President on the status of protocol 
services concerning the CEO/President and Special guests.
 Formulate and propose policies, procedures and guidelines for promoting the Bank’s 
product, practice and norms in the Bank, in light of developments in the field.
 Guideline / analyze current events and diplomatic developments and provide regular 
updates to the Management.
 Prepare and produce reports on internal coordination of meetings with the staff under 
his/her supervision.
 Perform related duties assigned by CEO /President
Job Requirement:
 Hold at least a minimum master’s degree in Public International Law, International 
Relations, Diplomacy, Political Science, International Affairs, or other closely related 
fields.
 Have a minimum of seven (7) years of relevant experience holding a diplomatic position 
or a position in a multilateral development bank, or a similar field.
 Certificate of training in Protocol and/or diplomacy is desirable
 Excellent communication skills, good analytical and negotiation skills. A keen sense
of initiative, rigorous and methodical approach
 Good knowledge of Bank rules, policies and procedures, as well as diplomatic
norms, Headquarters and other establishing agreements
 Experience in public administration and law is desirable
 Ability to communicate and write effectively in English and Mandarin, with good
working knowledge of the other language
 Proficiency in the use of Standard Bank software, such as Microsoft Outlook, Word,
Excel and PowerPoint

Job Description:
 Android Application Development: Designing, coding, and testing Android applications 
using programming languages like Java or Kotlin, and relevant frameworks such as 
Android SDK.
 Collaborating with Cross-functional Teams: Working closely with product managers, 
UI/UX designers, backend developers, and other stakeholders to understand business 
requirements and develop functional, user-friendly Android applications.
 Mobile Application Architecture: Designing and implementing efficient, scalable, and 
maintainable architecture for Android applications, considering factors like 
performance, security, and compatibility with different Android devices and OS 
versions.
 Bug Fixing and Troubleshooting: Identifying and resolving issues, including bugs, 
performance bottlenecks, and compatibility problems, through debugging, testing, and 
proactive maintenance of Android applications.
 Version Control and Continuous Integration: Utilizing version control systems (e.g., Git) 
and integrating the Android application development workflow with continuous 
integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to ensure reliable and efficient 
software development practices.
 Quality Assurance: Collaborating with quality assurance (QA) teams to ensure the 
delivery of high-quality Android applications, including conducting code reviews, 
implementing automated tests, and addressing QA feedback.
 Research and Learning: Staying updated with the latest trends, tools, and technologies 
in the Android development ecosystem, and continuously improving skills through selflearning and professional development.
 Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Creating and maintaining technical 
documentation, such as application architecture diagrams, code documentation, and 
guidelines, to facilitate knowledge sharing and efficient collaboration within the 
development team.
 Remember, the above points are general and may not reflect the specific requirements 
of Vattanac Bank's Android developer position. It's always advisable to refer to the 
official job description provided by the company for precise and detailed information.
Job Requirement:
 Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Technology 
or related field.
 Knowledge of developing trends and emerging standards in mobile apps like RxJava, 
MVP/MVVM/MVI, Kotlin, etc.
 Minimum of 3 years of experience in Android Development and 5 years of experience in 
Software Development
 Familiar with the whole software development life cycle (e.g. requirements, analysis, 
design, implementation, testing, and documentation)
 Great knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, an d best practices 
 Excellent technical knowledge of Java/Kotlin for Android, Android SDK and Android 
Studio
 Good understanding of RESTful APIs and how to connect Android applications to backend services
 Experience working with testing libraries like Espresso and Junit
 Familiar with Continuous Integration (CI) and its use in testing, building and deploying 
Android apps
 Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for 
common tasks
 Understanding of code versioning using git, github and gitflow
 Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
 Experience with Agile software development methodology (SCRUM) is a plus
 Experience with payments technology is a plus.

Job Description:
• Performs audit work in Client’s office for audit areas assigned to him/her; follows audit techniques suggested by assistant managers/senior associate and considers work paper documentation required by assistant managers/senior associate in documenting the audit work done.
• Reports to assistant managers/senior associate any audit/accounting issues noted for a Client and discusses/proposes alternative solutions to the issue noted.
• Ensures that all overtime work is pre-approved by assistant managers/senior associate by completing an overtime form sheet
• Resolves all review notes of audit partner/manager/assistant manager/senior associate
• Documents all audit procedures performed before signing off on the audit programme
• Ensures that the audit work is completed with the quality consistent with GT standards within time budget prepared by supervisor/senior
• Provides miscellaneous assistance to higher-level personnel in the preparation of Proposals or in various other projects
• Provides explanations and on-the-job training to assistants with less experience
• Performs clerical duties related to Engagements such as requisitioning supplies needed by Engagement team for fieldwork and organizing paper work files prior to review by higher-level personnel or before filing
• Conducts himself/herself professionally and liaises with Client’s middle management for smooth flow of audit work
• Maintains a good working relationship with the Client
Job Requirement:
1. Education: University degree preferably in Auditing/ Accounting or business related fields
2. Special license/certificate: Either holds a current and valid ACCA/CPA's certificate, or be working toward obtaining the certificates by taking and passing the applicable state ACCA/CPA exams
3. Minimum 1 year of recent external audit service, and dealing in team work
4. Good working knowledge of Word, Excel and PowerPoint and Internet searching skill
5. Good command of English
Company Profile:
About Us

Grant Thornton Cambodia is an independent member within Grant Thornton International and a wholly foreign-owned company. Grant Thornton’s presence in Cambodia first started in 2004. A reorganisation in 2011 incorporated the expertise of Grant Thornton Malaysia to expand the service lines to meet the increasing demand for quality audit and advisory services of local business and international investors in Cambodia. 

Grant Thornton has offices in more than 140 counties and  56,000 staff.

To support our continued growth, we are looking for a high calibre talented professional to manage a Client portfolio and oversee the provision of high quality audit, accounting and tax compliance services.

As a member firm of one of the largest Professional services firms in the world, Grant Thornton Cambodia continuously requires high caliber talented personnel to join our growing team.

Job Description:
•	Assists Managers and Partners during the Engagement acceptance and Engagement re-acceptance procedures
•	Assists Engagement Manager in preparing the draft Engagement Proposals
•	Provides input and works closely with Engagement manager in planning and scheduling work to be done on assigned Engagements
•	In coordination with Engagement Manager, initiates and organises the required Engagement team meetings and ensures that said meetings happen
•	Helps identify potential audit and assurance Clients or identifies any potential additional services from existing Clients
•	Initiates tailoring of audit procedures and obtains Partner and Manager participation as necessary
•	Supervises staff working under him/her, reviews work done by Associates including the related work papers and ensure that work done is consistent with work programme; writes up of Management Letters otherwise prepare management letter points for Manager’s consideration
•	Promptly notifies the Engagement Partner and/or Manager of any problems involving technical, administrative, or personnel matters which need action at a higher level and offers alternative solutions
•	Specifies segments of the audit programme to be carried out by other members of the audit team, ensuring that Associates are adequately briefed about their respective roles in the Engagement team
•	Supervises the work of the Associates and ensures that work done is consistent with the work programmes
•	Liaises with Client’s management to ensure the smooth flow of work and help ensure that good working relationship is maintained at all times
•	Promptly notifies Client’s management regarding any accounting, auditing and administrative issues identified by the engagement team, and alternative resolutions, to ensure that these issues are timely resolved
•	Performs procedures that are too complex to be delegated to staff and prepare the related work papers
•	Assists managers in the preparation of Engagement budgets for all Clients and monitor completion of work as against that budget
•	Assists managers in the timely billing and collection of fees
•	Conducts job evaluations and provide feedback to all Associates in a timely manner
•	When required, participates as training resource person
•	Sees to it that all members of the Engagement team observe proper protocol when working at Client’s offices and in all other dealings with Clients
•	Performs such other duties necessary to ensure that the audit work is completed with the quality consistent with GT standards.
Job Requirement:
1.Education: University degree preferably in Auditing/ Accounting or business related fields
2.Special license/certificate: Either holds a current and valid ACCA/CPA's certificate, or be working toward obtaining the certificates by taking and passing the applicable state ACCA/CPA exams
3.Experience: Minimum 3 years
4.Good comment in English

Application Requirements:
•	Name your file with quoting reference (Application – Senior audit associate)
•	The total document file size must not exceed 2MB.
•	Deadline is 14 June 2023, Priority for first application 
•	Application & CV to be sent to: hr.recruitment@kh.gt.com

To support our continued growth, we are looking for a high calibre talented professional to manage a Client portfolio and oversee the provision of high quality audit, accounting and tax compliance services.

As a member firm of one of the largest Professional services firms in the world, Grant Thornton Cambodia continuously requires high caliber talented personnel to join our growing team.

Job Description:
POSITION PURPOSE
The Marketing Manager will be responsible for developing and executing marketing strategies for the various business streams, relationship management and the supervision and training of a team of young professionals. This position is responsible for instilling a marketing led ethos
across IDP Cambodia, developing integrated annual marketing plans for the key business streams, and establishing and building upon strategic relationships. The position must work
consultatively and responsively with both internal and external stakeholders and manage and foster professional skills development in a team of junior staff who are responsible for events, publications, advertising, and external and internal communications.

1. Strategy
- Develop and agree comprehensive annual / quarterly / monthly marketing plans that
successfully support the achievement of country goals across business lines within
agreed timeframes and to expected quality standards

JOB ANNOUNCEMENT AT IDP

- Design and agree multi-channel marketing campaigns, including details of the intended source of leads, numbers of leads and related activities that will enable execution of the campaigns
- Work with Office Managers in developing and supporting effective execution of activity calendars including in-office activities and outreach initiatives
- Devise appropriate Public Relations strategies as required and in line with business needs
- Build and maintain strong relationships and communication with the regional marketing team to leverage learning from the wider region on best practices across marketing areas
2. Lead Generation
- Collaborate with key stakeholders to plan and execute all lead generation initiatives in a highly effective manner, which meet the required number of leads by source, enabling
the country team to maximise the sales opportunities / business results
- Identify new opportunities for generating leads and make recommendations to Country Director on the proposed investment and projected outcomes to initiate theses new
marketing initiatives
- Challenge the status quo by introducing creative and innovative ideas to the management team for consideration
3. Event Marketing & Contact Centre Management – Lead Qualification
- Plan, schedule and execute marketing activity to support the successful operation of IDP events. This includes pre-event marketing and all activities relating to the event itself
- Prepare marketing & booth designs (with support from Regional Team) and ensure IDP is presented to participants in line with strategic goals and brand positioning
- Evaluate the success of marketing events from feedback received from both clients and students and improve
- Local Contact Centre setup and management, working closely with Regional Contact Centre team
- Support Contact Centre team to qualify the web leads as per the defined targets
- Contact Centre performance reporting and monitoring
4. Analytics and Reporting
- Make effective use of analytics to evaluate effectiveness of marketing campaigns and track numbers of qualified lead generated vs. target for each destination
- Proactively escalate / highlight issues, when necessary, along with ideas of how toimprove lead numbers and lead quality
5. Digital Marketing (led by Regional Digital Marketing team)
- Work with the Regional Web Marketing team to ensure that the local website is maintained and updated to inspire students and to meet agreed objectives
- Drive effective use of websites by developing and implementing SEO/SEM strategies with the Regional Web Marketing team. This includes developing content that will drive students to seek out IDP’s website
- Work closely with Regional Web Marketing team to generate web leads through multiple online platforms (Google, Facebook etc.)

6. Vendor and Agency Management
- Identify, build and maintain relationships with relevant vendors, agencies, and partners to increase the business success and ensure high quality outcomes for IDP Cambodia
 Create corporate and government links to improve PR and partnership opportunities your team can leverage
7. Team Leadership
- Lead, develop and maintain a high performing team that will deliver IDP’s key marketing objectives from a corporate unit perspective
- Create an environment that delivers opportunities for collaboration and co-operation across the wider regional marketing teams
- Set performance targets for key performance indicators for team ensuring all delegations are clear
- Contribute to building a positive work environment within the team based on a shared
commitment to IDP’s values and quality
- Build and maintain strong relationships and communication with regional office to leverage all marketing strategies &  material that is developed
8. Financial Management
- Manage budget and resource allocations effectively to deliver business priorities
- Exercise appropriate stewardship over IDP assets and intellectual property
- Expenditure is in line with agreed budget and business priorities
9. General
- Undertake any other lawful duties as reasonably directed by management
Job Requirement:
- Educated to Graduation level or equivalent
- Minimum five years work experience in a mid-level marketing role, or at least eight years relevant work experience
- Background in the successful delivery of strategic marketing activities
-Experience in budget management
- Demonstrated analytical and problem-solving skills
- Demonstrated high level written and oral communication skills including the ability to prepare high quality materials and communication products for print and digital media
- Knowledge of contemporary marketing and communication practices and technological environments
- Outstanding interpersonal skills and the ability to communicate effectively in a cross- cultural setting
- High level of personal initiative combined with the ability to work collaboratively with other staff
- Ability to inspire, manage and supervise staff, including the ability to establish priorities
and meet competing deadlines

** Desirable Requirements
- Accomplished knowledge of the education industry
- Experience in working in dynamic global environment
Women and Disabled People are strongly encouraged to apply.
Company Profile: The Australian Centre for Education (ACE) is leader in the provision of English language teaching and international education services in Cambodia and the South East Asia region. Currently, ACE operates on four campuses in Phnom Penh and one campus in Siem Reap. ACE is an initiative of IDP Education, a world leader in international education and student placement services. IDP is part-owned by 38 Australian universities and is also a co-owner of the International English Language Testing System (IELTS). For more info about ACE or IDP: www.acecambodia.org or www.idp.com/cambodia

Job Description:
 Customer Support: Respond to customer inquiries and issues related to digital banking 
services promptly and professionally. Provide guidance and solutions to resolve 
technical problems encountered by customers.
 Troubleshooting: Diagnose and resolve technical issues related to digital banking, 
mobile banking, and other digital platforms provided by the bank. This includes 
assisting customers with login problems, transaction errors, and account management.
 Communication: Interact with customers via various communication channels such as 
phone, email, chat, or in-person to understand their concerns and provide appropriate 
solutions. Ensure clear and effective communication throughout the support process.
 Issue Escalation: Identify and escalate complex technical issues that cannot be resolved 
at the front-line support level to the appropriate teams or departments within the bank. 
Follow the established escalation procedures to ensure timely resolution.
 Documentation: Maintain accurate and detailed records of customer interactions, 
including issues reported, solutions provided, and any follow-up actions taken. Update 
customer profiles and incident tickets with relevant information.
 Security Awareness: Promote and educate customers about online security best 
practices to protect their digital banking accounts from fraud and unauthorized access. 
Stay updated on the latest security threats and prevention measures.
 Product Knowledge: Develop and maintain a comprehensive understanding of the 
bank's digital banking products, services, and features. Stay updated on new releases, 
updates, and enhancements. Provide accurate information and guidance to customers 
regarding these offerings.
 Continuous Improvement: Proactively identify opportunities to enhance the customer 
experience and improve the efficiency of digital support processes. Provide feedback 
and suggestions to the management team for system improvements and service 
enhancements.
 Collaboration: Collaborate effectively with internal teams, such as IT, software 
developers, and customer service, to resolve customer issues and address technical 
challenges. Foster a positive working relationship with cross-functional teams to ensure 
seamless support delivery.
 Compliance: Adhere to all relevant policies, procedures, and regulations related to 
digital banking operations, customer data protection, and confidentiality. Maintain a 
high level of integrity and professionalism in handling sensitive customer information
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor Degree in computer science or relevant field 
 Minimum 1 year of professional experience in App support, IT Support, contact centre 
or related field 
 Excellent knowledge of Digital Product/Services and web & mobile application support 
working procedures 
 Demonstrated logical thinking and analysis of problems and solutions 
 Excellent task managements, time management, problem solving and follow-up skills 
 Excellent customer service and communication skills 
 Ability to learn new system with minimal documentation and ability to work 
independently with minimal guidance 
 Ability to use and communicate in Khmer and English
 Proficiency in Microsoft Office (Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, and Ms. Power Point)

Job Description:
 Designing, developing, and maintaining the backend systems and applications for 
Vattanac Bank.
 Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including frontend developers, UI/UX 
designers, and product managers, to gather requirements and ensure seamless 
integration between the frontend and backend components.
 Building and optimizing scalable, high-performance APIs and microservices to support 
banking operations and customer-facing applications.
 Developing secure authentication and authorization mechanisms to protect sensitive 
data and ensure regulatory compliance.
 Implementing and maintaining database architectures, including both relational (e.g., 
Oracle, SQL Server) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB) databases, to handle transactional and 
analytical data.
 Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code in languages such as Java, Python, or 
Node.js.
 Ensuring the availability, reliability, and fault-tolerance of backend systems by 
implementing appropriate monitoring, error handling, and performance optimization 
techniques.
 Conducting thorough testing, debugging, and performance tuning to identify and resolve 
issues, bottlenecks, and security vulnerabilities.
 Collaborating with DevOps teams to plan and execute deployment strategies, including 
continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
 Keeping up-to-date with the latest advancements and best practices in backend 
development, security, and banking industry standards.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. 
(Equivalent work experience may be considered.)
 Proven experience as a backend developer, preferably in the banking or financial 
services industry.
 Proficiency in backend programming languages, such as Java, Python, or Node.js, and 
frameworks like Spring Boot or Express.js.
 Strong knowledge of API design principles, RESTful architecture, and microservices 
development.
 Experience with database management systems, both relational and NoSQL, such as 
Oracle, SQL Server, or MongoDB.

Job Description:
 Designing, developing, and maintaining iOS applications for Vattanac Bank, ensuring 
high-quality user experiences and adherence to coding best practices.
 Collaborating with product managers, UI/UX designers, and backend developers to 
gather requirements and ensure seamless integration of frontend and backend 
components.
 Implementing new features, enhancements, and bug fixes to existing iOS applications, 
following the software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.
 Conducting code reviews, identifying areas for improvement, and providing 
constructive feedback to junior developers.
 Ensuring compliance with coding standards, security protocols, and data privacy 
regulations.
 Optimizing the performance of iOS applications, including load times, responsiveness, 
and memory management.
 Conducting thorough testing, debugging, and troubleshooting to identify and resolve 
issues and bugs.
 Collaborating with QA teams to develop and execute test plans, ensuring high-quality 
deliverables.
 Keeping up-to-date with the latest trends, technologies, and best practices in iOS 
development and mobile applications.
 Assisting in the documentation of application designs, technical specifications, and user 
guides.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. 
(Equivalent work experience may be considered.)
 Proven experience as an iOS developer, with a focus on developing and maintaining iOS 
applications using Swift and Objective-C.
 Strong knowledge of iOS frameworks and APIs, including UIKit, Core Data, Core 
Animation, and Core Location.
 Experience with third-party libraries and frameworks, such as Alamofire, Realm, or 
CocoaPods.
 Familiarity with RESTful APIs, JSON, and web services integration in iOS applications.
 Knowledge of version control systems, such as Git, and experience with collaborative 
development using GitHub or Bitbucket.
 Solid understanding of mobile application architecture and design patterns, such as 
MVC, MVVM, or VIPER.
 Experience with UI/UX design principles and creating visually appealing and userfriendly interfaces.
 Ability to work independently and in a team environment, collaborating with crossfunctional teams.
 Strong problem-solving skills and ability to analyze complex issues and propose 
effective solutions.
 Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to communicate 
technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders
 Knowledge of the banking or financial services industry is a plus.

Job Description:
 Identifies growth markets, drives revenue and market share growth.
 Scales the bank's business.
 Develops an integrated approach to business development, sales, marketing, product 
development, and the customer experience/interaction.
 Develop sales strategies and set targets on the different distribution channels
 Ensure the efficiency of the sales processes through channels of distribution
 Continuously assesses market and customer analytics.
 Establishes and implements strategies that have long-term impact on business results in 
alignment with organization objectives.
 Leads multiple teams of managers.
 Ensures appropriate talent selection, organization and leadership for major areas of the 
organization.
 Developing strategies for achieving the annual target of the department and the overall 
bank performance;
 Provide technical and strategy support to RM by implementing agreed actions to retain 
and grow the business base, sustain and increase profitability, realize new business, and 
efficient and effectively assess and managing credit risk and costs.
 Optimize the existing resources to capture new business opportunities from customers 
and customize existing products or process flows to satisfy the customers;
 Review and prepare Credit Proposal for new and existing corporate/commercial 
customers in accordance with bank’s policy and proceed to Credit Analyst team;
 Ensure credit facility and business process comply with AML, internal policies including 
regulatory guidelines, manuals and all other rules and regulations;
 Defense the credit proposal against credit risk management and approving authority 
especially with headquarters’ authorizers;
 Conduct periodic review on the facilities granted to customers through site visit and 
analytical review on the financial figure and performance;
 Monitor team’s activities and result report such as loan portfolio, executed plan, 
performance achievement, and any proposal on a regular basis to CEO;
 Liaised with branches and other departments in delivering high quality of service to the 
customers;
 Resolve customers issue such as credit facility, trade finance, deposit, and other related;
 Other tasks assign by CEO.
Job Requirement:
♦ Have strong business and financial acumen with 10+ years of relevant experience in 
banking.
♦ Think at a systems level and can distill and convey complex information in a compelling 
manner.
♦ Able to build trust with leadership, as well as with internal and external stakeholders at 
all levels.
♦ Impeccable communicator in any medium: in presentations and internal memos; in 
emails and Slack; in person during one-on-ones; and presenting in front of large 
audiences.
♦ Thrive in an incredibly fast-paced, ambiguous work environment with actionorientation and drive.
♦ Possess extreme attention to detail, a sense of urgency, reliability, and commitment to 
mastering your work.
♦ Gracefully challenge current wisdom and accept nothing without data and independent 
analysis.
♦ Demonstrate strong judgment in your decision making and have exceptional time 
management and prioritization skills; you're able to see the "big picture" and the details.
♦ Maintain professional discretion with sensitive and highly confidential information at all 
times.
♦ Fluent in Khmer & English. Plus Mandarin is preferred.

Job Description:
Main Responsibilities: 
 Handle all aspects of project planning, design, scheduling works, feasibility study and 
implementation of the contract work from inception to completion.
 Supervise and coordinate of the main contractors and its nominated sub-contractors 
works.
 Responsible for contract administration including cost control, evaluation and 
negotiation, tendering and awarding of the contract works.
 Coordinate with consultants and contractors on all site technical issues and all aspects 
of contract administration works.
 Review and monitor construction schedule in order to ensure timely completion and 
within budget.
 Liaise with architects, consultant and builders on construction techniques, auditing 
consultant’s design costing and contractual issues related to pre-contract and postconstruct works.
OTHER TASKS
 Check the structural design of new building and submit to management for approval.
 Check and coordinating with the designer if there is a revision and submit to 
management for approval.
 Prepare a document for bidding and review the bid Proposal from Contractor
 Coordinate with the contractor regarding works procedures and others.
 Monitor the construction progress versus schedules.
 Conduct field/physical inspection from time to time in order to ensure the quality and 
safety is implemented on construction site.
 Review Clearing & Maintenance Agreement for Bank Premise.
 Review Security Guard Service Agreement.
 Property Purchasing Guidelines.
 Furniture & fittings of Bank Premise.
 Monitor for repair and maintenance as required including its expenditures.
 Check and monitor weekly, monthly and annual maintenance for Generator, Airconditioning, power supply, Fire extinguishers, Security System & Lift Services.
 Routine building Inspection and spot checking for lightings, AC and others to ensure all 
power, water and air-conditioning are working properly.
 Prepare/monitor log book/checklist for generator, air-conditioning and electrical items.
 Main Panel distribution board monitoring checklist.
 Water pump control panel board monitoring book/checklist.
 Prepare a checklist for building repair and request work.
 Monitor all maintenance work to ensure that it was properly done.
 Provide daily routine schedules to the maintenance staff.
 Coordinate with human resource and training department for staff to stay back to 
oversee the renovation or/and maintenance work.
 Check security Guard schedule and conduct meeting with them to ensure they adhere to 
the bank’s guidelines at all times. They must be on the lookout for suspicious characters 
loitering around the bank
 Prepare Furniture & Fittings, security System Plan etc.
 Obtain quotes and submit proposal on Furniture & Fittings, Security System etc.,
STANDARDS OF PERFORMANCE
 Assess the business environment, review objections and analyse present and planned 
operational performance, including budgets.
 Work as a proactive part of the leadership team to influence and align the Vattanac Bank 
people agenda with defined business strategy.
 Smooth running of the office by anticipating needs and acting immediately on office
logistical requirements.
 Build and maintain collaborative and co-operative working relationships with internal 
and external customers.
STAFF MANAGEMENT FUNCTIONS
 Communicate clearly the guidelines, procedures and standards of performance for the 
staff to ensure group satisfaction and stimulate staff achievements.
 Review, plan and provide organization structure to the respective departments, 
ensuring proper delegation of authority, coordination of work and optimum utilization 
of staff.
 Fairly and regularly evaluate reports on performance of staff and communicate to the 
staffs the result of their performance.
 Recommend promotion, increment, awards or disciplinary action, where appropriate, 
based on performance and behaviour of staff.
 Initiate regular meeting s with staff to ensure improvement of efficiency and 
effectiveness and maintenance of good management-staff relations.
 Ensure proper training of staffs for the achievement of high standards of performance 
and competency of staff in property department.
 Keep the General Manager updated and informed of any suggestions for improvement, 
resource requirements, the need for training and problems encountered.
OTHERS
 Perform other jobs assigned by the top management.
Job Requirement:
 Degree in Civil Engineering/Architectural/Building or equivalent.
 Minimum 3 years related working experience.
 Excellent command of written and verbal English and ability to converse in Chinese will 
be an advantage.
 Demonstrate excellent project management and organization skills.
 Mature, pro-active, result-orientated and excellent interpersonal skills.
 IT Literate

Job Description:
I. Strategic Planning and Ideation
 Develop, lead and execute marketing strategies that align with the bank’s business 
objectives and customer value proposition
 Create and manage marketing budget, ensuring efficient and effective utilization of 
resources and alignment with top management and Board of Directors
 Identify key market trends and insights to continually improve the bank's brand 
positioning and reputation through product, customer experience, and communications 
strategies
 Build strong long-term relationships with key partners and institutions to drive brand 
visibility and reach new customers and businesses
II. Team Management and Collaboration
 Lead, develop and manage a high-performing marketing team, providing guidance, 
coaching and inspiration to ensure successful execution of marketing projects
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including business development, data 
analytics, digital, customer experience, and sales to build comprehensive, integrated 
marketing plans that address all customer touchpoints
 Build and maintain good team culture, dynamics and relationship to drive a positive 
atmosphere and environment that is suitable for everyone to generate and openly share 
their ideas
 Support internal teams with advice and design execution to ensure smooth operational 
flow and successful project launches
III. Creative Execution and Quality Control
 Stay up-to-date with news, trends, technologies, techniques and AI tools to guide the 
team to explore design innovation and creative ideas that stand out
 Develop creative and effective design and content that can effectively reach and engage 
target audiences through multiple channels
 Review and check all printed and digital artworks and designs to be align with the 
bank’s image before publishing or printing the materials out
Job Requirement:
I. Experience
 Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field a plus
 10+ years of experience in marketing, with at least 5 years in a leadership role, 
preferably in a marketing agency, communications company or a financial institution
 Demonstrated success developing and executing innovative, data-driven and effective 
marketing strategies that drive customer acquisition, retention, and engagement
 Demonstrated track record of building and executing comprehensive, end-to-end 
marketing strategies and campaigns that deliver results
II. Skill
 Exceptional strategic thinking, communication, and analytical skills, with the ability to 
translate data into insights and actionable marketing strategies
 Strong people management skills and experience leading and developing highperforming teams for digital marketing, brand building, events and activation, and 
public relations
 Strategic and creative mind to explore and guide team members in tapping into new 
ideas for branding, design and content
III. Aptitude
 Able to understand the bank’s overall branding, image and business while being able to 
jump into the details of how the projects fit into driving the key objectives
 Proven leadership and collaboration skills in dealing with internal and external 
stakeholders, collaborating and negotiating the outcome for the bank
 Attention to detail to ensure design quality and project timelines are up to standards
 Ability to thrive in a fast-paced, high-energy, and constantly changing environment

Job Description:
 Lead card and merchant sales team to ensure the achievement of onboarding plan
 Ongoing development and management of customer benefits and product feature in 
support of increasing customer.

the growth of new cardholder and product relevance to existing customers

testing.

for principal license, coordinate on project

product launching plan, initiate marketing promotion/campaign

 Ensure the issues are report and fixed will be testing before put in live.

Channel division of a Bank or financial institution.

Job Description: ISI STEEL invites you to join us as a Project Sales Manager to lead our sales team and drive the sales process of our projects. You will be responsible for developing and implementing sales strategies, managing sales budgets and forecasts, and overseeing the sales activities of our team. You will also be required to build and maintain strong relationships with clients, partners, and vendors, and ensure customer satisfaction and loyalty.MAIN ACCOUNTABILITIES:•Promote and selling ISI concerned Products on the following items: - Metal Sheet Profiles and Accessories - Structural Products: Hi-strength Purlins and Girths, Structural Decking, etc. - GI Pipes - Coated Coils - Rebar and Deformed Bar etc. - Hot Roll Sections - Accessories - Other products to be promoted shortly.•Develop and implement sales strategies and plans for each project, including identifying potential customers, creating proposals, negotiating contracts, and closing deals.•Coordinate with the project management team to ensure that all project deliverables are met, and customer expectations are satisfied.•Communicate with customers regularly to provide updates on project status, resolve issues, and solicit feedback.•Conduct market research and analysis to identify new opportunities and trends in the industry.•Provide sales training and support to the sales team and other staff members involved in the project.•Monitor and report on project sales performance, progress, and outcomes.•Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: •Bachelor’s degree in engineering, business admin, marketing, or equivalent•Minimum 5 years of experience in a sales management role in a building & materials, or construction project management industry.•In-depth knowledge of our products and services and their applications in different market segments.•Adequate knowledge of Microsoft Office 365, familiarity with CRM system and marketing research software & tools•Good command of English. Chinese is a plus.•Good interpersonal, communication, negotiation, and problem-solving skills•Strong sales, project management, relationship building, and leadership skills.•Ability to think critically, logically, and creatively, as well as work under pressure.•Strategic, result-driven, agile, outgoing, proactive, and persuasive individual.•Willingness to travel frequently within the assigned region or territory.Why ISI STEEL?By joining ISI STEEL, you will be part of the company where we value human capital development in terms of attitude, flexibility, insight, and interpersonal skills; we are also dedicated to developing our human resources, investing in technology, and bringing together the most innovative materials and solutions for our clients and consumers.If you’re a committed individual who wants to be part of this innovative company, you’re invited to apply!Send us your resume to recruitment@isisteel.com.kh or linda.soy@isisteel.com.khKindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview!
Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

position: ប្រធានផ្នែកបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និង អភិវឌ្ឍន៍បុគ្គលិក $700-$1200
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវ សំខាន់រៀបចំទៅលើការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងអភិវឌ្ឋន៍សមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិកនៅក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុនទាំងមូល។ ត្រូវរៀបចំការស្ទង់មតិ និងវ៉ាស់វែងសមត្ថភាពការងាររបស់បុគ្គលិកតាមនាយកដ្ឋាននីមួយឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវទៅតាមគោលនយោបាយរបស់គ្រុមហ៊ុន។ រៀបចំកម្មវិធីវាយតម្លៃ និង ធ្វើផែនការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងធ្វើយ៉ាងណាឲ្យផ្នែកបណ្តុះបណ្តាល អភិវឌ្ឍន៍សមត្ថភាពបុគ្គលិកមានភាពរលូន និងមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពខ្ពស់។

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):,/b>
• សម្របសម្រួលការកសាងសមត្ថភាព និង បណ្តុះបណ្តាលបុគ្គលិក
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលប្រចាំឆ្នាំ និងការវាយតម្លៃតម្រូវការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍។
• រៀបចំបង្កើតកម្មវិធីបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ និងគោលបំណង។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ថវិការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងគ្រប់គ្រងការចំណាយធៀបនឹងថវិការ។
• រៀបចំសម្ភារៈសម្រាប់ធ្វើការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល ដោយប្រើប្រាស់ប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
• ធ្វើការបង្វឹក អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និងអ្នកផ្សេងទៀតដែលចូលរួមក្នុងកិច្ចខិតខំប្រឹងប្រែងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍បុគ្គលិក។
• រៀបចំផែនការ រៀបចំសម្របសម្រួល និងបញ្ជាការផ្គត់ផ្គង់សម្រាប់បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងអភិវឌ្ឍន៍បុគ្គលិក។
• រក្សាការទំនាក់ទំនងផ្ទៃក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន ដូចជាផ្ទាំងព្រឹត្តិបត្រអ៊ីនត្រាណែត និងព្រឹត្តិបត្រព័ត៌មាន ដើម្បីធានាថាបុគ្គលិកមានចំណេះដឹង អំពីព្រឹត្តិការណ៍បណ្តុះបណ្តាលការអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ និងធនធាន។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍តាមដានរាល់ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដែលបានបញ្ចប់ ដើម្បីវាយតម្លៃវាស់វែងលទ្ធផល។
• រៀបចំផែនការណ៍ បណ្តុះបណ្តាល និង ណែនាំចង្អុលបង្ហាញបុគ្គលិកចូលថ្មីទៅតាមផ្នែកនីមួយៗ
• ទំនាក់ទំនងសហការណ៍ល្អជាមួយវិទ្យាស្ថានបណ្តុះបណ្តាល គ្រឹស្ថានអបរំ ដើម្បីរៀបចំការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលផ្សេងៗ
• ធ្វើការដោយមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពជាមួយសមាជិកដទៃទៀត អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង និងបុគ្គលិកធនធានមនុស្ស។
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗតាមតម្រូវការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ ។

Company Profile: Pour un Sourire d’ Enfant (PSE) or For a Child’s Smile is a non-profit organization and founded by Christian and Marie-France des Pallières, was established since 1995 in Cambodia. PSE’s mission is to help the most marginalised and debrided children escape from destitution and lead them to decent, skilled and well remunerated jobs. PSE has six main programmes adapted to the needs of the children, those programmes include: food, health, protection, education and schooling, vocational training, and helping families. PSE help children more than 6,500 and 3000 families. We are operating in Phnom Penh, Sihanouk Ville and Siem Reap.

position: ជំនួយការអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Description: 1. ទទួល និងពិនិត្យឯកសារ ដើម្បីសុំចំណារពីលោកនាយកទីចាត់ការទូទៅ2. បែងចែឯកសារទៅតាមទីចាត់ការសាមី ឬតាមលំហូរការងារជាក់ស្ដែង3. ត្រួតពិនិត្យខ្លឹមសារ និងអក្ខរាវិរុទ្ធ នៃលិខិតរដ្ឋទូទៅ និងលិខិតបទដ្ឋានគតិយុទ្ធផ្សេងៗ មុនពេល ដាក់ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង ចុះហត្ថលេខា4. Follow Up ផែនការប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍ ពីផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីដាក់ចូលក្នុង Agenda សម្រាប់Top Management5. រៀបចំ Schedule ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃរបស់លោកនាយកទីចាត់ការទូទៅ 6. រៀបចំ Schedule និងរបៀបវារៈ សម្រាប់Top Management ប្រជុំប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍7. រៀបចំ Schedule និងរបៀបវារៈ សម្រាប់លោកនាយកទីចាត់ការទូទៅ ប្រជុំប្រចាំខែ ជាមួយ នាយកទីចាត់ការ ដល់ប្រធានផ្នែក8. រៀបចំ Schedule និងរបៀបវារៈ ប្រជុំសំណង់ និងធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រជុំប្រចាំសប្ដាហ៍9. ចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យការងារសំណង់ជាក់ស្ដែងតាមការចាំបាច់ និងបញ្ជាររបស់ថ្នាក់លើ10. តាមដាន និងកត់ត្រារាល់បញ្ហា និងសំណូមពរ ពីក្រុមសំណង់ ទាំង3គម្រោង (បាក់ទូក បុរីអង្គរ និងសាខាសៀមរាប)11. ត្រួតពិនិត្យសំណើរសុំចំណាយ របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនម៉ៅការទាំង3គម្រោង12. បូកសរុបលទ្ធផលការងារ សូមណូមពរ បញ្ហាផ្សេងៗជូនថ្នាក់ដឹកនាំប្រចាំខែ13. គ្រប់គ្រង និងបែងចែកការងារដល់ក្រុមជំនួយការ និងបុគ្គលិកក្រោមបង្គាប់14. ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ការងារប្រចាំខែដើម្បីរាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង15. ការងារផ្សេងៗ តាមការប្រគល់ពីលោកនាយកទីចាត់ការទូទៅ តាមការចាំបាច់ និងតម្រូវការ ជាក់ស្តែង

Company Profile:
OPMS (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD. is the member of MACA Limited, a publicly listed, international contracting group offering services to the Mining, Infrastructure and Construction sector industry.

OPMS (CAMBODIA) CO., LTD. was registered as a Private Limited Company in Cambodia and is currently providing gold mining services at Okvau site, Mondulkiri Province. The scope of work for this project includes site preparation, drill and blast, load and haul, and maintenance work.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   096 25 777 87 opms.cambodia@maca.net.au #42, Street 222, Sangkat Boeng Reang, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh. 096 25 777 87

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

company_name: Zhong Ying International School (中英国际学校）
Job Description:
-	Greet both internal and external customers
-	Confer with customers by telephone or in person to provide information about products or services, take or enter orders, cancel accounts, or obtain details of complaints
-	Check to ensure that appropriate changes were made to resolve customers' problems
-	Keep records of customer interactions or transactions, recording details of inquiries, complaints, or comments, as well as actions taken
-	Complete contract forms, prepare change of address records, or issue service discontinuance orders, using computers
-	Refer unresolved customer grievances to immediate Supervisor or Principal, or Sales and Marketing department for further investigation
-	Contact customers to respond to inquiries or to notify them of any planned adjustments
-	Recommend improvements in products, or service and procedures to prevent future problems
-	Provide new staff with a time sheet template and a letter for opening a bank account
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor’s Degree of Hotel and Hospitality, Business Administration, Accounting, Finance or related fields
-	Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…)
-	Able to write, read and speak English; Chinese is a plus
-	Work independence and self-management
-	Excellent teamwork and team building skills
-	Strong desire to learn and commit to his/her further development
-	Ability to work under pressure and be flexible
Company Profile: Zhong Ying International School offers 3 full programs to students of all ages for full time or part time. Learn English Chinese and Khmer from Natives!

company_name: Zhong Ying International School (中英国际学校）
Job Description:
-	Assist the Academic Manager to plan and organize Teacher Training program for kindergarten and elementary teachers
-	Assist the Academic Manager to manage and direct teachers in line with education and academic requirements
-	Report issues and concerns to the Academic Manager
-	Assist the Academic Manager to develop and design curriculum for student’s education
-	Develop and design Mid-Term and Final Term Exams, class operating dates, observation and evaluation of teachers
-	Checks and evaluate teaching performance of teachers and report to the Academic Manager
-	Checks and evaluate supervisor’s performance and report to the Academic Manager
-	Update the teacher’s profile
-	Assist the Academic Manager to interview the applicants and do the pre-service training before sending them to perform the real teaching
-	Evaluate teachers who renew the contract to the Administration Department
-	Assist the Academic Manager to design the term planner and unit guide 
-	Design or update new curriculum according to the need of modernize.

Administrative Affaire: 
-	Set up teaching schedule
-	Prepare teaching materials
-	Conduct student and school survey 
-	Peer and teacher observation
-	Chinese Teacher recruitment and interview
-	Deal with local and expatriate teacher
-	Prepared weekly checklist to implement all academic work every term
-	Search new course book for change improvement 
-	Coordinate academic matters related to other strategies in the curriculum 
-	Teaching and learning strategies, process and procedure
-	Requirement of assigned programs and initiative 
-	Professional development 
-	Report for program initiative 
-	Facilitate the progress, design and delivery of district wide academic matters, i.e.
-	Assesses the campuses’ stage of academic development 
-	Promotes teacher growth by determining suitable development task
-	Assists teachers in establishing realistic and attainable academic goals
-	Advises teachers and administrators on academic issues
-	Identifies options appropriate to address academic improvement with the analysis of each option, including possible outcome of their implication 
-	Recommend profession development for teachers and administrator 
-	Recommend academic action plan for teacher, administrator and campus 
-	Identifies options for teachers to satisfy endorsement and certifications requirement
Job Requirement:
• Cambodian 
• At least a Bachelor’s degree in Education or related fields  
• At least 2 years of excellent experience in school Management
• Good command of English
• Be able to speak Chinese is plus
• Knowledge of computer word, excel, and PowerPoint
• Good communication skills, negotiation skills and problem-solving
• Good at Presentation Skill
