company_name: Zhong Ying International School (中英国际学校）
Job Description:
-	Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
-	Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
-	Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
-	Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
-	Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
-	Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
-	Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
-	Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement. 
-	Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision making committee.
-	Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
Job Requirement:
- Master’s/Bachelor’s in Education or related fields.
- Special Knowledge/Skills: 
o	Strong understanding in Academic Skill
o	Working knowledge of curriculum and instruction. 
o	Ability to evaluate instructional program and teaching effectiveness.
o	Ability to manage budget and personnel Ability to coordinate campus functions. 
o	Ability to implement policy and procedures Ability to interpret data. 
o	Strong organizational, communication, public relations, and interpersonal skills. 
- Experience: 
o	At least three years’ experiences in campus management.

Job Description:
-	Ensure that all construction activities within the designated areas are well planned, coordinated and be able to utilize all available resources in coordination with other functional Managers in directing and supervising all involved site personnel.
-	
-	Lead and ensure all work groups are properly guided, in close cooperation with the Project Manager, in assembling and controlling the required resources (manpower, equipment, materials and tools required) to start and sustain the work efficiency and productivity until the completion of the project.
-	Inspects work in progress to ensure conformity with QA/QC specifications and requirements, Industry Codes, Standards and Procedures, client requirements and provides technical advices to resolve problems.
-	Advises the Project Manager in determining the need and procurement of tools and materials to be delivered at specific times in order to conform to the workloads, plans and schedules. 
-	Interact with other construction areas and Supervisors, discusses and review with Project Manager the project Key Performance Indicators to determine accurate status of the project, making tactical decisions for allocating resources, and assigning staff requirements, to maintain project on target.
-	Review reports from Supervisors, and forward to Project Manager for corrective actions if project becomes behind schedule or over the budget.
-	Ensure the accurate and timely collection and recording of quality and work progress. Ensure the weekly reporting of plans, photos, daily diaries and other progress to the project manager via email.
-	Complies with the highest level of quality, health, safety and environmental standards during all stages of project execution and pro‐active with safety groups and subcontractors to promote safe and hazardous free work within the designated area.
Job Requirement:
-	Graduated Bachelor degree in Civil Engineer, Architecture and or Construction Management equivalent experience)
-	5 to 10 years of related work experience involving typical estimating activities
-	Honesty, Positive, Energetic, and hard-working
-	Good at using AutoCAD, Ms. Office

Job Description: • Develop and maintain clients base.• Consult with clients and prospective clients to assess insurance needs, budget and financial planning.• Provide good customer service to maintain and retain clients.• Expand customer base through sale event activities.• Assist clients during the claim process.• Other tasks will be assigned.

Company Profile:
AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Join our bold team of young, passionate and talented individuals who thrive to invent positive impacts that uphold our brand promise – help Cambodians live healthier, longer and better lives.

company_name: Mong Reththy Investment Cambodia Oil Palm Co., Ltd.
Job Description:
- Learning production process in order of technology, management, monitoring, process planning of CPO, PKN, power plant, water plant, laboratory, material supply, inventory control and related process of processing in both quantitative and Qualitative of work.
- Support ground work of preventive maintenance, machine maintenance and production.
- Rotation working and responsibility base on assignment and working condition.
- Understanding company business and key success factory.
- Evaluate/appraisal the subordinates in the month of October the end of the year.
- The ability to set and meet deadlines to finish the assigned jobs.
- Communicating by verbal / written communication skills while collaborating with human beings, other management, employee-workers, vendors, contractors and other professionals on a daily basis.
- Take care, monitor and update the implementation of approval within SAP system properly.
- Budgeting, cost estimating, develop, analyze and derive the action plan including the timeline if the company have contractors for improvement of the project.
- Conduct the internal training course to improve the employee-workers.
- Communicate with HR and Admin. to set up annual internal and external training courses to improve the subordinates’ knowledges.
- Learn and develop people management skill.
- Ability to solve the happening problems within the workplaces.
- Check the daily report from subordinates.
- Arrang the meeting as needed.
- Prepare monthly report for director to have MOM as needed.
- Work as assigned by Department Director.
Job Requirement:
- Master’s Degree or Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering or another related field
- Mechanic engineer
- Auto Cad experience and skill
- TOEIC-score 500 mini
- Experience work with international firm
- Good written and spoken English
- Ability to work independently and with a team
- Computer Skilled (Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Auto Cad, Internet & Email)
- Good communication and problem-solving skills
- Report making
- Strong commitment and positive attitude
- Be able to stay and work in a rural area.

* Why Join us? 
- Competitive compensation and benefits
- High performing organization and culture
- Long-term strategy of an international company
- Social responsibility.

Corporate Information

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. With yes superior internet network, our customers can enjoy the best 4G internet xperience you deserve wherever you are in Cambodia.

Our 27 yes hub nationwide is an all-in-one xperience center to all new digital users. Our yes hub warmly welcome everyone for any support, whether it’s questions about how to use the phone, sign up for Facebook page or tips on how to run a successful YouTube channel.

job title: មន្ត្រីដោះស្រាយបំណុល
position: មន្ត្រីដោះស្រាយបំណុល
Job Description:
- គ្រប់គ្រង តាមដាន បំណុលយឺតយ៉ាវដែលបានផ្ទេរជូន និងចុះធ្វើការដោះស្រាយបំណុលដែលយឺតយ៉ាវ និងបំណុលដែលលុបចេញពីបញ្ជី ប្រកបដោយប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
- ត្រូវធ្វើការបែងចែកជាអាទិភាពឥណទានដែលខកខានមិនបានសងត្រ
ឡប់ និងបំណុលលុបចេញពីបញ្ជីដែលស្ថិតក្រោមដែនសមត្ថកិច្ចអោយបាន
ច្បាស់លាស់ ដើម្បីងាយស្រួលក្នុងការដោះស្រាយ និងរៀបចំយុទ្ធសាស្រ្ត។ ជ្រើសរើសអតិថិជនដែលមានលទ្ធភាព និង/ឬ មានសក្តានុពលមុនគេ ដើម្បីប្តឹងដោយសហការជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន បើចាំបាច់ត្រូវដាក់ពាក្យបណ្តឹងទៅតុលាការ ។
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការប្រមូលនូវឥណទានដែលខកខានមិនបានសងត្រ
ឡប់ដែលស្ថិតក្នុងដែនសមត្ថកិច្ច និងឥណទានដែលបានលុបចេញពីបញ្ជីអោយបានទាន់ពេលវេលា និងមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព។
- សហការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកគ្រប់ផ្នែក ដើម្បីធើ្វការរួមគ្នាកំណត់យុទ្ធសាស្រ្តដោះស្រាយ និងប្រមូលឥណទាននៅតាមបណ្តាសាខា/អនុសាខា។
- អនុវត្ត និងសហការលើកិច្ចការដោះស្រាយឥណទានយឺតយ៉ាវតាមផ្លូវច្បាប់
តាមរយៈអាជ្ញាធរមូលដ្ឋាន តុលាការព្រមទាំងធ្វើការតាមដានលទ្ធផលនៃដំណើរការដោះស្រាយ និងត្រូវធានាថាគ្រប់ឯកសារដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធស្របច្បាប់ផ្សេងទៀតគឺមាននៅ ក្នុងដៃយើងទាំងអស់មុនពេលប្តឹង ឬចាត់វិធានការផ្សេងៗ
លើអតិថិជនទាំងនោះទៅអាជ្ញាធរមានសមត្ថកិច្ច ឬតុលាការ ។
- ត្រូវរាយការណ៍ជាបន្ទាន់នូវរាល់បញ្ហាដែលកើតមានឡើងក្នុងរង្វង់តួនាទីជូនដល់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង ដើម្បីស្នើសុំយោបល់ ឬការសម្រេចចិត្ត។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងដាក់ផែនការដោះស្រាយបំណុលជាប្រចាំលើឥណទានយឺតយ៉ាវជូនថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់។
- ធ្វើការសហការយ៉ាងជិតស្និទ្ធជាមួយនឹងប្រធានសាខា/អនុសាខា និងបុគ្គលិកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការធ្វើយ៉ាងណា គឺត្រូវតែប្រមូលប្រាក់កម្ចីដែលយឺតយ៉ាវត្រឡប់មកវិញ។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃលើឥណទានយឺតយ៉ាវ ឬ អសកម្មជាមួយប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងឥណទាន។
- ព្យាយាមរកដំណោះស្រាយ និងធ្វើគ្រប់ទំរង់កិច្ចសន្យា ឬពាក្យបណ្តឹងតាមដែលអាចធ្វើទៅបាន លើអតិថិជនមានបញ្ហា ដែលស្ថិតនៅក្នុងគោលដៅរបស់ខ្លួន
ក្នុងគោលបំណងប្រមូលបំណុលមានបញ្ហាពីអតិថិជនទាំងនោះមកវិញ។
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍នៃការរីកចម្រើន និងការស្ទុះងើបឡើងវិញជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ
និងបញ្ហាប្រឈមផ្សេងទៀតពាក់ព័ន្ធទៅនឹងប្រាក់កម្ចីដែលយឺតយ៉ាវ ជូនទៅអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ និង
- មន្រ្តីដោះស្រាយបំណុល ទទួលខុសត្រូវ អនុវត្តភារកិច្ចផ្សេងទៀតដែលតម្រូវដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- មានបទពិសោធយ៉ាងតិច ០១ឆ្នាំ ពាក់ព័ន្ធការងារដោះស្រាយបំណុល។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word & Ms Excel។
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ។
- ផ្តល់អទិភាពដល់អ្នកដែលធ្លាប់បម្រើការងារ នៅភ្នំពេញ។

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (៤x៦) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ
Email: hr@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។

- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣០ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)

job title: មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញ (Graphic Designer) / មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញជាន់ខ្ពស់ (Senior Graphic Designer)
position: មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញ (Graphic Designer) / មន្ត្រីឌីហ្សាញជាន់ខ្ពស់ (Senior Graphic Designer)
Job Description:
- បង្កើត និងច្នៃប្រឌិតខ្លឹមសារ ដើម្បីធ្វើការផ្សព្វផ្សាយទៅតាម​​តម្រូវការនៃ​ប្រភេទ​​អតិថិជនគោលដៅ និងអភិវឌ្ឍនូវយុទ្ធសាស្រ្តទីផ្សារ​បចេ្ចកវិទ្យា​​​របស់​គ្រឹះស្ថានឱ្យបានទាន់សម័យ។
- គ្រប់គ្រង រៀបចំ រចនា រាល់ឧបករណ៍ផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដូចជា របាយការណ៍សរុប ខិតប័ណ្ណផ្សព្វផ្សាយ នាមប័ណ្ណ ប្រតិទិន សៀវភៅកត់ត្រា និងសម្ភារៈផ្សព្វផ្សាយផ្សេងៗទៀត។
- ច្នៃប្រឌិត និងឌីហ្សាញសកម្មភាពទីផ្សាររបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ដើម្បីផ្សព្វ​​ផ្សាយនៅក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយសង្គម អ៊ីម៉ែលហ្វេសបុក គេហទំព័រ...... ឱ្យកាន់តែទូលំទូលាយ ទូទាំងប្រទេស និងសកលលោក។​
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងប្រចាំខែក្នុងការត្រួតពិនិត្យ សម្ភារៈផ្សព្វផ្សាយ ដើម្បីធ្វើឱ្យប្រាកដថាគ្រប់គ្រាន់សម្រាប់ប្រើប្រាស់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ខែ ឬឆ្នាំ។
- ទទួល និងឆ្លើយតប នៅពេលដែលអតិថិជនបានទាក់ទង​តាមទូរ​ស័ព្ទ អ៊ីម៉ែល និង/ឬបណ្តេញសង្គមផ្សេងៗ។
- សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយនាយកដ្ឋានផ្សេងៗ និងអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដើម្បី​ធ្វើការផលិត​​សម្ភារៈ​ទីផ្សារ។
- ចាត់ចែង និងគ្រប់គ្រងសម្ភារៈទីផ្សារទៅតាមការស្នើសុំ។
- អនុវត្តតាមគោលការណ៍-នីតិវិធី គោលនយោបាយ និងសេចក្តីណែនាំរបស់ FUTABA។
- ការងារផ្សេងទៀត អាស្រ័យលើអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់​ចាត់ចែង។

គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់សមរម្យ។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិសិ្សតកំពុងសិក្សា ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង
ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម និងឌីហ្សាញ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រ​ដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ។
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ Ms Office Word, Ms Excel,​ Photoshop, Illustrator, Sketching/Drawing ឬ Auto CAD។
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ ឬចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងការ រចនា​អាគារ ឬផ្ទះល្វែង និងបោះពុម្ព​សម្ភារៈ​ទីផ្សារដូច​ជា ខិតប័ណ្ណ បដាផ្សព្វផ្សាយ និងសម្ភារៈទីផ្សារផ្សេង​ទៀត។
- មានជំនាញក្នុងការទំនាក់ទំនង និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាជូន អតិថិជន មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងអាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម។
- មានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេស​ អាចសរសេរ និងនិយាយបានល្អ។
- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ​ ឬ ឡាន។

** របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖ បេក្ខជន / បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍បំពេញការងារជាមួយ គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី សូមផ្ញើពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV និង Cover Letter) ជាមួយរូបថត (4x6) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីមុខតំណែង និងទីតាំងដែលចង់បម្រើការងារឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់ និងយកមកដាក់នៅតាមការិយាល័យសាខារបស់ ហ្វូតាបា ឬអាចផ្ញើមកតាមរយៈ
- Email: hr@futabamfi.com.kh (នាយកដ្ឋានធនធានមនុស្ស)។
- សូមបញ្ជាក់ឲ្យបានច្បាស់លាស់អំពីប្រាក់បៀវត្សរំពឹងទុក។
- ឈប់ទទួលពាក្យត្រឹម៖ ថ្ងៃទី៣០ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ ម៉ោង ០៥:០០ ល្ងាច​ (អ្នកដាក់ពាក្យមុនត្រូវបានលើកទឹកចិត្ត)
- សម្រាប់ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម៖ សូមទំនាក់ទំនង ផ្នែកធនធានមនុស្សទូរស័ព្ទលេខៈ 070 392 333 ឬចូលទៅកាន់គេហទំព័រៈ www.futabamfi.com.kh ឬ Facebook: Futaba Microfinance Plc.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin Department  070 479 333 recruitment@futabamfi.com.kh #៧៩៥ មហាវិថីព្រះមុនីវង្ស សង្កាត់បឹងត្របែក (មានទីតាំងស្ថិតនៅទុលមុនសាលា បឹងត្របែក) ខណ្ឌចំការមន ភ្នំពេញ។ 070 479 333

job title: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន / មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់ Senior Credit Officer & Credit Officer
position: មន្រ្តីឥណទាន / មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់ Senior Credit Officer & Credit Officer
Job Description:
** មន្រ្តីឥណទាន / មន្រ្តីឥណទានជាន់ខ្ពស់
- ១០ នាក់ ការិយាល័យកណ្តាល រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
- ០៥ នាក់ ខណ្ឌព្រែកព្នៅ
- ០៥ នាក់ ខណ្ឌពោធិ៍សែនជ័យ
- ០៥ នាក់ ក្រុងច្បារមន ខេត្តកំពង់ស្ពឺ
- ០៥ នាក់ ក្រុងដូនកែវ ខេត្តតាកែវ

** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ
- ផ្សព្វផ្សាយផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មរបស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបាមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ទៅដល់អតិថិជនសក្តានុពល
- ធ្វើការសិក្សា វិភាគ វាយតម្លៃលទ្ធភាពសង និងទ្រព្យដាក់ធានារបស់អតិថិជនឲ្យបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ និងសំណើសុំឥណទាន ដើម្បីដាក់ជូននាយកសាខាឬគណៈកម្មាធិការឥណទានពិនិត្យ និងអនុម័ត
- ថែរក្សាទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ ជាមួយអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់ និងស្វែងរក
អតិថិជនថ្មីបន្ថែម
- បញ្ចេញឥណទានទៅតាមផែនការ ដែលបានកំណត់ដោយនាយកសាខា
- ពង្រឹងគុណភាពនៃការប្រមូល និងដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាយឺតយ៉ាវក្នុងការសងត្រឡប់ឥណទានមកវិញឲ្យបានទាន់ពេល
- បង្កើនទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអាជ្ញាធរក្នុងតំបន់ ដែល ហ្វូតាបាកំពុងធ្វើប្រតិបត្តិការ និងសិក្សាអំពីគូប្រកួតប្រជែងក្នុងតំបន់ព្រមទាំងរៀបចំផែនការ ដើម្បីទទួលបានចំណែកទីផ្សារបន្ថែម
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ប្រចាំសប្តាហ៍ និងប្រចាំខែ ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង

** គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា មីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ភីអិលស៊ី ផ្តល់ជូនបុគ្គលិកពេញសិទ្ធិនូវ អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗដូចជា៖
១. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់បៀវត្សប្រកួតប្រជែងទៅតាមបទពិសោធន៍។
២. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យចូលឆ្នាំខ្មែរ ១០០% ​នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៣. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភបុណ្យភ្ជុំបិណ្ឌ ១០០% នៃប្រាក់បៀវត្ស។
៤. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក និងសមាជិកគ្រួសារ (ប្តី/ប្រពន្ធ និងកូន២នាក់)។
៥. ការធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់ដល់ជីវិត ២៤ ម៉ោង។
៦. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចំណងដៃ អាពាហ៍ពិពាហ៍បុគ្គលិក។
៧. ផ្តល់ប្រាក់កម្ចីដល់បុគ្គលិកក្នុងអត្រាការបា្រក់សមរម្យ។
៨. ការឈប់សម្រាកអនុលោមតាមច្បាប់ក្រសួងការងារ និងការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។
៩. ផ្តល់ឯកសណ្ឋានការងារ។
១០. ផ្តល់ទូរស័ព្ទ និងស៊ីមកាត។
១១. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសំាង $៥០ក្នុង១ខែ។
១២. ប្រាក់ឈ្នួលម៉ូតូ $៨០ ក្នុង១ខែ​ សម្រាប់មន្ត្រីឥណទាន។
១៣. ប្រាក់រង្វាន់លើកទឹកចិត្ត ទៅមន្ត្រីដែលសម្រេចបានគ្រប់ផែនការ (Incentive)។
១៤​. ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភ និងសម្ភារៈប្រើប្រាស់ផ្សេងៗ​ តាមគោលការណ៍កំណត់របស់គ្រឹះស្ថាន ហ្វូតាបា។
Job Requirement:
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬជានិសិ្សតកំពុងសិក្សា ផ្នែកទីផ្សារ គ្រប់គ្រង គណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ

- ចេះបើកបរម៉ូតូ

Job Description:
- Collaboration in the design and preparation of surveys and field visits.
- Data collection, storage and analysis of client information outreach.
- Data collection, storage and analysis of FUTABA’s competitors.
- Come up with a concrete research proposal, conduct data collection including recruiting and forming a research team, providing orientation and training to the team, coordinating field works, perform data quality check, and monitoring the
progress.
- Develop data entry and analysis spreadsheets in both Ms. Excel and SPSS programs, input and analyze data, and come up with the research reports, present the key findings, coordinate with relevant departments and units to come up with plan for improvements and regularly monitor the
progress.
- Fieldwork and data quality management and control.
- Coordinate with others departments in portfolio analysis reporting and prepare clients-level data to be used in al decision-making processes.
- Could develop the policies, procedures, guidelines, and instruction;
- Develop the New and Existing Loan Products to be up to day for competing in the markets.
- Update and develop all forms of credits.
- Other task assign by Line Manager.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor or an equivalent university degree in economic or business management.
- Outstanding written and spoken communication skills, especially report writing in Khmer & English.
- Knowledge of quantitative and qualitative research methods, data analysis and interpretation of results.
- Knowledge of MS office, MS Outlook, SPSS
- One or more years of quantitative and qualitative research experience, preferably with rural populations in livelihood or microfinances research.
- Have a good interpersonal and communication skill, team work, independent, and result-oriented;
- Be good writing policy and procedure, guideline, and instruction;
- Ability to handle multiple tasks and complexities as per a number of different projects will be implemented at the same time;
- Ability to use initiative, prioritize, multi-task, and work well under pressure to meet deadlines
- Be willing to travel to other branches and province

Job Description:
 Assist in the planning, design, implementation, and maintenance of the company's IT 
infrastructure.
 Assist in managing the team of system administrators and provide guidance and 
support as needed.
 Ensure the security and integrity of the company's IT infrastructure by implementing 
and enforcing IT policies and procedures.
 Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues related to hardware, software, 
and system connectivity.
 Install, configure, and maintain the bank's IT infrastructure, including servers, storage, 
and networking devices.
 Install, configure, and maintain server operating systems, such as Windows Server, 
Linux, or Unix.
 Ensure the security and integrity of the bank's systems, including implementing access 
controls, monitoring for security threats, and applying software updates and patches.
 Develop and implement procedures for routine maintenance and upgrades of hardware 
and software.
 Respond to end-user requests for technical assistance and support.
 Maintain documentation for the bank's IT infrastructure, including configuration, 
processes, and procedures.
 Collaborate with other IT teams and end-users to ensure that the bank's IT systems 
support the organization's overall IT strategy.
 Perform regular backups and disaster recovery tests to ensure business continuity.
 Stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and industry trends to identify 
opportunities for improvement.
Job Requirement:
I. Experience
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field
 Minimum of 3 years of experience as a system administrator
 Experience with server virtualization technologies such as VMware or Hyper-V or Ldom 
with difference OS and Hardware Server (Intel, SUN Sparc and storages) and operating 
system such as Windows, Linux, Solaris, Ubuntu, etc,
 Strong knowledge of IT infrastructure technologies, including servers, storage, 
networking, and security.
 Experience with scripting languages, such as PowerShell or Python.
 Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with the ability to work effectively 
with other IT teams and end-users.
 Familiarity with banking applications and software, such as core banking systems, 
would be an advantage.
 Willingness to work outside of normal business hours to perform system maintenance 
and upgrades as required.
 Familiarity with cloud-based platforms such as AWS or Azure
 Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work independently or as part of a 
team
 Strong communication skills and the ability to explain technical concepts to nontechnical stakeholders.
II. Skill
 Good knowledge and experiences on Windows and UNIX platform installation, 
configuration, and security patch update,
 Proven experience as a help desk technician or other customer support role,
 Tech savvy with working knowledge of banking system products,
 Good understanding of computer systems, mobile devices and other tech products,
III. Aptitude
 Strong oral and written communication skills in English,
 Honesty, reliability, and a commitment to strict confidentiality,
 Ability to travel to provinces,
 Ability to work under pressure.
Company Profile: VATTANAC BANK is a licensed Bank offering a full range of retail and commercial banking products and services.

Job Description:
1. Main responsibility
Responsible for assigned client projects, performing intermediate duties from start to close of the
project life-cycle.
2. Reporting and authority
▪ Overseas Procurement Officer is reporting to Deputy Procurement Manager.
3. Scope of work
▪ Support LV/MV Tender both procurement pricing & right specification for customer
▪ Collection sourcing/quotation and new suppliers
▪ Issuing of purchase orders or purchase (Sale) contract with suppliers/factories
▪ Placing and follow up Order status with suppliers
▪ Arrange payment request to suppliers
▪ Follow up shipment with suppliers LV, MV & HV/ freight forwarder
▪ Update Shipment planning to ensure timeline for Stock / Projection deadline to project
manager
Job Requirement:
The Overseas Procurement Officer should possess the following qualifications
▪ Strong interpersonal skills and ability to work independently and within a team, build
relationships and work effectively
▪ Strong customer service skills
▪ Familiarity with Word, Excel, Internet & Email
▪ Self-motivated professional with ambition and drive to succeed
▪ Ability to multi-task with strong attention to detail
▪ Ability to work well under pressure in a deadline-oriented environment

email by using the contact details below by June 30, 2023. Only short-listed candidates will be

Job Description:
 The IT Infrastructure and Helpdesk Manager is responsible for managing and 
maintaining all aspects of the bank's IT infrastructure, including hardware, software, and 
networking equipment. The Manger is also responsible for providing technical support to 
end-users, including resolving technical issues and answering user questions.
 Managing and maintaining all aspects of the bank's IT infrastructure, including 
hardware, software, and networking equipment
 Monitoring and maintaining system performance and availability to ensure that all 
systems are functioning properly and efficiently
 Troubleshooting and resolving technical issues that end-users encounter with their IT 
systems
 Providing technical guidance and support to end-users on software and hardwarerelated issues
 Managing the configuration and deployment of hardware and software assets
 Ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies and 
procedures related to IT infrastructure and helpdesk operations
 The IT Infrastructure and Helpdesk Manager will report to the Head of IT, providing 
regular updates on infrastructure and helpdesk operations, issues, and initiatives. The 
team will also provide recommendations for improvements and changes to 
infrastructure and helpdesk policies and procedures.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): The IT Infrastructure and Helpdesk Manager's performance 
will be measured against the following KPIs:
 System uptime and availability
 Timeliness and accuracy of technical issue resolution
 User satisfaction with technical support and guidance
 Compliance with regulatory requirements and internal policies and procedures related 
to IT infrastructure and helpdesk operations
 Timeliness and accuracy of infrastructure and helpdesk-related support and guidance
 The IT Infrastructure and Helpdesk Manager will follow established IT governance 
policies and procedures, including those related to security, change management, and 
incident response. The Manager will also work closely with other IT teams and 
stakeholders to ensure alignment with organizational goals and objectives.
Job Requirement:
I. Experience
 Bachelor or Master degree graduated in computer science.
 At least 5 years working experience in managing IT Infrastructure and Helpdesk.
 Good knowledge and experiences on Windows and UNIX platform installation, 
configuration, and security patch update.
 Good knowledge and experiences in setup and managing M365, AD, DNS, domain, 
Exchange Mail, File Server and Web Hosting.
II. Skill
 Good understanding of computer systems, mobile devices, and other tech products.
 Proven experience as a help desk technician or other customer support role.
 Tech savvy with working knowledge of banking system products.
 Strong oral and written communication skills in English.
III. Aptitude
 Honesty, reliability, and a commitment to strict confidentiality.
 Self-motivated and good problem-solving skill.
 Ability to travel to provinces and work under pressure.

Job Description:
 Handle Customer Inquiry and Complaint via ATM hotline.
 Approve or decline authorization requests based on established guidelines.
 For manual systems, maintain records of authorization giving, including account 
number, name of cardholder, card expiration date, and transaction amount, 
confirmation of cardholder’s identity, merchant names, and type of merchandise 
purchased. For cash advances authorized, the name of the member or branch and the 
officer’s name is recorded.
 Give authorization codes to merchants, branches, or other members if account is 
current and transaction will not bring balance higher than the established percentage 
over credit line permitted.
 Monitor and analyse cardholders and merchants transaction to avoid fraud.
 Handle enquiries/plastic maintenance and card activation.
 Review account history for payment record and actions since last statement date. 
Verifying employment and contacting other credit sources, if necessary, and calling 
merchant back to approve or decline transaction.
 Refer over credit line or questionable requests to Authorization Supervisor for further 
review and decision.
 Discuss reasons for declination of Authorizations with customer or branch and 
recommending corrective action to clear account status.
 Review telephone calls regarding lost, stolen, or destroyed cards and referring pertinent 
information to appropriate areas (i.e., Security Department, etc.) for action.
 Maintain the Bank’s image of high standard of service to external and internal 
customers.
 Perform testing regarding to Debit & Credit cards processing with iCard system.
 Perform Testing ATM Transaction Debit and Credit card with VB ATM and Others Banks 
ATM.
 Review Shift Risk Management Report (Suspicious/Repeat Transaction/Fraud 
transaction/High amount usage) to minimize risk involved
 Prepare Daily Report for Management as he/she needed (Daily Transaction Report & 
Merchant Transaction Report, Change Card Limit Report.
 Daily check all Authorizer works before start operation (checking personal mail, card 
centre mail, Hot-line phone connection, all System Login, Camera and CCTV...)
 Handle Customer Inquiry with our new Product information such as Card Products, 
Mobile Banking, Internet Banking and Online Payment Tax.
 Handle with Visa/Master Cards Management such as Suspend Card, Activate Revoke 
Card and Activate Card which receiving internal mail request from branches or any 
sections.
 Handle with Visa/Master Cards Management related to Increasing Account Limit & 
Spending Limit which receiving request from customers after getting approved from 
Management.
 Perform any other duties assigned from time to time by Card Centre Manager.
Job Requirement:
 Graduate University Degree related field
 Good command of written and verbal English and Khmer
 Conversational and report-writing English communication skills
 Excellent communication skills and time management
 Decision making/problem solving skills 
 Good Computer user and ability to operate office machines
 Highly motivated, team player, initiative, quick-witted, Thoroughness, stress resistant, 
flexible, accurate and punctual.

Job Description:
 Designing, developing, and maintaining the backend systems and applications for 
Vattanac Bank.
 Collaborating with cross-functional teams, including frontend developers, UI/UX 
designers, and product managers, to gather requirements and ensure seamless 
integration between the frontend and backend components.
 Building and optimizing scalable, high-performance APIs and microservices to support 
banking operations and customer-facing applications.
 Developing secure authentication and authorization mechanisms to protect sensitive 
data and ensure regulatory compliance.
 Implementing and maintaining database architectures, including both relational (e.g., 
Oracle, SQL Server) and NoSQL (e.g., MongoDB) databases, to handle transactional and 
analytical data.
 Writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code in languages such as Java, Python, or 
Node.js.
 Ensuring the availability, reliability, and fault-tolerance of backend systems by 
implementing appropriate monitoring, error handling, and performance optimization 
techniques.
 Conducting thorough testing, debugging, and performance tuning to identify and resolve 
issues, bottlenecks, and security vulnerabilities.
 Collaborating with DevOps teams to plan and execute deployment strategies, including 
continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) pipelines.
 Keeping up-to-date with the latest advancements and best practices in backend 
development, security, and banking industry standards.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field. 
(Equivalent work experience may be considered.)
 Proven experience as a backend developer, preferably in the banking or financial 
services industry.
 Proficiency in backend programming languages, such as Java, Python, or Node.js, and 
frameworks like Spring Boot or Express.js.
 Strong knowledge of API design principles, RESTful architecture, and microservices 
development.
 Experience with database management systems, both relational and NoSQL, such as 
Oracle, SQL Server, or MongoDB.
 Familiarity with security protocols, encryption algorithms, and data protection 
standards relevant to the banking sector.
 Experience with cloud platforms, such as AWS or Azure, and their services (e.g., EC2, S3, 
Lambda) is a plus.
 Proficiency in version control systems (e.g., Git) and code collaboration tools (e.g., 
GitHub, Bitbucket).
 Experience with docker environment will be added value.
 Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to analyze complex systems to propose 
efficient and scalable solutions.
 Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively 
with cross-functional teams and stakeholders.

Job Description:
I. Background
EWMI, an independent not-for-profit organization founded in New York, USA, has been
implementing projects in Cambodia since 2003. EWMI works to strengthen Cambodian society by bringing together government, civil society and the private sector.

II. Scope of Work
The Translator/Interpreter will work closely with the Director of Finance and Operations to provide support as described below.

1. Written Translations
 Translate English grant summaries, reports and correspondence into Khmer, in keeping with EWMI work plans and schedules.
 Provide written translations for other documents. This includes translating documents from Khmer into English and English to Khmer. Advise on the appropriateness of public relations materials for specific target audiences.
2. Oral Interpretation
 Provide interpretation for the facilitation of meetings between Khmer and English-language speakers (or other language speakers).
 Provide private interpretation for specific individuals to facilitate their participation in
meetings, as assigned.
3. Other Program Support
 Deal with office visitors and attend to their inquiries.
 Serve as a cultural liaison to expatriate staff and expatriate visitors.
 Assist with other office duties as required.
Job Requirement:
III. Qualifications
 Relevant university degree
 Near-native English language skills
 At least five years of formal work experience as a translator/interpreter,
 Demonstrated experience working with civil society organizations or donor projects
 Demonstrated experience working with a diverse range of individuals
 Demonstrated experience working at the community level
 Strong oral and written skills in both Khmer and English
 Strong interpersonal skills
 Demonstrated skills as proactive team player
 Working knowledge of computer skills

IV. How to Apply
Interested candidates should submit a brief cover letter and CV (including the names and contact information for three professional references) by email to:
Ms. Houy Leakhena, Director of Finance and Operations: infocambodia@ewmi.org.
Please include the position title of “Translator/Interpreter” in the subject line.
We accept applications by email only. EWMI does not discriminate on the basis of ethnicity, race, age, gender, or sexual orientation. Only short-listed candidates will be contacted. Closing date for all applications: June 30, 2023.
Company Profile: About EWMI: Founded in 1988 as an independent, not-for-profit organization, East-West Management Institute, Inc. (EWMI) promotes the rule of law, civil society, and free market systems globally.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   infocambodia@ewmi.org No. 707, Street 95 Sangkat Beng Kengkang3 Khan Chamkarmorn Phnom Penh, Cambodia

Job Description:
 Designing, developing, and maintaining iOS applications for Vattanac Bank, ensuring 
high-quality user experiences and adherence to coding best practices.
 Collaborating with product managers, UI/UX designers, and backend developers to 
gather requirements and ensure seamless integration of frontend and backend 
components.
 Implementing new features, enhancements, and bug fixes to existing iOS applications, 
following the software development life cycle (SDLC) and agile methodologies.

regulations.

company_name: Society for Community Development in Cambodia (SOFDEC)
Job Description:
II. Purposes of evaluation
The specific purposes of project evaluation are presented as the following:

1.	To assess the project achievement based on logical framework 2021-2023 by taking into account the following on: 
-	Relevance 
-	Effectiveness
-	Impact
-	Sustainability 

2.	To provide findings, conclusions and recommendations with respect to a specific development intervention in order to draw lessons for future design and implementation.

III. Study site
It is requested to evaluate the project implemented in 8 partner schools (4 primary schools and 4 kindergartens) and students’ families in the catchment areas (of those schools) in Teuk Phos district, Kampong Chhnang province.

IV. Activity and Time frame
The evaluation will take place in July 2023. We offer 21 working days, of which 8 days will be spent in field data collection, 13 days for reviewing secondary data, preparing work plan, data analysis, report writing, presentation of the result, and finalize the report. The consultant shall submit the evaluation report on end of July 2023.
Job Requirement:
The consultant shall decide on the most appropriate methods to undertake the assignment, however, considering the objectives of the evaluation, the following methods would be expected to be applied to evaluate the project.
-	Assessment of school performance from the perspective of class results and comparison to the performance before the Covid-19 pandemic.
-	Focus group discussions with students and poor student families running livelihood project to understand ownership, economic capacity to support children and sustainability.
-	Interviews with the stakeholders (district office of education youth and sport, and commune council/village chief) to understand strength, weakness, opportunities and threats of the implemented project activities.
-	Class observation as participant observer
-	Consultative discussions with beneficiaries (staff, school directors, school support committees) to explore findings and develop consensus on recommendations.
-	Alignment of project activities with the new primary school standard policy.

Consultants, who are interested in this opportunity, should send their proposal (including budget plan), the updated CV and cover letter to SOFDEC office:

Head Office: House #53, St.E-7 Borey Peng Hout, Damnak Thom village, Sangkat Stung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. Or by Email: sokdoungchan@gmail.com

Kampong Chhnang Office: # A227, Pha’er village, Sangkat Pha’er, Kampong Chhnang Town, Kampong Chhnang province. Cambodia. 

Deadline of application: 30 June, 2023 at 5:00 pm. Only shortlisted consultants will be contacted for interview.  For more information please contact SOFDEC office at 
Tel: 077 613 399.
Company Profile:
The Society for Community Development in Cambodia (SOFDEC) is a Cambodian non-governmental organization founded in 2006. During the 3 year-period (2021 to 2023), SOFDEC has implemented the education improvement project entitled Komar An, under financial support from CO-OPERAID (Switzerland). The overall goal of Komar An is improving quality of early childhood and primary education for children in Teuk Phos district (Kampong Chhnang province). 

Komar An has been implemented in 23 partner schools; 11 partner primary schools and 12 community kindergartens. The project has been working directly with 2,133 students and 56 school teachers totally in academic year 2021. Komar An directly benefits around 9,126 persons (students, teachers and poor farmers) of partner schools and indirectly benefit approximately 31,117 persons in the catchment areas.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   077 613 399 sokdoungchan@gmail.com House #53, St.E-7 Borey Peng Hout, Damnak Thom village, Sangkat Stung Meanchey, Khan Meanchey, Phnom Penh. Kampong Chhnang Office: # A227, Pha’er village, Sangkat Pha’er, Kampong Chhnang Town, Kampong Chhnang Province. 077 613 399

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

schools.

Job Description: Job Announcement𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎 𝐂𝐨., 𝐋𝐭𝐝., the parent company of 𝐙𝐀𝐍𝐃𝐎, 𝐓𝐄𝐍𝟏𝟏, 𝐆𝐀𝐓𝐎𝐍𝐈, 𝐑𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐞, 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝟑𝟔𝟏° planning to extend across the country, is currently looking for a talented and potential candidate in the position of Senior Fashion Merchandiser.Job Title: Senior Fashion MerchandiserCategory: Fashion, Merchandising, PurchasingJob Summary: Planning and developing merchandising strategies. Analyzing sales figures, customers' reactions, and market trends to anticipate product needs and collaborating with designers, operations, warehouses, and suppliers to negotiate prices, quantities, and time scales.Merchandisers are not fashion designers. He/she stays close to the fashion world and uses their fashion sense and analytical mind to determine how much of each style to purchase and stock, negotiate with manufacturers, and suppliers, and work with fashion designers to determine emerging or existing trends. Job Description:•	Keep up with the latest Fashion trend and communicate regularly with fashion designers in order to blend fashion sense with quantitative analysis by looking at how products have performed in the past and forecast consumer demands for upcoming seasons.•	Use fashion knowledge and trend analysis to decide how to purchase and stock a retail store. Decide which new styles to order, which items to reorder, the quantity of each item, and colors and sizes to stock.•	Purchase and negotiate with manufacturers and designers to make sure items can be priced in a way that will sell and make a profit.•	Determine how each store should be stocked based on store sales performance, different customer demographics, and store environment.•	Prepare budget planning for monthly stock purchases for the upcoming season, and present it to management for approval.•	Schedule timeline from production, to finish product and delivery to ensure on-time for the season.•	Other tasks assigned by Merchandising Manager.
Job Requirement: Requirements:•	BA/BS degree in Fashion Design or related field•	5-year+ experience in a product management role•	A strong ability in forecasting, analytical, negotiation, and communication skill•	Understand fashion trend and their demand•	English: usable for medium-professional setting•	Proficient in MS Office and Adobe Suites •	Ability to work independently•	Strong attention to detail*𝐎𝐭𝐡𝐞𝐫 𝐛𝐞𝐧𝐞𝐟𝐢𝐭𝐬:• Annual Bonus• Employee Discount• Birthday Package• Other benefitsInterested candidates are invited to submit their updated CV, and cover letter to our email: hr@zandokh.com or 𝙏𝙀𝙇𝙀𝙂𝙍𝘼𝙈: 𝟎𝟖𝟏 𝟐𝟕 𝟓𝟑 𝟓𝟑Join us on Telegram for more job opportunities: https://t.me/zandocareer

Job Description:
 Android Application Development: Designing, coding, and testing Android applications 
using programming languages like Java or Kotlin, and relevant frameworks such as 
Android SDK.
 Collaborating with Cross-functional Teams: Working closely with product managers, 
UI/UX designers, backend developers, and other stakeholders to understand business 
requirements and develop functional, user-friendly Android applications.
 Mobile Application Architecture: Designing and implementing efficient, scalable, and 
maintainable architecture for Android applications, considering factors like 
performance, security, and compatibility with different Android devices and OS 
versions.
 Bug Fixing and Troubleshooting: Identifying and resolving issues, including bugs, 
performance bottlenecks, and compatibility problems, through debugging, testing, and 
proactive maintenance of Android applications.
 Version Control and Continuous Integration: Utilizing version control systems (e.g., Git) 
and integrating the Android application development workflow with continuous 
integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) processes to ensure reliable and efficient 
software development practices.
 Quality Assurance: Collaborating with quality assurance (QA) teams to ensure the 
delivery of high-quality Android applications, including conducting code reviews, 
implementing automated tests, and addressing QA feedback.
 Research and Learning: Staying updated with the latest trends, tools, and technologies 
in the Android development ecosystem, and continuously improving skills through selflearning and professional development.
 Documentation and Knowledge Sharing: Creating and maintaining technical 
documentation, such as application architecture diagrams, code documentation, and 
guidelines, to facilitate knowledge sharing and efficient collaboration within the 
development team.
 Remember, the above points are general and may not reflect the specific requirements 
of Vattanac Bank's Android developer position. It's always advisable to refer to the 
official job description provided by the company for precise and detailed information
Job Requirement:
 Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Information Systems Technology 
or related field.
 Knowledge of developing trends and emerging standards in mobile apps like RxJava, 
MVP/MVVM/MVI, Kotlin, etc.
 Minimum of 3 years of experience in Android Development and 5 years of experience in 
Software Development
 Familiar with the whole software development life cycle (e.g. requirements, analysis, 
design, implementation, testing, and documentation)
 Great knowledge of Android UI design principles, patterns, an d best practices 
 Excellent technical knowledge of Java/Kotlin for Android, Android SDK and Android 
Studio
 Good understanding of RESTful APIs and how to connect Android applications to backend services
 Experience working with testing libraries like Espresso and Junit
 Familiar with Continuous Integration (CI) and its use in testing, building and deploying 
Android apps
 Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for 
common tasks
 Understanding of code versioning using git, github and gitflow
 Understanding of fundamental design principles behind a scalable application
 Experience with Agile software development methodology (SCRUM) is a plus
 Experience with payments technology is a plus

Job Description:
This is an important role for BfD of Mission Alliance Cambodia in the efforts to support businesses in Cambodia, mainly small businesses in the agriculture sector in the rural areas where there is currently very limited support being provided. The purpose of a SMEs Coaching Coordinator is to observe, monitor and support businesses in adopting digital tools to grow their businesses and connecting with other business support organizations. S/he will also be expected to lead a small team of coaches and provide coaching to businesses where necessary. The key tasks include:
▪ Provide coaching to businesses on request. This will be mainly distance-coaching.
▪ Coordinate with coaches and partners for the coaching services execution for clients
▪ Provide orientation and support to coaches.
▪ Collect feedback on the coaches and coaching services from clients and put out plans to improve.
▪ Work with the BfD and MA team to develop new ideas and innovation for the projects.
▪ Represent BfD in relevant external events.
▪ Assist other colleagues whenever necessary.
Job Requirement:
We expect you to have qualifications, skills, and competencies as below:
▪ Minimum of high school certificate (bachelor in business administration is preferred)
▪ Minimum of 2 years’ experience providing business coaching or 4 years of experience working to support SMEs in Cambodia.
▪ Experience in managing projects and leading people.
▪ Good understanding of business development and business challenges in Cambodia.
▪ Willingness to work with and support businesses through distance communication.
▪ Good knowledge and skills on Microsoft 365 including Microsoft office applications, Teams, SharePoint, and OneDrive
▪ Good English language skills including listening, speaking, writing, and reading and having Khmer as mother tongue.

5. Application
The candidates who meet the mentioned requirement are requested to send their CVs and covers letter (do not attach certificates) to emails provided before 21-July-2023 at 4.30pm.
- Email : matine@nmakh.org / mos@nmakh.org

The interview will be on a rolling basis. So, we strongly encourage the interested candidates to apply as
soon as possible. Women are strongly encouraged to apply for this role.
Company Profile:
Mission Alliance is a faith based, Christian, NGO with headquarters in Norway. We aim to fight poverty and promote justice by being close, capable, and brave. We have fought poverty through sustainable development for over 100 years in South America, Asia, and Africa. Mission Alliance operates microfinance banks on these three continents. We have worked in Cambodia through local partnerships throughout the country since 2007 with a focus on community development in the areas of education, livelihoods, and natural resource management.

2. About Business for Development (BfD)
In January 2022, we started to implement the Business for Development (BfD) project. BfD is the innovation project of Mission Alliance beyond our existing extensive work in community development and microfinance. With the new Business for Development project, we are now expanding our work to support local businesses. We work with SMEs, primarily in the agriculture sector. We are helping businesses access relevant competency, technical support,
market expansion and finance through a wide network of partners.

As an innovation project, BfD wants to test innovative ideas and utilize the technology to support our work. One of our focuses is developing the digital, user-friendly, and contextualized chatbot where businesses can access and learn to grow their businesses. Through the chatbot, businesses will also receive personalized and data oriented coaching services from the professional coach team of BfD.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   099 29 21 21 matine@nmakh.org #25, Street 07, Borey Pipub Thmey Samrong Andet, Sangkat KorK Khleang, Khan Sen Sok, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 099 29 21 21

Job Description:
Job​ description:
*HR Tasks:
-Support the company's strategic goals which may help drive the design, planning, and implementation of these programs and policies
-Manage and oversee all aspects of HR practice
-Assist and support HR team on recruitment, compensation & benefit, compliance and training& development
-Work closely with top management & other departments to develop HR strategic planning and organizing chart
-Get involved in the HR Information System
-Analyze HR data: why people leave us, whey people stay with us, and why people join us.
-Assist in design or update HR policy such as recruitment, compensation & benefit, compliance and training and development
-Ensure good performance management and performance appraisal
-Identify the weakness and strength of HR Admin Department for betterment
-Present a monthly HR report to middle management and top management
-Do market research on salary-scale and an effective HRM, especially the fastest and most effective recruitment strategy
-Design and update HR policy
-Develop a succession planning of each department and campus
-Perform other relevant tasks assigned by Top Management
*Administrative Tasks
-Attend the meeting as needed
-Ensure the smooth operation of documentation
-Find ways to reduce the administrative cost and save time
-Design and update administrative workflow from time to time
-Run affairs to the relevant ministry directly if needed
-Manage and oversee all aspects of administrative practice
-Corresponding to rental house owners
-Perform other relevant tasks assigned by Top Management
Job Requirement:
Qualification 
-Bachelor's degree in Human Resource Management, Business Administration or related fields. Holding a master degree is appreciated. 
-Having a degree or experiences in pedagogy is applicated.
-At least 4-year experience in HR Admin or related experiences.
-Excellent communication, organizational skills, positive attitude, good time management and leadership and employee development skills
-The ability to work under pressure and with personnel from all levels
-Be patient and able to deal with difficult situations
-Documented computer skills and computer literacy with Ms. Office
-Good command of English
-Good literacy in Mandarin is highly encouraged 
-Self-motivated, friendly, positive attitude, energic, mature, patient, and flexible
-Team work spirit

Job Description: •	Drive the sales to achieve the individual sales target in your own area and track ongoing results to ensure that objectives in terms of customers, revenue, sales growth, availability, visibility, and customer price of products are achieved within the area.•	Manage the implementation of brand, trade, and sales area programs and localized activities.•	Manage the area’s key trade partner performance through regular visits and communication to maximize revenues, clients, and share performance.•	Establish close working relationships with all trade partners, namely retailers, wholesalers, depots, craftsmen, and roll-formers, in order to gain a high level of support and loyalty.•	Conduct regular field visits and call attachment with retailer, wholesaler, depot, craftsman, and roll former to provide on-job coaching and motivate to drive achievement of targets.•	Provide ongoing, on time in full, market intelligent reports to inform management decisions and planning.•	Ensure all area activities are compiled to ISI Steel's code of conduct and all corporate policies and guidelines.•	Actively contribute to corporate and brand image and values.•	Other tasks as assigned.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business management, civil engineering or architecture, or equivalent•	Minimum 2 year of experience in territory sales representative level in construction material•	Fresh graduate students of civil engineering or architecture are also encouraged to apply.•	Good command of English (Speaking & Writing)•	Good Chinese is a plus.•	Ability to use MS Office, Internet, and E-mail•	Outgoing, flexible, patient, and dedicatedCompetitive offer:•	Annual Salary Increment•	Annual Performance Bonus•	Learning and Development•	Lunch Allowance•	Coffee and fruit serve•	Group Personal Accident Insurance ( Forte )•	Working Accident and Health care Insurance ( NSSF )•	Company Events•	Uniforms•	Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description:
-	Manage effectively the audit team and carrying out audits of all projects of MAM, which cover in Phnom Penh and Province areas as planned.
-	Independently assessing, evaluating and consulting to the management in relation to the internal control system and managing risks to add value and improve the overall business operations of the MAM projects.
-	Examining any weaknesses and/or potential weaknesses in the line management (policy, procedures or operational activities) based on the risk rating (critical or major), which may impact to the business operations of the MAM. If any major weaknesses and / or potential weaknesses, discuss the weaknesses with the line manager.
-	Proposing and updating the Internal Audit Procedures of each assigned project as necessary.
-	Acting as a consultant to all the MAM projects, particularly ensuring that organization, policies, standard operating procedures, accounting principles, business process, risk management, internal control, governance and information systems are appropriately aligned to achieve the MAM goals effectively and efficiently, and in a manner that contains risks to an acceptable level.
-	Being liaison officer to external parties of the MAM in relation to internal audit function.
-	Review the internal audit report and submit to the Head of Internal Audit for final review.
-	Providing coaching note to subordinates upon the review of audit work.
-	Assist Deputy/Head Department for annual audit planning.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor Degree in finance or Accounting, CAT/ACCA, or related fields.
-	Good English writing or Chinese is considered as priority.
-	Experience at least two and three years for Supervisor Audit respectively.
-	Willing to travel and work in provinces for a period of time.
-	Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply for the position of Auditor.
-	Accomplishment of audit work following the schedule as planned. 
-	Good team work with respect of audit ethic.
-	Contribute feedback/idea to the audit department on potential process enhancements where team improvement is possible.
-	Computer Literate (Microsoft office and quick book).

Job Description: - Tax Accountant:• Prepare tax provisions schedules, returns, payments, reports and maintain a company’s tax database.• Find tax solutions to complicated tax issues or errors from incorrect tax filings.• Identify legal tax savings and recommend ways to improve profits.• Make sure that company comply with federal, state and local tax regulations.• Advise management about the impact of tax liabilities and corporate strategies or new tax laws.• Coordinate outsourced tax preparation work.• Accurately prepare quarterly and annual tax reports.• Keep up-to-date with tax changes and industry trends by participating in educational opportunities, participating in professional organizations, keeping up with professional networks and reading professional publications.• Stays up to date on all federal, state, and local tax laws.• Maintains confidentiality of all personal financial information.• Uses popular tax preparation and bookkeeping software.• Other tasks assign by manager.- Tax Supervisor:• Perform tax planning٫ review current structure of tax returns and develop methods to optimize it.• Provide full-stack tax services and manage tax audits in the company.• Monitor all tax operations ensuring their timely completion and compliance with all applicable laws and regulations.• Work together with company's accounting personnel and supervise their performance.• Discover tax risks and develop countermeasures.• Maintain company's tax balances on general ledger.• Manage company's tax documentation to ensure it is accurate and up-to-date.• Help to meet all information data requests related to the tax documentation.• Other tasks assign by manager.
Job Requirement: - Profound experience in tax accounting٫ tax compliance and all kinds of tax return operations- Good practical experience with tax software- Good knowledge of MS Office- Strong leadership and personnel management skills- Analytical skills with close attention to details- Ability to meet deadlines and find solutions to problems

Job Description:
 Develop intuitive and engaging interactions and visual designs for mobile apps
 Translate data and user insights into interaction flows, design artifacts (mock-ups, 
prototypes, wire frames) and requirements for intuitive and functional mobile app UIs.
 Assist in creating a product roadmap based on user research.
 Manage and support processes that maintain a cohesive UI design system and ensure 
consistent design and language is applied across apps.
 Structure content, craft navigation and develop components that make information and 
digital interaction accessible, usable, and understandable.
 Work closely with other designers, developers and end users to ensure technical 
compatibility and user satisfaction
 Be highly motivated and maintain a positive in a fast-moving environment
 Foster a collaborative spirit across multiple teams
Job Requirement:
 Degree in digital art and interaction design, human-computer interaction or related 
field.
 Minimum of 2 year of experience in UI/UX designs for mobile apps.
 Strong graphic design skills, with a good understanding of typography, intuitive layouts 
and palate development.
 Strong ability to recognize and predict use-cases and user interaction, including happy 
path, edge cases, and incorporate them into designs
 Good understanding of user experience design for mobile and the web, technology 
trends, demonstrable design skills, and ability to present relevant work
 Excellent skills in Photoshop, Illustrator, InvisionApp, UXPin, Zeplin and other relevant 
design tools.
 In-depth understanding of Apple’s human interface design guidelines, Android design 
and other mobile platform designs including Google’s material design

Job Description:
 Developing test plans and strategies that cover all aspects of the software development 
life cycle, including functional, non-functional, regression, and integration testing.
 Executing test cases and scripts, using both manual and automated testing methods, and 
tracking defects and issues to ensure that software is tested thoroughly and meets the 
required quality standards.
 Designing and developing automated test scripts and frameworks to increase testing 
efficiency and reduce the time and effort required for manual testing.
 Generating test reports and metrics that provide stakeholders with visibility into the 
quality of the software being developed, including defect density, test coverage, and 
pass/fail rates.
 Continuously reviewing and improving the testing process to ensure that it is efficient, 
effective, and aligned with industry best practices, including implementing test 
automation, reducing testing cycle times, and improving defect prevention and 
detection.
Job Requirement:
 Working experience in software development (optional)
 Working experience in software quality assurance
 Good knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
 Experience in writing clear, concise and comprehensive test plans and test cases
 Bachelor’s Degree in computer science, engineering, or related fields
 Minimum 3 years of relevant working experience
 Ability to work under pressure.

Job Description: •ផ្សព្វផ្សាយពីផលិតផល និងសេវាកម្មទៅកាន់អតិថិជនគោលដៅនៅក្នុងតំបន់ប្រតិបតិ្តការ•សម្របសម្រួលជាមួយអតិថិជនក្នុងការរៀបចំដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំកម្ចី•ចុះធ្វើការវិភាគ និងវាយតម្លៃប្រាក់កម្ចី និងបញ្ចូលព័ត៌មានក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ•ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានត្រឡប់ជូនអតិថិជនអំពីការអនុម័តប្រាក់កម្ចី•រៀបចំ និងបោះពុម្ពឯកសារប្រាក់កម្ចីសម្រាប់ការបញ្ចេញឥណទាន•រក្សាទុកឯកសារប្រាក់កម្ចីនៅក្នុងទូរសុវត្ថិភាព•ធ្វើការតាមដាននូវការប្រើប្រាស់ប្រាក់កម្ចីបន្ទាប់ពីបានបញ្ចេញជូនអតិថិជន•គ្រប់គ្រង និងថែរក្សានូវគុណភាពឥណទាន•ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement: • អាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ ដល់ ៣៥• រស់នៅក្នុងតំបន់ជ្រើសរើស•  មានបទពិសោធន៍២ឆ្នាំផ្នែកមន្រ្តីឥណទាន•  មានជំនាញខាងលក់ ពូកែទំនាក់ទំនង ស្មោះត្រង់និងមានការតាំងចិត្តខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ•  ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន•   ផ្តល់អតិភាពខ្ពស់សំរាប់អ្នកមានទីលំនោអចិន្រ្តៃយ៍នៅសាខាឬនៅជិតតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ• អាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ ដល់ ៣៥• រស់នៅក្នុងតំបន់ជ្រើសរើស•  មានបទពិសោធន៍២ឆ្នាំផ្នែកមន្រ្តីឥណទាន•  មានជំនាញខាងលក់ ពូកែទំនាក់ទំនង ស្មោះត្រង់និងមានការតាំងចិត្តខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ•  ត្រូវមានម៉ូតូផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន•   ផ្តល់អតិភាពខ្ពស់សំរាប់អ្នកមានទីលំនោអចិន្រ្តៃយ៍នៅសាខាឬនៅជិតតំបន់ប្រតិបត្តិការ

Sample on-site-check on the client premise, business and collateral location by interviewing/Verbal/Calling for verification-Frequently transport of document from VCO station to by passing branch &handover to CSS-Recovery portfolio management at >60days and write off loans and Management can assign to do focus more on aging>30days as refer to increment of aging loans-Digital reporting of finding at sample check. recovery works and identified process gaps and challenges to Head of Credit-Base on the identified gaps, under supervision of HOC, provide training support-Deeply analysis and detect all credit risk that might happen to clients and develop the necessary tools for prevention-Corporate with team for good working environment and team building motivation-Daily/weekly catch-up report to HOC and monthly feedback and reports to credit department-Managing own time and travel efficiently from branch to branch-Other task will be assigned by management, if any

Job Description: -Assist the Head of Internal Audit in preparing the audit annual plan and schedule-Assist the Head of Internal Audit in consolidating quarterly internal audit achievement to the Audit Committee-Consolidate quarterly audit findings -Oversee and execute the follow-up of audit findings-Analyze new changes of updated business processes laws and regulations to identify risks and areas for the development of audit policy/procedure/tool-Assist the Head of Internal Audit in developing and/or updating audit policy/procedures/working paper/tool/manual to improve audit activities and ensure audit objectives are fulfilled-Review audit activities to ensure it is aligned with audit methodology, and to provide recommendation for the area of improvement-Liaise with the internal audit team to ensure there is a review of compliance with existing policies, regulations, plans, and procedure-Participate with the audit team in providing positive recommendations on areas of findings-Improve on the technical aspect to related staff on the area of weakness or error after an audit-Develop training materials for internal audit team training -Assist and train the new audit staff-Repository monitoring and filing management-Participate in the development of a strong understanding of company activities and risks as well as emerging risks; then provide recommendations for new audit-Other tasks as assigned by the Head of the Internal Audit
Job Requirement: -University degree in Audit, Finance, Accounting, Business Administration or related fields-Experience in audit and risk management in bank or MFIs-A minimum of 3 years of working experience in auditing with bank or MFIs-Working knowledge/understanding of auditing technique-Computer literacy Microsoft Word, Excel, Power-Point, Quick-Book, Internet and E-mail.-Comprehensive in both Khmer and English-Demonstrate high level of ethical behavior and trustworthiness-Willingness to work at field and travel-Ability to work under pressure and highly self-motivated

Job Description:
 Manage, check and administers payroll calculation and other compensation and
benefits.
 Assist CHRO in managing staff performance and developing the compensations strategy,
proposal for approval on staff bonus, staff promotion and salary increment.
 Assist CHRO in developing Headcount plan and budget for all departments and branches
of the Bank.
 Assist CHRO in reviewing staff performance appraisal, promotion, and implementation
of rewards and recognition program as well as handling the problems related to
performance, behaviors, and work closely with related departments in handling
investigation and meting out corrective actions or sanctions;
 Properly maintain and update personnel records (data entry) in HRIS system, Employee
master list & Intranet
 Responds to employee inquiries regarding HR-related issues. Takes the opportunity to
increase the level of employees’ understanding and provide coaching where appropriate
EMPLOYEE ON-BOARDING AND OFF-BOARDING 
 Manages all administrative HR aspects of the hiring process including new hire usercreation set up, onboarding sessions, probation process, and preparing the employees’ 
profiles to ensure all required compliance documents are fully completed
 Manages all administrative HR aspects of the personnel termination/off-boarding 
process including advising managers, preparing necessary paperwork, and employee 
clearance procedure
 Conducts exit interviews with a focus on identifying main reasons for leaving, and 
provides feedback and recommendations to management through analyzing turnover 
data and developing action plans to address patterns and trends.
HR COMPLIANCE & COMPENSATION/BENEFITS
 Maintains and updates all personnel policies and procedures, and ensuring HR 
compliance process with MoLV in accordance with labor law and regulatory 
requirement
 Raises awareness of new/updated regulatory requirements and compliance policies, to 
avoid potential issues as the result of non-compliance practices
 Purpose and Assists in reviewing HR policy, staff benefits policy regarding its 
appropriateness and applicability to ensure that the benefits schemes are at par with
the banking industry’s benefits scheme and internal equity
 Manages work permit, work visa and immigration paperwork for expatriate employee, 
when necessary
 Provides compliance oversight of all employment policies and health and welfare 
benefits
 Administers staff attendance, absence and leave management including Emergency 
Leave, Maternity Leave, Unpaid Leave, etc. 
 Administers bi-monthly report of staff movement for payroll 
 Conducts semi-annual survey with other banks in salary, benefits and HR related survey
 Performs other related duties as required and assigned
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Mgmt, or any other
related field
 Minimum 3 years’ experience in a Human Resources and/or compliance-related role
 Proficient in Microsoft Office, especially advanced excel skill
 Ability to handle sensitive and confidential matters with high level of integrity
 Problem Solving Skills
 Supervisory Skills

Job Description:
 Develop recruitment plan, strategy, and initiative to cope with business need
 Leading the execution and handling the corporate staff recruitment from junior to the 
top role and ensure to have the right people on time 
 Manage end-to-end recruitment process, sourcing, pre-screening, coordinating 
assessments & interviews, conduct reference checks and maintain a relationship till the 
employee comes on-board
 Oversee company's social media presence and channels related to recruitment and 
employer branding
 Initiate and develop the recruitment projects such as: Career Fair, university 
presentation etc. 
 Develop and maintain recruitment reports 
 Develop onboarding program, lead the execution & monitoring the implementation 
properly.
Job Requirement:
 Bachelor Degree in Human Resources Management, Business Management and/or in 
any related field
 At least 5 years of experience in HR recruitment from banking industry is a plus
 Proficient in use of social media and job portals as well as familiarity with business 
and/or professional networking
 At pleasing personality, self-starter, well-organized, good team player, intuitive, and 
with good presentation skills
 Has a personal commitment to operational excellence; display honesty, high integrity, 
professionalism and strong work ethics
 Proficiency in Microsoft office and HR system 
 Proficiency in spoken and written English
