Job Description:
* Job purpose: 

Serve as custodian of student academic records; providing the necessary services which facilitate class and room scheduling, student registration for classes, collection and maintenance of grade information, student performance monitoring, academic eligibility determination, and a variety of other services related to student records.

* Key responsibilities and accountabilities: 

1. To provide excellent services to the students
2. Organizes and administer the students’ records, registration and graduation functions, including transcript evaluations
3. Supervises the coordination, the evaluation and the certification of graduation applications and oversee the complete graduation process 
4. Liaises with University partners
5. Cultivates good relationships with students, and addresses their needs in administration-related matters and career development
6. Responds to inquiries, from parents and/or students, the public and other educational institutions. 
7. Manages and oversees the student enrollment and deferment status, and generate a termly Enrollment Report
8. Oversees Academic Timetable planning
9. Ensures efficiency of the Administration and Student Services Department
10. Communicate with MOEYs on matters pertaining to the college.
Job Requirement:
1. Degree in Business Administration or equivalent
2. Have sense of urgency in meeting deadline 
3. Possess good interpersonal, presentation and communication skills.
4. Dynamic with pleasant disposition

* Interested candidates who enjoy working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment are invited to send in a detailed resume (stating current and expected salaries) along with a recent photograph to joetan@raffles.education

(We regret that only short listed candidates will be notified)

FaceLine Cambodia is specialized in providing the best results to satisfy your beauty and aesthetics need in ways that avoid harsh and potentially harmful effects of plastic surgery using non-invasive techniques.
Dermatology, to Cosmetics, and everything about skin care. Faceline only chooses leading industry experts, along with well tested premium cosmetic brands and advanced technological innovations to help our clients get their desired natural look.
Our goal is to help solve skin problems, avoid wrinkles, delay aging, fight acne, increase skin vitality, revitalize dull aged skin, erase blemishes, accelerate your natural skin regeneration, to give you that firm, soft and younger looking skin, as safe and as painless as possible.
Faceline is a beauty and aesthetic skin care clinic that would make you Look Younger Without Plastic Surgery. 
We are currently looking for qualified candidate to fulfil the position of Nurse (Skin Clinic).

•Assist all medical Supports in Clinic
•Do other tasks as require by Doctor

•Good spoken English and Khmer. If speak other Languages is an advantages.

•Interpersonal and human relations skills

job title: Electrical Engineer (ជាងភ្លើង និង​ទឹក)
position: Electrical Engineer (ជាងភ្លើង និង​ទឹក)
Job Description:
•​ ដំឡើង ជួសជុស ថែទាំ និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ ការប្តូរឧបករណ៍អគ្គីសនី ខ្សែភ្លើង ឲ្យស្របតាមបទដ្ឋានបច្ចេកទេសអគ្គីសនី ។
• ធ្វើតេស្តិ៍នូវឧបករណ៍អគ្គីសនីផ្សេងៗគ្នា ដើម្បីកំណត់នូវបញ្ហាមិនប្រក្រតីនៃអគ្គីសនី ។
• ផ្តល់ការគាំទ្រសម្រាប់ការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងថែទាំប្រព័ន្ធទឹក អាងហែលទឹក ម៉ូទ័របូបទឹក ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ អំពូលភ្លើង ប្រព័ន្ធ   ផ្តល់សញ្ញាអាសន្ននៃអគ្គីសនី (Fire Alarms) និងប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គីសនីផ្សេងៗទៀត ដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ ។
• ត្រូវធានាថា រាល់ប្រព័ន្ធបណ្តាញអគ្គីសនី និងប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ត្រូវបានអនុវត្តតាមស្តង់ដាសុវត្ថិភាព ។
• ត្រូវធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យជាប្រចាំនៃស្ថានភាពគុណភាពសម្ភារ និងឧបករណ៍ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គីស និងទឹក នៃ អាគាររបស់ អាណាគ្រុប ដើម្បីធានាថា សម្ភារត្រូវបានការពារ និងថែទាំឲ្យបានល្អប្រសើរ ។
• ធានាថា រាល់ឧបករណ៍សម្ភារ ត្រូវបានថែទាំសំអាត និងទុកដាក់បានយ៉ាងល្អ ។
• ត្រូវបង្ហាញវត្តមាន ២៤ម៉/២៤ម៉ រាល់ពេលមានតម្រូវការពីក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
• បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗ តាមតម្រូវការចាំបាច់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ។
Job Requirement:
• តម្រូវការមានកំរិតវប្បធម៌ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង និង វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈបច្ចេកទេសផ្នែកអគ្គិសនី
• មានបទពិសោធន៍ និងជំនាញផ្នែកអគ្គីសនី និងផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធទឹក ២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជាកម្មវិធី Word, Excel, Power Point និង Email
• ចេះអាន និង ចេះសរសេរ
• អាចធ្វើការទៅតាមពេលវាលា និងទីកន្លែងដែលបានចាត់តាំង
• មានការតាំងចិត្តខ្ពស់និងអាកប្បកិរិយាវិជ្ជមាន
• ស្មោះត្រង់, ខិតខំធ្វើការងារ, មានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនិងធ្វើការជាក្រុម
• ធ្វើការក្រោមគំនាប និងម៉ោងការងារអាចបត់បែន២៤ម៉/២៤ម៉ រាល់ពេលមានតម្រូវការពីក្រុមហ៊ុន

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information Keo Bunthoeun  016 698 602 / 088 222 8261 bunthoeun.keo@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 016 698 602 / 088 222 8261

Job Description:
-	Ensure timely resolution and response to customers
-	Follow up on the outstanding bookings & handle query resolution
-	Record and report the performance of the designated set of Customers and that can help provide suitable recommendations on Service delivery wins or Service failures
-	Ensure shipping documents are delivered on time

-	Assist manager to conduct market research to get obtain new customers.

-	Good team player and Interpersonal skill 
-	Well organized when working under pressure

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description:
Maintenance 
- Responsible to lead the equipment reliability inclusive maintenance activities at dedicated area as per Maintenance COM
- Responsible for maintenance KPI example OEE, B&D, WO creation & completion, % PM, and total maintenance cost/HL within agreed target
- Responsible for work order (WO) scoping, prioritization, quality of work order detail, distribute of work orders, and the effective follow up and closing out of work orders
- To assign work and manpower scheduling with line responsible through work order system
- To review technician skills matrix and roles from time to time
- Responsible for COM audit with maintenance manager 
- To lead line responsible and communication with production line leader for any production plan and OEE improvement 
- Implement and review WI, SMP & OPL
- To attend daily packaging PMS meeting at related area and escalate breakdown issue during maintenance PMS board
- Weekly meeting with production line leader for maintenance service windows and TBM activities
- Provide and conduct weekly performance evaluation and plan for improvement by RCA or advanced problem solving 
- To carry the overhaul planning, manpower scheduling, spare part list, and review as per COM 
- Troubleshoot and attend for any breakdown even off office hour
- Well maintain all maintenance documents and records system
- To contact OEM for any downtime and spare part detail 
- workshop management

Quality 
- Practice GMP, understand HACCP process and food safety risk
- Apply toolbox hygiene standard and workshop area cleanliness
- To monitor/improve rejection from line within agreed rate which reduce wastage
- Support QC for quality activities

CE 
- Leading and participating in various maintenance improvement project based on Lead TPM
- Ensures ideas of continues improvement are captures
- Update any new ideas into work instructions, OPL and SMP
- Key drive implementation of Lead TPM activities example 5S, Gemba Kaizen, PMS and problem solving at maintenance area
- Support production and maintenance for AM, PM and SMED
Job Requirement:
1. Bachelor/ Engineering degree in mechanical, process engineering, electrical engineering, or relevant areas.
2. Knowledge of maintenance standards and maintenance system
3. English (spoken and written) – an advantage.
4. Willing to learn and drive for results
5. Good interpersonal skill, able to communicate, work together to all level and empowering people
6. Innovative in problem solving
7. Basic technological skill: Microsoft Office software like Excel, Outlook, Word, PowerPoint, and more
8. Able to work under pressure
Company Profile: Cambrew Ltd.  the largest and most modern brewery in the country, produces a variety of national and international beer, stout, soft drink and water. Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
Cambodia Airports develops and manages Cambodia’s network of international airports located in Phnom Penh, Siem Reap, and Sihanoukville. Its teams plan and design the development of airport infrastructure, build and maintain the facilities, handle commercial activities and provides services to stakeholders, including The Royal Government of Cambodia, passengers, airlines, and tenants.

Since its inception in 1995, Cambodia Airports has generated immense economic and social benefits for Cambodia by connecting the country to the world. Its leadership in airport development and operations translates in advanced working environment, staff benefit, and Corporate Social Responsibility policies.

The team of Panda Bank is composed of top bankers, security experts and software and hardware technology elites. By analyzing the path from the first coin to the Internet Financial Group, it provides a forward-looking basic service platform and widely accepted ideal financial lifestyle. We are committed to providing high-quality financial services that are easy to operate, safe and reliable, convenient and efficient, to benefit sharing to customers around the world through technological innovation capabilities, and become the world's leading digital bank.Panda Commercial Bank是一家旨在为世界带来领先金融科技服务的创新金融企业，公司团队由顶尖的银行家、安全领域专家和软硬件科技精英组成，通过分析从第一枚硬币到互联网金融的路径，提供前瞻性的基础服务平台和广泛接受的理想金融生活方式。Panda Bank致力于通过科技创新能力，向全球客户提供操作简单、安全可靠、方便快捷、利益共享的优质金融服务，成为全球领先的数字银行。

•	ធ្វើការវាយតម្លៃលើការអនុវត្តការងាររបស់បុគ្គលិក-កម្មករ
•	សម្ភាសន៍កាងារបុគ្គលិក-កម្មករ
•	ធ្វើការបណ្ដុះបណ្ដាលបុគ្គលិក
•	ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយស្ថាប័នខាងក្រៅ
•	ចូលរួមមតិយោបល់ដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍន៍ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	ការងារផ្សេងៗតាមការចាត់ចែងពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
•	ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រឡើង
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច3ឆ្នាំផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល និង ធនធានមនុស្ស
•	ស្មោះត្រង់ និង ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមនិងមានឆន្ទ:ក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ
•	មានទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ 
•	ចំណេះដឹងទូទៅអំពីរច្បាប់ការងារ និង ច្បាប់គោលការណ៍ផ្សេងៗទាក់ទងនិងការគ្រប់គ្រងបុគ្គលិក-កម្មករ
•	ចេះប្រើកុំព្យូទ័រMS-Office អ៊ីមែលអ៊ីនធឺណេត
•	ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែប្រសើរ

job title: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផលិតកម្ម (Production Supervisor) ចំនួន(03) នាក់ (បន្ទាន់)
position: អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផលិតកម្ម (Production Supervisor) ចំនួន(03) នាក់ (បន្ទាន់)
Job Description:
•	រៀបចំផែនការផលិតកម្មប្រចាំខែ
•	តាមដានការផលិត អោយតាមស្តង់ដារ ឬការណែនាំ
•	ចាត់ចែងបុគ្គលិក កម្មករ ក្នុងរោងផលិតកម្មដើម្បីការងារមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាព
•	ធ្វើការវាយតម្លៃ កែលំអរ ការអនុវត្តន៍ការងាររបស់ក្រុមផលិតកម្ម
•	ទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់គ្រឿងបន្លាស់ធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ
•	ទទួលផែនការផ្សេងៗពីអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
•មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងចង្វាក់ផលិតកម្មក្នុងរោងផលិតកម្មឧស្សាហកម្មយ៉ាងតិច 1ឆ្នាំ
•	មានការយល់ដឹងខ្លះៗពីមេកានិច និង អគ្គិសនី
•	ស្មោះត្រង់ និងឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ
•	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ និងរៀនយកអ្វីដែលថ្មី
•	បើចេះប្រើកុំព្យូទ័រ (MS-Office, អ៊ីម៉ែល អ៊ីនធឺណេត)
•	ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេសកាន់តែប្រសើរ
* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖

job title: ផ្នែកលក់ និង ទីផ្សារ (Sale) ចំនួន (10) នាក់ (បន្ទាន់)
position: ផ្នែកលក់ និង ទីផ្សារ (Sale) ចំនួន (10) នាក់ (បន្ទាន់)
Job Description:
•	លក់អោយគ្រប់ថាកេត (Target)
•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍លក់ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	តាមដានព័ត៌មានទីផ្សារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	ធ្វើការសង្កេតព័ត៌មានទីផ្សារ (Survey) នៃផលិតផលដែលក្រុមហ៊ុនមាន
•	រក្សាអតិថិជនដែលមានស្រាប់ និងស្វែងរកអតិថិជនថ្មី
•	បង្កើតបណ្ដាញចែកចាយ និងបណ្ដាញក្នុងតំបន់ទទួលខុសត្រូវ
•	ថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិ ក្រុមហ៊ុនដែលប្រគល់ឲ្យអនុវត្តការងារ
Job Requirement:
•	មានបទពិសោធិ៍ធ្វើជាអ្នកលក់ (ទាក់ទងប្លាស្ទិច)
•	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ (មូលដ្ឋានគ្រឹះកុំព្យូទ័រ)
•	មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ ឆ្លាតវៃ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម
•	អត់ធ្មត់នឹងសម្ពាធការងារ
•	អាចចុះលក់តាមខេត្តបាន

job title: ជាងជួសជុលម៉ូតូ ចំនួន(05) នាក់
position: ជាងជួសជុលម៉ូតូ ចំនួន(05) នាក់
Job Description:
•	ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍នៃការត្រួតពិនិត្យម៉ូតូប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
•	កត់ត្រាការជួសជុលថែទាំម៉ូតូ រម៉ក
•	ធ្វើការជួសជុលគ្រឿងម៉ាស៊ីនទាំងអស់
•	មានទំនាក់ទំនងជាមួយអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់គ្រឿងបន្លាស់
Job Requirement:
•	ចេះជួសជុលម៉ូតូកំលាំង110-125cc ទាំងផ្នែកម៉ាស៊ីន និង ភ្លើង
•	មានចំណេះដឹងគ្រឿងបន្លាស់ម៉ូតូ/មេកានិច
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច1ឆ្នាំ
•	ចេះផ្សារ បាញ់ថ្នាំ
•	ចេះអាន សរសេរអក្សរខ្មែរ
•	ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម និងមានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការងារ
•	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ និងរៀនយកអ្វីដែលថ្មី
* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖
• ប្រាក់ខែអាចចរចាបាន
* សូមផ្ញើប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបនិងប្រាក់ខែដែលចង់បានតាមរយះទូរស័ព្ទទំនាក់ទំនង 011-344-446 / 097 7774597

job title: ផ្នែកអ្នកកាន់ម៉ាស៊ីន (Machin Operator)
position: ផ្នែកអ្នកកាន់ម៉ាស៊ីន (Machin Operator)
Job Description:
•	គ្រប់គ្រងដំណើរការម៉ាស៊ីន អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមការណែនាំ
•	ពិនិត្យគុណភាពផលិតផល ដែលម៉ាស៊ីនផលិតចេញមក
•	ថែទាំសំអាតម៉ាស៊ីន
•	តាមដានដំណើរការផលិត និងកែតម្រូវម៉ាស៊ីនអោយដើរបានល្អ
•	ពិនិត្យតាមដានអំពីដំណើរការម៉ាស៊ីន
Job Requirement:
•	រៀនចប់ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្ររង ផ្នែកមេកានិច ឬ អគ្គិសនី 
•	ឬអ្នកមានបទពិសោធន៍លើការងារបញ្ជាម៉ាស៊ីន នៅក្នុងរោងចក្រឧស្សាហកម្ម 2ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
•	មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន សុខភាពល្អ
* អត្ថប្រយោជន៍៖
• ប្រាក់ខែទទួលបានចន្លោះពី 400$-500$ ក្នុងមួយខែ

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - 1-2 Year experiences of working in an administrative support role.- Experience of, or a familiarity with, the full recruitment and selection cycle.- Working in a multi-site business.- A high level of attention to detail.- Proficient in MS Office, especially Word and Excel.- Experience of posting material on websites.- A tech savvy person is more preferred.- Good verbal and written communication skills both Khmer and English.- The ability to work on own initiative and also collaboratively within a team.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: សន្តិសុខ​​ | Security Guard
position: សន្តិសុខ​​ | Security Guard
Job Description: ការទទួលខុសត្រូវ1.ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងថែរក្សាសន្តិសុខសុវត្ថិភាពក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន2.មានការសហការគ្នារវាងក្រុមការងារបានល្អ3.ចេះអង្កេតមើលសុវត្ថិភាពនៅក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន4.ត្រូវគោរពតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង5.គោរពពេលវេលាបំពេញការងារ6.គ្រប់គ្រងនិងថែរក្សាយាន្តជំនិះ ទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និង បុគ្គលិក ក្នុងម៉ោងបំពេញការងារឲ្យបានល្អ7.កត់ត្រាអត្តសញ្ញាណរបស់អតិថិជន ឬ ភ្ញៀវដែលចេញ-ចូល8.កត់ត្រាឥវ៉ាន់ដែលផ្ញើចេញ-ចូល9.រក្សាសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ក្រុមហ៊ុននៅមុខការិយាល័យ10.សម្រួលកន្លែងចំណតរថយន្តរបស់ភ្ញៀវ និងបុគ្គលិកឲ្យមានសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ល្អ11.ស្នើសុំឲ្យភ្ញៀវដែលមានអាវុធជាប់ខ្លួន ផ្ញើអាវុធទុកនៅនឹងតុសន្តិសុខទើបអនុញ្ញាតឲ្យចូលក្នុងបរិវេណក្រុមហ៊ុន12.ត្រូវរាយការណ៍ជូនអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងផ្ទាល់ជាបន្ទាន់ អំពីសភាពការណ៍មិនប្រក្រតីទាំងឡាយ ដែលអាចមានហានិភ័យចំពោះក្រុមហ៊ុន ឬ បុគ្គលិក។
Job Requirement: លក្ខខណ្ឌតម្រូវ- ត្រូវមានអត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណសញ្ជាតិខ្មែរ - មានទីលំនៅច្បាស់លាស់- មិនធ្លាប់ ប្រើប្រាស់គ្រឿងញៀន- មានបទពិសោធន៍ក្នុងតួនាទីយ៉ាងតិច ៦ខែ - មិនធ្លាប់មានប្រវត្តិ ប្រព្រឹត្តបទល្មើសផ្សេងៗ- មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាមក្នុងការធ្វើការ- ត្រូវមានអាយុចាប់ពី ១៨ ឆ្នាំ ទៅ ៤០ ឆ្នាំ- ចេះអាន និងសរសេរ ភាសាខ្មែរ (រឹតតែល្អប្រសើរ)

Job Requirement: 1. រៀនចប់មធ្យមសិក្សា2. មានបទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកទទួលភ្ញៀវ និង / ឬ បទពិសោធន៏ផ្នែកសំអាត3. ចេះសរសេរ និងអានភាសារខ្មែរ, អាចនិយាយភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន កាន់តែប្រសើរ4. មានបទពិសោធន៏ក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ឧបករណ៏ និងផលិតផលសម្អាត5. អាចបទបែននៃម៉ោងធ្វើការរួមទាំងចុងសប្ដាហ៏និងថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាកផ្សេងៗ

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    HEAD OF PROCUREMENTREPORTS TO:   CFOLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Maintaining relationships with suppliers while continually scouting for     additional vendors.2.  Communicating with management regularly regarding the efficient flow of     goods and services affecting production.3.  Conducting cost analyses and setting benchmarks for improvement.4.  Developing risk management procedures to mitigate losses in the event of     product shortages.5.  Supervising a purchasing team and delegating tasks across departments when     necessary.6.  Directing, optimizing and coordinating full order cycle.7.  Liaising and negotiating with suppliers, manufacturers, retailers and     consumers.8.  Keep track of quality, quantity, stock levels, delivery times, transport     costs efficiency 9. Strategizing, planning and enforcing the import     activities as per request.10. Overall responsibility for Purchasing and Cost Estimating activities across     the business.11. Create and implement best practice purchasing vision, strategy, policies,     processes, and procedures to aid and improve business performance.12. Ensure that purchasing strategies and processes are in place to meet     business objectives and operational needs in terms of price, quality, and     delivery targets.13. Contribute to overall business strategy and annual budget process.14. Provide leadership to departments under control. Coach, mentor and develop     direct reports and manage a high performing team that delivers continuous     improvement, added value and cost reductions.15. Set department objectives and monitor ongoing progress and performance.16. Other duties set direct by executives.

Proficiency in Microsoft office. 4.  Proficiency in English language both speaking and writing. 5.  Good interaction and organization skills.6.  Record of successful distribution and logistics management.7.  Demonstrable ability to lead and manage staffs.8.  Proficient in standard logistics software.9.  Excellent analytical, problem solving and organizational skills. 10. Ability to work independently and handle multiple projects.

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    ASSISTANT TO CFOREPORTS TO:   CFO LOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1. Coordinate in monthly closing and other reports to analyze     company’s financial position vs. budget.4.  Achieve operational objectives by contributing information and     recommendations to strategic plans and reviews, preparing and     completing action plans.5. job title: អ្នកកាន់ផេក ( FB and Boost Page  )
position: អ្នកកាន់ផេក ( FB and Boost Page  )
Job Description:
** ការទទួលខុសត្រូវចម្បងចំពោះការងារ៖
•	ចេះគ្រប់គ្រងទំព័រហ្វេកប៊ុក/ផេក វេបសាយ / Instagram យូធូប។ល។
•	បង្កើត និងផលិតវីដេអូ និងរូបភាព (poster) ផ្សេងៗដើម្បីប្រើប្រាស់ និងបង្ហោះនៅក្នុងទំព័រហ្វេកប៊ុក/ផេក វេបសាយ/ Instagram /យូធូប។
•	សរសេរអត្ថបទខ្លីៗសម្រាប់បង្ហោះនៅក្នុងទំព័រហ្វេកប៊ុក/ផេក / Instagram និងវេបសាយរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន
•	អនុវត្តការងារសម្រាប់ប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយបណ្តាញសង្គម (Social Media) ឲ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាពដែលផ្អែកលើផែនការប្រចាំខែដែលបានកំណត់។
Job Requirement:
•	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ (Communication and Media)
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធផ្សព្វផ្សាយ (ហ្វេកប៊ុក/ផេក វេបសាយ Instagram និងយូធូប) កាត់ត វីដេអូ និងរចនារូបភាពផ្សេងសម្រាប់ (poster)
•	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័រដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធនឹងការកាត់តវីដេអូ និងរចនារូបភាពផ្សេងៗ (poster) ឧទាហរណ៍ កម្មវិធី Adobe Premiere, Adobe Illustrator, Adobe Photoshop, Adobe Light Room ។ល។
•	មានចំណេះដឹងមធ្យមផ្នែកភាសាអង់គ្លេស
•	មានជំនាញក្នុងការប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទង និងសម្របសម្រួល។

** បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមអញ្ជើញផ្ញើប្រវត្ដិរូបសង្ខេប និងពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារមកកាន់ការិយាល័យកណ្តាលរបស់យើងខ្ញុំដោយផ្ទាល់នៅផ្ទះលេខ ០៤ ផ្លូវលេខ ២៤២ សង្កាត់ចតុមុខ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ ភ្នំពេញ។

Job Description: JOB TITLE:    FINANCE MANAGERREPORTS TO:   MANAGING DIRECTORLOCATION:     PHNOM PENHSALARY RANGE: NEGOTIABLE1.  Participates in maintaining ongoing relationship with the bank reports.2. Develop and maintain the company’s policies and set up SOP. 3. Establish, implement, and maintain effective accounts receivable processes, procedures and controls to insure timely collection of receivables.4. Preparation of the yearly financial statements including footnotes as one of the primary responsibilities, along with all major audit schedules. 5. Prepares and recommends adjustments to monthly financials 6. Prepares companywide annual budget. 7. Preparation of monthly financial reporting package to include balance sheet, income statement, work in process, and job costing schedules, variance to budget, cash flow forecast, breakeven analysis and backlog. 8. Oversight of project accounting to ensure accuracy of cost ledgers. 9. Monitors the capital expenditures and asset deployment activities and allocation of costs associated with these expenditures. 10. Monitors the Company’s internal control environment to ensure compliance. 11. Establishes and maintains systems and controls which verify the integrity of all systems, processes and data. 12. Assists with implementation of changes and improvement in automated financial and management information systems for the company. 13. Oversees the preparation of all related payroll tax reports and other necessary reporting requirements. 14. Reviews Organization’s benefit offerings and advises managements on recommendation for changes. 15. Responsible for coordination and preparation of information needed for various audits.
Job Requirement: 1. BA in Finance, Business, Accounting, Economics, MBA, CPA certification, are preferred as advantages. 2. Experience 5+ years in a leadership role in accounting and finance with construction industry. 3. Experience 2+ years in public accounting is preferred. 4. Strong general ledger, accounts payable, accounts receivable, payroll, income tax and bank working knowledge. 5. Strong analytical, problem solving, management and organizational skills. 6. Strong interpersonal, presentation skills, ability to influence and negotiate. 7. Strong ability to be detail oriented and work with a goal of precision. 8. Strong time management skills and ability to meet deadlines in a complete manner. 9. Ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously and prioritize. 10. Strong computer skills including Microsoft Office Suite, Excel, Outlook, Power Point. 11. Prepare tax information required for corporate tax returns and other tax filings. 12. Recruiting, training, supervising and evaluating department staff.

Job Description:
Under the supervision of Building Manager, this role’s responsibilities include:
•	Maintain relations and communication with all owners / tenants at the property you are assigned to. 
•	Provide administration services and support to the building Manager when required. 
•	Provide reports on the property condition from visual inspection.

Quantity surveyors manage the costs on a construction project. 2.  Help to ensure that the construction project is completed within its     projected budget. 3.  Up-to-date all reports from engineers at site.4.  Calculate and compare quantities between reports of quantities performed at     the worksite.5.  Feedback of computational results to project manager.6.  Keep relevant legal documents such as contracts signed plans from the     project owner.7.  Calculate the cost of labor and prepared the document payment or percentage     payment (to subcontractors).8.  Calculate the cost of work and make a backup payment of the contract with     the contractor.9.  Propose a plan to conduct a site visit at any time when it is necessary. 10. Sum up the volume of project implementation, based on the overall     conditions, for reporting project volumes and payments to project manager.11. Forecast the cost of the different materials needed for the project.12. Cooperate with site engineer and designer to be evaluate the process growth     at site construction.13. Prepare tender documents, contracts, budgets, bills of quantities and other     documentation.14. Procure or agree the services of contractors and/or subcontractors who work     on the construction of the project.15. Liaise with the client and other construction professionals, such as project     managers and site engineers.16. Preparing reports directly to Project Manager.

Willing to work overtime and may be required to work in shifts.

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities

a.	Services to the Schools - Campuses and Departments 

i.	Support the ISP teachers to facilitate students’ learning whenever the subject teachers are not around including behavioral management, classroom organization, and preparation of materials as discussed with the subject teacher.
ii.	Support and manage the students daily activities in the classroom, during lunch time, during entrance and/or exit, during recess or extra curricular activities based on the schedule and hours provided by Administration.
iii.	Track student attendance and class schedules, set up necessary material for classes (e.g. projectors, zoom meetings etc.), in consultation and collaboration with the teachers and ISP management. 
iv.	Escort and supervise students during field trips and special school activities, under the direct supervision of the principal or ISP management.
v.	Be available to speak with parents before or after classes, or when called upon by the school management.
vi.	Maintain facilities, resources, and materials in the secondary classroom and the school.
vii.	Attend all school sponsored functions that occur during regular school hours, such as opening ceremony, graduation ceremony, staff meeting and professional development sessions.
viii.	Perform other reasonable administrative tasks as requested by the school management, aiming at supporting student learning and continuing to develop professionally.

b.	Services to the parents and students 

i.	 Be available for Parent-Teacher conferences at the end of each semester to discuss the semester’s progress which generally occur outside of working hours on a weekend.
ii.	 Respond to parents or initiate any contact deemed necessary throughout the school year which includes keeping records and informing staff of outcomes.
iii.	Provide care and ensure the safety and well-being of every child in the school with adequate supervision of a safe recreation and play period for the students during class break times.
iv.	Speak and behave in a professional manner towards all parents, students and staff of Footprints School.

c.	Health, Safety and Child Protection

i.	Conduct regular “risk assessments” in consultation and collaboration with the ISP management, faculties and staff.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements
●	Cambodian national
●	Bachelor Degree in Education with high-level English proficiency.  
●	Solid experience in Teaching and Learning Support 
●	At least 2-year experience in working in the education sector or international schools
●	Skillful in the use of Computer and ICT appliances and their features, particularly Google and G-Suite features.  
●	roof of reputable personal and professional integrity and records.
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEW- Build and deepen relationships with existing Priority Customers to achieve increase in share of wallet and revenues.- Provide professional customer service to achieve a high percentage of customer satisfaction and retention.- Serve as the one-point contact to the High Net Worth customers of the Bank SALES- Generate new business to achieve defined targets in terms of no. of customers, volumes and revenue for the segment- Achieve “best in class” productivity in order to maximize the efficacy of the sales process.- Aggressive Sales call plans to acquire large prospective customers through referrals.- Ensure coverage of customer base in accordance with the approved contact plans.- Update & maintain all Sales MIS (Calls, Prospects, Business done, etc.)- Responsible for the primary duty to increase the customer base by attracting more loan customers.- Responsible for all the steps necessary to process the loan appraisal of every loan application, inspecting customers’ business regularly at site and follow-up on collateral issues according to the rules and regulation of the Bank- Monitoring daily work timely and effectively, loan files have to be up to date and current to ensure its high quality, NPL have to be closely monitored and rehabilitate and NPL ratio kept at an acceptable level. All bank assets and liabilities related to loans, guarantees confirmation and other loan products need to be properly documented, recorded and accounted for.- Report monthly result of work pertaining to the credit appraisal approval or declination, loan monitoring, checklist matters, NPL loan ratio and loan default in principal and interest to the Head of Credit Department and the Credit Committee through SME Banking Head.- Maintain a close relationship with the customers to ensure that the customer banking needs are met. Take steps to increase the products holding of the customers.- Monitoring daily loan late by pushing ROs to closely follow up on time payment.- Monitor and check regularly on customers concerning the use of loan, business situation, loan contract terms, the repayment of loan, the completeness of documentation on time and to process possible extension of the loan before due date within 7 working days.- Resolve every issues and quires of the customers related to the loan procedures andformalities- Provide support to the customer as much as possible to procure loans and by helping themwith paperwork- Provide training/coaching to the new ROs hiring to adapt of the bank implementation/regulation- Sharing the new Memo information of the bank to all staff under my supervision- Lead marketing resources to generate new customers and clients for the Bank as group and team.- Keep proper records and look into customer complaints- Execute other related duties as assigned by line supervisors or requested.
Job Requirement: - Hold Bachelor's degree of Management, Accounting,- At least 4 years experiences in banks or MFIs;- Understand about vision, mission, core values, regulations, and other principles of SME Bank of Cambodia;** Skills & Abilities- Be a good team player with a sense of responsibility and adaptability;- Working knowledge of administrative functions in an operational environment e.g. budgets, personnel administration;- Demonstrated experience in managing and motivating a team;- Strong analytical, interpersonal, communication and influencing skills;- Ability to use initiative, prioritize, multi-task, and work well under pressure to meet deadlines;- Ability to delegate effectively amongst teams and show commitment to the long-term development of the management team through coaching and mentoring;- Broad understanding how bank operates and customer service manager workflowOthers- Be a Cambodia citizen with a strong background in Banking and Financial Management;- Be high integrity, accountability, and commitment;- Be respectful;- Demonstrate sound professional ethic.

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.

Job Description: About FUXINA member of ISI GROUP, FUXIN is Cambodia’s first pre-engineered steel buildings manufacturer for industrial application, commercial and retail outlets, storage, logistics, sports, and leisure structures. Fuxin is a leader in supplying steel building solutions that are more superior in quality, more cost efficient, time saving and environmentally sustainable.Want more information? Visit us @Home - FuxinFUXIN invites you to join us as our Procurement Supervisor responsible and accountable for the purchase of goods, materials, and services to ensure that the company’s operational needs are met, taking into account price, quality and delivery, and to ensure continuity of supply.Your main accountabilities will be:•	Ensure purchasing policy, guidelines and any associated documents are in place and         updated when required•	Manage relationship with suppliers, select and develop new suppliers•	Negotiate and manage contract terms with suppliers to ensure value for money,         quality standards and delivery terms with technical and operational input from         stakeholders and colleagues•	Assess tenders from potential suppliers•	Input to and hold responsibility for department budget•	Other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor’s degree in civil engineering/business management or equivalent•	At least 3 years of work experience in purchasing management in construction         procurement•	Good command of English, knowledge in Chinese is a plus.•	Skill in project management, teamwork, analyzing, problem-solving, negotiation and         communication•	Skill in MS Office, internet and Email, and other purchasing system required.Competitive offer:•	Annual Salary Increment•	Annual Performance Bonus•	Learning and Development•	Lunch •	Coffee•	Group Personal Accident Insurance ( Forte )•	Working Accident and Health care Insurance ( NSSF )•	Company Events•	Uniforms•	Other terms and conditions follow to Company’s internal policy.Notice: Only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for an interview.
Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Job Description: We are looking for a resilient, empathic business development executive to contribute to the growth of our company. Business development executives are responsible for finding and retaining clients, encouraging extant clients to purchase added products or features, and remaining abreast of changes in consumption. You will also be required to build capacity in staff through regular training and mentorship.To be successful as a business development executive, you should attend networking events with the intention of attracting and retaining clientele. Ultimately, an outstanding business development executive will keep a close eye on clients' feedback to ensure that our products and services always exceed expectations.Responsibilities:- Familiarizing yourself with all products and services offered by our company.-Procuring new clients through direct contact, word-of-mouth, and collaboration with the marketing department.- Attending networking activities to research and connect with prospective clients.- Maintaining meaningful relationships with existing clients to ensure that they are retained.- Suggesting upgrades or added products and services that may be of interest to clients.- Crafting business proposals and contracts to draw in more revenue from clients.- Negotiating with clients to secure the most attractive prices.- Equipping staff with the technical and social skills needed to enhance sales.- Reviewing clients' feedback and implementing necessary changes.- Remaining in tune with trends in consumption to ensure that our offerings remain relevant.

Job Description: We are looking for an accomplished business development analyst to improve our company's strategies and competitiveness under the supervision of our business development managers. As a business development analyst, your duties will include evaluating our operations, improving sales revenue, and building a sustainable customer base.To be successful in this role, you should exhibit an extensive track record in business development. First-class business development analyst capitalize on lucrative business opportunities and increase market share.Business Development Analyst Responsibilities:- Analyzing business operations and strategies to identify new opportunities.- Identifying cost reductions to increase sales revenue.Reporting findings and obtaining approval from senior management, when required.- Adding value to product offerings to increase sales.Evaluating and improving sales strategies, as well as identifying new customers.- Writing proposals and liaising with other departments to align strategies.- Analyzing consumer behavior to meet product demand and preferences.- Performing competitor analysis toward an increased market share.- Implementing efficient customer communication and feedback channels.- Identifying and negotiating sales deals that promote sustained income.
Job Requirement: -Bachelor's degree in business development, marketing, or similar.Master of business administration degree (MBA) preferred.- Previous experience as a business development analyst in a related industry.- Proficiency in integrated business management and CRM software, including ProWorkflow and SalesForce.- Advanced knowledge of business development and sales strategies.- Experience in identifying profitable business opportunities and potential clients.- Proven ability to increase competitiveness and market share.- Ability to develop and maintain strong customer relations.- Competency in researching sales leads, presenting proposals, and negotiating deals.- Ability to advise on strategic industry partnerships.- Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills.

Job Description:
Job Responsibilities

The focus of the programme Principal role is supporting students’ and teachers’ social-emotional wellbeing as well as personal and academic growth. She/he ensures the quality of the programme service deliveries in three main areas: curriculum, instruction and assessment across all campuses. 

As a key educational leader and a member of the senior management team of the school, the programme principal is expected to lead the programme cohort by example as follows:  

A.	Setting Directions
●	Building a shared vision in accordance with the foundational statements, the school’s values and the SLOs.
●	Developing and monitoring the schoolwide action plan.
●	Managing demands and expectations.
●	Communicating and modelling the school’s values of Compassion, Determination and Responsibility.

B.	Building Relationships and Developing People
●	Providing support and demonstrating consideration for individual staff members.
●	Stimulating growth in the professional capacities of staff.
●	Building trusting relationships with and among staff, students and parents.

C.	Developing the Organisation to Support Desired Practice
●	Building collaborative cultures and distributing leadership.
●	Structuring the organisation to facilitate collaboration.
●	Building supportive relationships with families and the community.
●	Connecting the school to the wider environment.
●	Maintaining a safe and healthy environment.
●	Allocating resources in support of the school’s vision and goals.

D.	Improving the Instructional Programme
●	Staffing the instructional programme.
●	Providing instructional support according to the principles of Trust-based Observations.
●	Using data to monitor progress in student learning and school improvement.
●	Creating a learning culture of care, respect and compassion.

E.	Securing Accountability
●	Building staff members’ sense of internal accountability.
●	Meeting the demands for external accountability.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirements 
●	Master's Degree in Education/Educational Administration or Business Administration or similar qualifications.  
●	English as a first language or proof of professional English proficiency.
●	Experience in teaching. 
●	Experience in school leadership positions.
●	Experience in Curriculum Management, Accreditation and business compliance is a plus. 
●	Proof of reputable personal and professional integrity and records.
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   011 555 407 hr@footprintsschool.edu.kh St. 135, No 84, Tuol Tompung, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 011 555 407

Job Description:
Job Responsibility

●	Communicate with the students, parents, teachers and offices and supervise the students to ensure that they check in and check out properly for their classes.  

●	Work with classroom teachers to deliver lessons based on the set curriculum, including lesson planning and preparation, conducting learning and reading group activities, behavioral management, classroom organization and management as well as the use of materials.

●	Assist the assigned teacher in supervising an individual or a group of students during break time, play time, field trips other and recreational activities.    

●	Work with all stakeholders including teachers, parents, learning support team and the school management to assist students with special needs in their individual learning and inclusion programs. 

●	Take turns to carry out supporting duties such as nap time duty, meal time duty and playground duty as requested and scheduled by the management.

●	Attend meetings, training sessions, professional development activities and school events per schedule.  

●	Assist in the organization of the Parent-Teacher Conferences at the end of each term. 

●	Help to effectively maintain and manage the classroom facilities, resources, and materials. 

●	Strictly follow the school’s child protection policy.
Job Requirement:
Job Requirement 

●	Cambodian national
●	University-level education, continuing or graduated, preferably in the field of education, law, international relation, science, social science and psychology.  
●	Demonstrated communication, teamwork and independent thinking skills.   
●	High-level of English proficiency   
●	Aspired to work in the field of education, particularly with young children.
●	Adaptable to changes and diverse working environments.
●	Willingness to continue learning and develop a professional career in an educational setting. 
●	Proof of reputable personal and professional integrity and records.

Job Description: We are looking for experienced and flexible Warehouse / Logistic Officers to join the team at Cambodia Airways. The ideal candidate should be located in Cambodia, with experience working within a logistics environment. As a Warehouse/ Logistic Officers you will be responsible for overseeing all of our logistical processes from scheduling shipments to assist in managing inventory control systems and warehouses functions.You must have excellent organizational skills as well as being able plan strategically in order to ensure that projects meet their deadlines on time and within budget constraints. Additionally, it is important that candidates understand customs regulations so they can accurately complete paperwork associated with imports/exports quickly & efficiently when necessary:*** -Process the Local import and export customs clearance requirements of Cambodia Airways- In this role He/She oversees the efficient receipt, storage, and dispatch of a wide range of materials including Rotable, Consumables, Expendable, Raw Materials, Tools and Equipments to support Engineering and Maintenance Department-To support material management division including all aspects of asset management, such as operations support, investment analysis, surplus management, and database management- Other tasks assigned by the manager
Job Requirement: Required Skills:***Process the Local import and export customs clearance requirements of Cambodia Airways-Experience working within a Warehouse logistic environment-Excellent organizational skills-Ability to work under pressure while producing quality results-Strong problem solving ability-Knowledge of customs regulations related import/export procedures-Ability multi-task effectively between multiple teams simultaneously-Adaptable and Flexible to work on shifts and changing environment
Company Profile:
[CAMBODIA AIRWAYS – THE WINGS OF CAMBODIA]
Cambodia Airways Co., Ltd (IATA code KR, ICAO code KME) was registered in Phnom Penh, Cambodia with the registered capital of 200 million US dollars. Cambodia Airways completed the business registration in September 2017 and officially obtained the AOC certificate on July 6th, 2018. Our first commercial flight route between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap was commenced on July 10th, 2018. By the early of November 2019, Cambodia Airways has successfully launched routes from hub in Phnom Penh to Siem Reap & Sihanoukville for domestic flights and to Macao, Fuzhou, Wenzhou, Shenzhen Chengdu and Bangkok for international flights. The Cambodia Airways logo design is inspired by the Angkor Wat temple, which is an iconic structure in Cambodia and the largest monument of its kind in the world. A symbol of the temple appears on the national flag of the Kingdom of Cambodia and we are proud to bear it into the clouds, as representatives of our unique and beautiful nation.

Company Profile:
Established in 1977, Pantos Logistics has grown steadily to become the No. 1 logistics business in Korea. Pantos now is under  LG Group , and we offers services related to export/import, air/ocean/railroad/overland transportation, customs clearance, warehousing, the handling of logistics consultation to customers.
We have made concerted efforts to expand the global logistics operation network, establishing more than 180 overseas networks in 40 countries, including the America, Europe, the CIS countries, Asia, and the Middle East. We plan to increase their number to over 200 overseas networks by 2020.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To act as a role model for the management of the store team.
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To To participate in the recruitment of personnel in an active and optimal manner.
• To ensure the development of the team towards a high level of knowledge and performance.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To detect the potential of each employee and ensure their development.
• To ensure the optimal management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• To lead the team and correctly and actively manage potential conflict.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To plan the required measures to reach targets.
• To analyze and review management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• To priorities and, during busy periods, dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To ensure the correct execution of administrative tasks.
• To review and apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.).
• To ensure strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To optimize resources and try to minimize expenses e.g. optimization of the workforce, suppliers, etc.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.)
• To ensure and collaborate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To optimise selling space in order to obtain maximum profitability.
• To continuously ensure the correct replenishment of the store.
• To ensure compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Analysis of management indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register program and Pathfinder operation.
• E Leadership qualities – mobilizes and motivates the team.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organization, management and planning.
• Able to analyze and offer solutions.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Prioritization – optimal use of time.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Attachments
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall and Aeon Mall Sen Sok City N/A

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
About this job:

This position is working on managing events such as contacting clients, agencies, designers, influencers, arranging schedules, organizing events, venues, manpower, decoration, and proposing ideas for the events to the management team. Furthermore, you are required to understand how to manage budget plan for cost effectiveness and have good relationships with others. You will be working in Advertising and Event Planning Section, within Marketing and Business Planning Department. You will report your tasks to direct Manager, and General Manager.

Duties and Responsibilities:
•	Managing advertising & events for the Malls 
•	Finding new clients and creating new schemes for generating more income and increase sales
•	Maintaining existing clients, increasing more new clients with effectively communicating and solving problem relate to the events.
Job Requirement:
•	Have experiences relate to event and organizing.
•	Have a bachelor degree in marketing, public relations, or related field.
•	Good at using English for business level.
•	Be a team player and have good behavior. 
•	Be able to propose creative events or attractive activities inside the mall.
•	Support organizing event and support team members.
•	Be able to work with shift schedule. (Including weekend and holiday shift).

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description: - Carry out technical training according to organizational requirements (Classroom & Practical activities).- Perform on the job training sessions in groups or individually in an everyday operating workshop environment.- Produce training schedules and classroom agenda.- Determine areas of concern to address gaps in technician skillset to meet workshop requirements.- Prepare training material (presentations, worksheets etc.)- Arrange for on-site training using external sources when and if required.- Keep and report data on completed courses, absences, issues etc.- Observe and evaluate results of training programs.- Ensure all registered users are completing STARS online training to meet Ford Standards.- Ensure all registered users attend Ford provided classroom and practical training as per Ford Curriculum and Ford Standards.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Company Profile:
Established in the early 1990s, UC has more than 10 years of experience in the construction industries. Stared out in building row shop house in Olympic Market, UC has evolved and move on to build many famous Villas in Boung Keng Kang District. With growing construction industry, UC gets more involved and cooperation with foreign investors and work closely with the government to help build a more vibrant city.
In The year 2000, UC has expanded into the market in Siem Reap building 5 Star Hotels equipped with large Spacious function halls, Khmer style design restaurants and exquisite swimming pools. At the same time, UC also constructed Bopha Angkor Restaurant with a massive area of 4000sqm. by mixing Khmer style Architecture exterior with modern classical interior. Job Description:
*Responsible for managing all aspects of the financial process for the company, support Country Manager on all financial data, analysis, business process, tax and legal IT, day-to-day operations of the business.
including the company’s strategy on accounting.
MANAGEMENT
•	Manage the respective functional teams (AR, credit, pricing, business control, accounting) to provide support to ensure the efficiency of its processes and a strong control posture (assigning job, supervising, coaching, and motivating staff).

BUDGETING
•	Responsible for quarter-end, the bi-annual budgeting includes working with all company managers to develop accurate forecasts.

FINANCE
•	Responsible for the closing of the financial books (statutory and IFRS); ensure the timeliness, accuracy in the entries posted during the closing of the financial books.
•	Responsible for the full P&L and BS as well as all tax and statutory compliance 
•	Responsible for the preparation of monthly, quarterly financial reporting and review decks; ensure timeliness, accuracy, quality of all financial reports.
•	Ensure business governance and internal control, treasury management, risk management, credit management, cost management, budgetary control is in adherence to the company policies and procedures.
•	Serving as a key point of contact and managing preparation and support of all external audits.
•	Serving as key point of contact and managing preparation to provide support to external partners (banks, external auditors, legal & tax adviser, tax department and other government authorities).
•	Coordinating audits and proper filing of tax returns.
•	Developing tools and systems to provide critical accounting and operational information to the COO and making actionable recommendations on both strategy and operations.
•	Developing and managing finance & accounting team.

PLANNING
•	Provide weekly, monthly forecasting of the financial and operational outlook versus the targets; provide explanation on key business drivers based on the business results. 
•	Provide recommendations on actions to be taken to improve the business outlook; independently drive the actions with the respective stakeholders. 
•	Ensure good quality and in-depth analysis (financial & operation) to support recommendations for business decisions; drive ad hoc projects relevant for any investment feasibility studies. 

BANKING
•	Manage day-to-day relationships with banks.
•	Responsible for effective treasury management to maximize group funding.
•	Ensure Group internal control is respected in terms of bank accounts and signatories.
Legal
•	Follow up and report to the Management all legal cases and issues.
•	Responsible for all legal aspects of the company
IT
•	Ensure IT system is managed properly and according to company standard.
*Salary can negotiate.
Kindly apply by email or telegram: Chinda@tipcoasphalt.com.kh & 012 72 73 01
/ Office Number 023 997 991
Job Requirement:
•	Master’s degree in finance or accounting, eight to ten years of experience in a level finance or accounting manager, and a CPA.
•	At least five years’ experience as Management Level in Accounting or Auditing.
•	At least five years’ experience and expert on tax audit.
•	At least two years’ experience in IT control.
•	Good command of English Language and sound knowledge computer skills 
•	Knowledge of finance, accounting, budgeting, and cost control principles including Generally Accepted Accounting Principles. Knowledge of automated financial and accounting reporting systems.
•	Knowledge of government financial regulations.
•	Ability to analyze financial data and prepare financial reports, statements, and projections.
•	Working knowledge of short- and long-term budgeting and forecasting, rolling budgets, and product-line profitability analysis.
•	Work requires professional written and verbal communication and interpersonal skills.
•	Ability to motivate teams to produce quality materials within tight timeframes and simultaneously manage several projects.
•	Ability to participate in and facilitate group meetings.
•	Work requires willingness to work a flexible schedule.
•	Excellent written and oral communication skills.
•	Demonstrated leadership ability, team management, and interpersonal skills.
•	Excellent analytical and abstract reasoning skills, plus excellent organization skills.
•	Significant experience in or knowledge of oil/gas accounting is a strong plus.
