Job Description:  Develop, implement, and maintain information security policy, procedures, andstandards Conduct security monitoring on the Bank computer networks to identify cybersecurityissues Conduct digital forensic and investigate on security breaches or other cybersecurityincidents Document security incidents, provide recommend remediation, and develop mitigationplans to prevent future cybersecurity incident Initiate security programs to enhance security layers on the operating system, networkdevices, and so on Initiate and coordinate on patch management and deployment schedule Simulate internal phishing activity to measure end-user awareness Implement and manage security tools such as Web Application Firewall (WAF),Endpoint Detection and Response (EDR), Security Information and Event Management(SIEM), and Privilege Access Management (PAM) Conduct information security risk assessment program and simulate security use-casesto improve security detection system Prepares the disaster recovery plan (DR/BCP) and assist in coordinating contingencyplan tests on a regular basis Initiate and conduct cybersecurity awareness program for staffs across the bank Stay up-to-date on cybersecurity trends and zero-day vulnerabilities
Job Requirement:  Bachelor in of Information Technology, Information Security, Cyber Security, or otherrelated degrees such as Computer Science, Management of Information Systems; At least 1-3 years working experience in IT security, IT governance or other IT securityRelated; Holding security related certification in CySA+, ECSA, OSCP, CEH, CISA or fromequivalent recognized certification body is a plus; Broad knowledge of a wide range of Information Technology and Digital systems and adeep understanding of the inherent security risks associated with these technologies; Possess good knowledge of cyber security standards or frameworks such as TRMG,NIST, CIS or ISO27001; Understanding of IT Security solution/tools (SIEM, PAM, Antivirus, VulnerabilityScanning, and IDS/IPS); Experience with penetration testing and vulnerability assessment project; Proven ability to identify, mitigate vulnerabilities, and provide easy to understandreports, deliver presentations on information risk management, systems processcontrol; Positive attitude towards learning and development demonstrated by a record ofcontinuing professional development; Self-confident and able to work under pressure; Good working knowledge of information risk analysis/management; Ability to manage time and priorities appropriately; Good verbal and written communication skills and able to communicate effectively at alllevels; Honesty, reliability, and a commitment to strict confidentiality.

Job Description:
To plan, implement, and successfully monitor the company QHSE policy and prepare for ISO readiness.
*Develop QHSE management systems, processes, and procedures in terms of business operations in accordance with Tipco safety standards from TH & VN.
-	Validate the establishment of QHSE identifications, risks assessment, and risk control
-	Communicates information on the QHSE management system throughout the organization and promotes QHSE awareness.
-	Provide QHSE management system training to employees through various sharing sessions
-	Implement QHSE inspections onsite.
-	Identify QHSE impact from all company activities and work out improvement measures. 
-	Lead the investigation of any fatality and/or serious accident occurrence and report to management.
-	Monthly management report on QHSE audit and/or inspection findings, QHSE statistics and incidents summary, and overall quality management system implementation
-	To implement other works as authorized by BOM
-       Following KPI setting for each period and evaluated twice per year (first half ended 30 June & second half ended 31 Dec)
Job Requirement:
-	Degree with majoring in Engineering / Science
-	Strong QHSE awareness and behavior to be examples for others
-	Understanding of the QMS concept
-	Understand of TQM concept
-	Understanding of document system concept
-	Understanding of basic calibration concept
-	Planning and organizational skills 
-	Problem-solving and decision-making skills
-	Analytical and creative thinking skills
-	Presentation skills
-	Interpersonal and teamwork skills
-	Self-learning skills
-	Positive attitudes and behaviors. Passionate and motivated
-	knowledgeable of the Cambodia Labor Code and SHE regulation is a plus.
-	Experience/involved in an ISO certified industry is a plus
-	IRQA Certified for any ISO standard (ISO 9001/ISO 14001/ISO 45001) as Lead Auditor is a plus
-	Good knowledge of business, industry, and social
-	Fluently English in both writing and speaking and good computer literacy 
-	Able to work flexible hours and frequently traveling

Job Description:
•	Prepares medications by reviewing and interpreting physician orders

job title: Manager, Core Banking and Applications Support
position: Manager, Core Banking and Applications Support
Job Description:  Install, configure and troubleshoot on Core banking system To ensure EOD/EOM and EOY are smoothly execute and ready for next working day Provide high quality, support services on applications mentioned above Ensure and maintain accuracy of bank’s financial data Identify and recommend appropriate IT solutions in improving internal processes Undertake training to educate user community on business applications System Capacity Planning and user inventory control Manage and oversee the core banking system of the bank Ensure that the core banking system is properly configured and maintained inaccordance with industry best practices Ensure that all updates and upgrades to the core banking system are implemented in atimely and effective manner Monitor the core banking system for issues and ensure that any issues are resolved in atimely and effective manner Develop and implement policies and procedures related to the core banking system Provide guidance and support to staff members who work with the core banking system Build and maintain relationships with external vendors and partners as required Work with other members of the IT department to ensure that the core banking systemis fully integrated with other systems within the bank Keep up to date with industry trends and developments related to core banking systems Oversee staff and subordinate to complete the task To work with third party vendor to resolve all the issue related which raised by the user
Job Requirement:  Bachelor degree graduated in computer science. Good knowledge in SQL (PL/SQL is preferable), Oracle BI, C# and .NET. 4 years experiences in the field of Banking /Business application support, maintenanceand development. Proven experience in managing core banking systems Strong knowledge of industry best practices relating to core banking systems Good leadership skills to mentor, oversee, and lead team members Good interpersonal skills to interact with business users, vendors, management, andteam members Excellent analytical and communication skills, Excellent troubleshooting and problem-solving skills Ability to work independently and as part of a team Willingness to keep up to date with industry trends and developments related to corebanking systems. Honesty, reliability, and a commitment to strict confidentiality.

Job Description: ¨Manage the bank's data warehouse and DataMart solutions, ensuring they are designed, developed, and maintained in accordance with best practices and standards.¨Oversee the integration of data from different sources into the data warehouse and DataMart solutions, ensuring data quality and consistency.¨Work closely with business stakeholders to identify and prioritize data requirements and develop and implement strategies to meet those requirements.¨Collaborate with the data analytics team to develop and implement data models and algorithms that provide insights into customer behaviour, market trends, and risk management.¨Manage the bank's data governance processes, ensuring that data quality and integrity are maintained, and compliance with regulatory requirements is achieved.¨Keep up to date with emerging trends and technologies in data warehousing and DataMart solutions and recommend ways in which the bank can leverage these to improve its operations.¨Communicate the results of data analysis to business stakeholders and senior management, ensuring that the insights gained are effectively applied to the bank's decision-making processes.¨Manage and mentor the team, ensuring they are up-to-date with the latest technologies and best practices.
Job Requirement: ¨Bachelor's or master’s degree in computer science, Information Systems, or a related field.¨3+ years of experience in data warehousing, with a focus on data modelling, ETL processes, and DataMart solutions.¨Good understanding of data management principles, including data quality, data governance, and data security.¨Experience with SQL and other database technologies, as well as data warehousing and ETL processes.¨Good leadership and management skills, with experience in managing teams of technical professionals.¨Good communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with technical and non-technical stakeholders.¨Understanding of regulatory requirements related to data management in the banking industry.¨Experience with cloud-based data platforms such as AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud is a plus.¨Relevant industry certifications such as Microsoft Certified: Azure Data Engineer Associate or Oracle Certified Professional, Data Warehousing and Business Intelligence would be an advantage

Job Description: •ពិនិត្យកិច្ចការសិស្ស បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្សមើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់ និងវិន័យសិស្សពេល គ្រូបង្គោលបង្រៀន។• រាល់កិច្ចការសូមគោរពតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។• ជួយមើលសិស្សមុនពេលចូលរៀន ពេលចេញលេង និងពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ។• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបង្គោលក្នុងការផលិតសម្ភារឧបទេស និងតុបតែងថ្នាក់រៀន។• ចូលរួមរាល់សកម្មរបស់សាលា។• គោរពបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុងសាលាឱ្យបាន១០០%។• ធ្វើជាទូតដ៏ល្អរបស់ស្ថាប័ន។• អាននូវកំណត់ចំណាំ សេចក្តីជូនដំណឹង ព័ត៌មានថ្មីៗ ជាប្រចាំ និងអនុវត្តន៍ឱ្យបាន ១០០%។• ជូនសិស្សមកពេទ្យពេលសិស្សមានបញ្ហាសុខភាព។• ពិនិត្យមើលComment អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលក្នុងសៀវភៅតាមដាន រួចផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅគ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់។	• ចូលរួមថែរក្សាទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។• បង្រៀនជំនួសនៅពេលគ្រូបង្គោល ឬគ្រូជំនាញអវត្តមាន។• ពិនិត្យមើល Comment អ្នកអាណាព្យាបាលក្នុងសៀវភៅតាមដានរួច ផ្តល់ព័ត៌មានទៅ គ្រូបន្ទុកថ្នាក់ ឬអាចឆ្លើយតបជាមួយអ្នកអាណាព្យាបាល។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំឆមាសនីមួយ និងផ្ញើជូនគណៈកម្មការតាមកាលបរិច្ឆេទដែលបានកំណត់។• ពិនិត្យមើលកិច្ចការរបស់សិស្សដូចជា កិច្ចការផ្ទះ កិច្ចការក្នុងថ្នាក់ ការសរសេរមេរៀនរបស់សិស្ស។• ជួយការងារគ្រូបង្គោល (ពិនិត្យកិច្ចការសិស្ស បញ្ជីវត្តមានសិស្ស មើលសណ្តាប់ធ្នាប់សិស្ស ពេលគ្រូបង្គោលបង្រៀន)។• បំផុសទឹកចិត្តសិស្សឱ្យចូលរួមកម្មវិធីប្រកួតប្រជែងរបស់សាលាឱ្យបានផុសផុល។• សហការជាមួយគ្រូបង្គោលក្នុងការជួយតាមដានការសិក្សាសិស្ស។• ពិនិត្យសម្ភារសិក្សាសិស្សមុនពេលចេញទៅផ្ទះ។
Job Requirement: ចំណេះដឹង ជំនាញ និងបទពិសោធន៍:• មានបទពិសោធច្រើនឆ្នាំក្នុងការមើលកុមារ។• មានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ។• ព្យាយាម និងអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារជាមួយកុមារ។• ស្រឡាញ់កុមារ និងមានមនសិការវិជ្ជាជីវៈខ្ពស់។• មានកាយសម្បទាមាំមួន។• មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់ និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description:
The Assistant Manager is someone who is passionate about food and customer service. They are a problem solver with strong work ethic and leadership skills. The Assistant Manager understands that customer satisfaction always takes priority but efficient restaurant operations make it possible. They are experienced leader with a goal to move up in the management field.

** Responsibilities
• Identify and delegate responsibilities to supervisor and staff to ensure objectives are met and excellent service is consistently achieved
• Effectively manage the restaurant in absence of Restaurant Manager
• Manage operations with passion, integrity and knowledge while promoting the culture and values of Stonegrill
• Provide direction to Supervisors and staff to achieve restaurant goals
• Consistently review operations and staff to identify any problems, concerns and opportunities for improvement
• Provide coaching and feedback to mangers and staff and assess performance on and ongoing basis
• Create a positive guest experience by delivering a high level of service and ensuring all staff engage guests to understand their needs and exceed expectations
• Manage the restaurant to meet or exceed in food quality, safety and cleanliness
• Solicit guest feedback to understand the needs and wants of customers
• Train and coach staff on guest services principles and practices
• Monitor and maintain the POS system
• Assist in menu implementation
• Develop and implement creative solutions to areas of improvement
• Assist in conducting staff and daily pre-shift meetings
• Assist in any areas of the restaurant when staffing constraints
• Identify employee weaknesses and retrain as necessary
Duties
• Supervising daily shift operations
• Monitor communication between floor and kitchen
• Monitor customer service to each table, ensuring food and drinks are delivered on time and correctly
• Monitor customers lack of service
• Ensure fast processing of bills
• Monitor and ensure cleanliness of floors, glasses, tables, cutlery, bar and toilets
Job Requirement:
• Able to use touch-sensistive POS System
• Must be able to take direction and delegate responsibilities
• Able to work in a fast paced environtment
• Able to work nights, weekends and holidays

We bring together large local banks, professional trust institutions, the world's top four accountants, and the cooperation of professional law firms, and introduce an experienced Taiwanese investment team to provide global investors with financial products that take into account safety and high returns.
AEGIES FUND MANAGEMENT PLC. is affiliated to HIGH-TEK Group (3202), an OTC company in Taiwan. It continues the Group's mission of "focusing on emerging markets and realizing inclusive finance", and combines the group's resources to create highly competitive fund products, and successfully transfer the group's resource advantages to investors' investment performance.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
Job responsibilities and duties:
Internal/External Interactions: 
• Closer relationship with dealership divisions of RMA Cambodia and other dealers and assets suppliers
• Planning and Daily visits new customers\
• More regular, planned, and structured visit to provincial customers 
• Joint Target to improve groups performance in sales, penetration, and profit
• Joint calls to large Target fleet customers
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager/Senior Collection Officer/Senior Loan Recovery Officer about default customers and review previous months performance
• Weekly meeting with Lending Manager to review previous months performance
• Collect quality applicant rather than quantity by doing careful credit assessment for approval request
• Train and coach sales team of dealers about financing 
• Ensure the effective communication maintained among team and other departments
• Report and update to the Dealer sale team about the application status
• Find out key potential growth of sale and recommend this to management
• Support recovery team and collection team if needed 
• Manage and delegate tasks to lending coordinator 
• Attend trainings as required by the management
Job Requirement:
Job requirements and qualifications:
Education/Certification:
• Bachelor or Master degree in business management or related field
• At least two years of experience in the similar position
Knowledge, Skill, and Experience:
ESSENTIAL:
• Multi tasks and strong organizational skill
• Good in problem solving
• Analytical skills
OTHERS:
• Creative, result-driven, able to take initiative.
• Business Management Ethic
• Strong team player
• Good in problem solving

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Human Resource Management or other related fields.
- 3rd year or graduated university student.
- Hard-working and willing to learn
Company Profile:
Since 2013, Naki Group has grown from a local real estate and property management firm into an investment firm focused on developing the Indo-China belt. With representation in Singapore and Seattle, the Group invests in our 3 key pillars of property development, realty services, and hospitality management.

As a developer, Naki Group has completed Silvertown Metropolitan, a 111-unit condominium in 2014, Woodland Residences, an 84-unit luxury villa gated community to be completed in 2022, and Agile Sky Residence, a 44-storey condominium to be completed in 2022.

As a property management firm, Naki Group have served Silvertown Metropolitan, Woodland Residences, Agile Showroom, TK Avenue Community Mall and The One Mall. In addition to managing medium to large projects, our property management services extend to those smaller shops who require janitorial, pest control and sanitization services.

As a hospitality services provider, Naki Group has maintained a high quality standards of stay to our tenants. From long stay to short stay, we ensure enjoyable accommodation coupled with services of convenience.

Now as a growing real estate company, Naki Group is determined to reach out to larger domestic and overseas projects. On a larger scale, investors both financial and expertise will play a large role in achieving the goal of higher and faster returns to our partners.
Contact Info: Contact Information Human Resource   081 990 959 hr@nakigroup.com Koh Pich, Diamond Twin Tower, 22nd Floor, Sopheak Mongkol Rd, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 081 990 959

Job Description: Kambujaya is currently recruiting a mid-level Senior Accountant with at least 3 years work experience – ideally within the real estate development or construction industries. As a Senior Accountant, this person will be held accountable for the daily accounting management of the company. The position will report directly to the Managing Director. The ideal candidate will be primarily focused on managing Quickbooks, setting up financial control systems/protocols, and performing monthly tax/financial obligations.
Job Requirement: Tasks• Oversee all accounting activities of small real estate development project (sales, costs, cash management, P&L reporting, etc.).• Oversee, analyze, and manage all accounting functions (A/R, A/P, G/L, fixed assets, cash collections/deposits, monthly closing, taxation, and others).• Develop accounting processes – specifically creating internal controls, accounting policies, and process improvement of workflows• Administrate frequent financial reports –ensure proper recording of daily accounting entries and reconciliation of variances.• Process data – compile information, analyze accounting data, and produce financial reports • Assist with the monitoring of inventory with Procurement/StockPosition DetailsJob type: Full time Start date: July 2023/Immediate Working hours: 9am-6pm How to apply Send the following to: jobs@kambujaya.com (using the subject line: CamHR-I Heart Accountant) 01. Your CV. 02. A short description in the email telling us why you’re the right candidate for us (<400 words).
Company Profile: About Kambujaya Kambujaya is a newly established boutique lifestyle and property development firm aspiring to build design oriented and unique living spaces for the Cambodian market. The company was created to meet the growing demands of the Cambodian middle class who are seeking natural greenery, higher quality, and well-designed living solutions. Kambujaya is led by a young and dynamic team of Khmers who are taking a unique and boutique approach to real estate development. The start-up company is currently developing a small residential linkhouse project in eastern Phnom Penh with a target completion scheduled for Q1 2023.
Contact Info: Contact Information Kambujaya HR HR Manager  jobs@kambujaya.com Phnom Penh

Company Profile:
Advanced Technology for Recovery Inc. (hereinafter “ATR”) is an environmental consulting company located in South Korea. 
We work with both public corporation and private enterprises since 2020 to respond to climate change and promote sustainable development. 
ATR has its expertise in carbon credit business. We are able to provide entire carbon credit business process including the development, registration, execution, and monitoring of Clean Development Mechanism (CDM)/Sustainable Development Mechanism (SDM) under UNFCCC or Global Voluntary Carbon Market (VCM) projects.  

ATR would be fully in charge of the entire project development, operation, and registration of the Mangrove Forestation, Land Fill Gas, Water Purification Carbon Credit Project in Cambodia.

company_name: SEENER COMMUNICATION 索能网络通讯有限公司
Job Description:
1. 主要负责数据中心网络运维, 包括网服务监控告警处置、事件响应、日常变更实施、网络优化
2. 负责防火墙、汇聚、四层交换、接入交换机问题处理、定位；
3. 参与机房网络告警平台运维
4、熟悉华为、思科等厂商主流网络设备及其配置。
5、精通STP、VLAN、Eth-trunk等以太网二层技术，以及静态和OSPF路由协议。
6、精通STP、TCP/IP、OSPF、BGP、VPN等协议，熟悉大型ISP和骨干城域网架构。 了解主流服务提供商网络结构至关重要。
7、了解网络监控和流量分析，熟悉至少一种监控系统。
8、具有华为HCNP、HCIE、思科CCNP、CCIE等同等认证者优先。
9.强制要求：技术人员需精通中英文。 国籍不限！
10.薪资及福利将在面试时讨论。
1. Mainly responsible for data center network operation and maintenance, including network service monitoring and alarm handling, incident response, daily change implementation, network optimization
2. Responsible for firewall, aggregation, layer 4 switching, access switch problem handling and positioning;
3. Participate in the operation and maintenance of the computer room network alarm platform
4. Familiarity with mainstream network equipment from vendors such as Huawei or Cisco and their configurations.
5. Proficient in Ethernet layer 2 technologies such as STP, VLAN, Eth-trunk, as well as static and OSPF routing protocols.
6. Expertise in protocols such as STP, TCP/IP, OSPF, BGP, VPN, and familiarity with large-scale ISP and backbone metropolitan network architectures. Knowledge of mainstream service provider network structures is essential.
7. Understanding of network monitoring and traffic analysis, and familiarity with at least one monitoring system.
8. Candidates with certifications such as Huawei HCNP, HCIE, Cisco CCNP, CCIE, or equivalent are preferred.
9.Compulsory requirements: Technicians need to be proficient in Both Chinese and English. Nationality is not limited!
10.Salary and benefits will be discussed during the interview.
Job Requirement:
1.熟悉华为或Cisco等主流网络厂商设备以及配置
2.熟练掌握STP、vlan、Eth-trunk等以太网二层技术、静态、ospf等路由协议
3.精通STP、TCP/IP、OSPF、BGP、VPN等协议，熟悉大规模ISP及骨干城域网网络架构，熟悉主流运营商网络结构；
4.了解网络监控和流量分析、熟悉一种以上监控系统；
5.拥有华为HCNP、HCIE或者cisco、CCNP、CCIE等证书者优先
6.必备要求：技术员需要精通中文和英语。国籍不限！
7.【福利待遇】
工资待遇面议
房补＆餐补/宿舍＆包餐＆机票
假期福利，公司团建活动
合法签证上班
节日礼金，医疗保险
月休4~8天
工作时间8小时制
1. Familiar with the equipment and configuration of mainstream network manufacturers such as Huawei or Cisco
2. Familiar with STP, vlan, Eth-trunk and other Ethernet layer 2 technologies, static, ospf and other routing protocols
3. Proficient in STP, TCP/IP, OSPF, BGP, VPN and other protocols, familiar with large-scale ISP and backbone MAN network architecture, familiar with the network structure of mainstream operators;
4. Understand network monitoring and traffic analysis, and be familiar with more than one monitoring system;
5. Those who have Huawei HCNP, HCIE or cisco, CCNP, CCIE and other certificates are preferred
6. Necessary requirements: technicians need to be proficient in Chinese and English. Nationality is not limited!

company_name: Yunnan Airinvestment (Cambodia) Airport Management Co., Ltd.（YACA）
Job Description:
YOUR ASSGINMENT WILL MAINLY FOCUS ON:
Identify and assess the training needs, training matrix, job analysis, employee’s career paths, develop individualized and group training programs and needs, create training catalogue, develop training manuals that target tangible results, implement effective and purposeful training methods, manage the training budget, evaluate organizational performance to ensure that training is meeting business needs, assess employees’ skills, performance and productivity to identify areas of improvement, drive brand values and philosophy through all training and development activities, keep abreast of training trends, developments and best practices.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in human resources management or a related field.
- Proficiency in Khmer and English plus Chinese is preferable.
- Minimum 2-years-experience in training and development management.
- Excellent written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills.
- Superb track record in developing and executing successful training programs.
- Critical thinker with innovative problem-solving skills.

job title: MED Sales Specialist ( Medical Equipment Solutions)
position: MED Sales Specialist ( Medical Equipment Solutions)
Job Description: -To learn the knowledge of the products and share it to the customers in the purpose of getting the interest and sales to achieve the company’s target and KPI set.-Communicate with the principles on the product knowledge, price, market information, sales & purchase plan and product recall.-Communicate with internal partners including sales admin and other departments to ensure smooth process of purchase, sales and after-sales-service.-To explore the healthcare market and source additional products to expand the product portfolio or suggest the adjustment to the current product portfolio to support the market trend.-Collect market information, analyze data, monitor market status for sales and marketing strategies of the team.-Increase brand awareness of our company and products.-Visit and maintain the relationship with both existing and new customers.-To implement sale strategic plan and perform sales activities.-Attend training or workshops/seminars organized by the principles and our company.-In some cases, provide on-site supports with engineers for the installation and user training, and ensure successful closing the sales orders.-To provide brief daily activities, weekly plan and report to the Business Manager-Manage customers and resolves customer complaints by investigating problems, developing solutions, preparing reports and marking suggestions to management-To perform other related tasks assigned by the Business Manager and HoD.

Job Description: • Collaborate with business functions to formulate analytics business cases on productivity, performance, and opportunities for growth or improvement.• Collaborate with business functions to identify and understand business requirements for analytics and visualizations and support the team to formulate business cases.• Work with Business Analytics Manager to design and optimize data models to ensure accuracy and efficiency.• Support the team to perform advanced analytics and conduct simulation to validate various business assumptions to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.• Build data visualization using tools such as PowerBI, Oracle Analytics,… based on business requirements.• Collaborate with data engineering team to prepare data to feed analytics modeling, simulation, and visualization.• Automate regular reports/dashboards to business functions with more self-service options.• Support the team to prioritize projects/tasks to ensure proper tracking and delivery of requests in a timely manner.• Support the team in contributing to projects with cross-functional teams to determine analytics/statistical needs and implement data related initiatives/tasks.• Communicate insights effectively to stakeholders via visualization, contextualizing, and storytelling.• Ensure data accuracy, consistency and compliance with relevant data privacy and security policies of the bank.• Keep up-to-date with new analytics technologies, tools, and methodologies.• Develop and maintain strong relationships with business stakeholders and teams across the organization.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor's degree in a relevant field such as Business Analytics, Data Analytics, Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Computer Information System, Economics, or other applicable engineering/technical fields.• At least 2 years of experience in data analytics, MIS reporting, visualization and/or data engineering.• Prior experience in banking and financial services industry is highly preferred.• Good analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to derive insights from complex data sets.• Experience working with SQL, data modeling, data visualization tools (i.e. Power BI, Oracle Analytics,…), and common data programming languages (i.e. SQL, Python, R, DAX, M or equivalent).• Experience working with data mining, machine learning, and advanced analytical techniques.• Strong interpersonal skills and ability to communicate complex concepts to non-technical stakeholders.• Ability to research and willingness to try different things.• Strong communication and presentation skills.• Ability to work independently or as part of a team, communicate & collaborate well with fellow Business colleagues.

Job Description: • Work as support team member in implementing the defined audit engagement and collect auditevidence to ensure that risk, error, and fraud control weaknesses are detected• Execute the preliminary audit analyses and produce audit documentation and ensure that thisresponds to audit engagement• Prepare debriefing audit outcomes and participate in drafting the internal audit report to heads ofaudit and ensure sufficient information are obtained to support audit findings and issues• Perform other necessary tasks as assigned by team leader or manager.

Job Description:
វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រកម្ពុជា (IPC) គឺជាវិទ្យាស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវមិនស្វែងរកប្រាក់ចំណូលនៅកម្ពុជា ដែលត្រូវបានបង្កើតឡើងក្នុងឆ្នាំ១៩៥៣។ IPC សព្វថ្ងៃជាគ្រឹះស្ថានស្រាវជ្រាវវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រដែលបង្កើតឡើងដើម្បីបម្រើដល់សេវាសាធារណៈ ដោយមានការគាំទ្រខ្ពស់ពីក្រសួងសុខាភិបាលនៃព្រះរាជាណាចក្រកម្ពុជា ​និងស្ថិតក្រោមទំនួលខុសត្រូវរបស់វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រ (ក្រុងប៉ារីស) ទៅលើផ្នែកវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រ និងបច្ចេកទេស។ IPC គឺជាសមាជិករបស់បណ្តាញវិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រអន្តរជាតិ ដែលមានវិទ្យាស្ថានជាសមាជិកសរុបចំនួន​ ៣៣ នឹងមានវត្តមាននៅលើទ្វីបចំនួនប្រាំ។ នេះជាការបង្ហាញអោយឃើញពីគុណតម្លៃ ក្រមសីលធម៌ និងភាពលូតលាស់ឥតឈប់ឈរ របស់វិទ្យាស្ថាន។ IPC មានបុគ្គលិកដែលកំពុងបម្រើការងារសរុបក្នុងអង្គភាពច្រើនជាង ២៥០នាក់ ក្នុងនោះរួមមានជនជាតិបរទេសដែលមាន១0 សញ្ជាតិផេ្សងគ្នា ចំនួន ៣0 នាក់​ រូមទាំងបុគ្គលិកដែលកំពុងបំរើការក្នុងផ្នែកស្រាវជ្រាវទាំង៥ផ្នែកផងដែរ។ IPC បាន​នឹងកំពុងអនុវត្តសកម្មភាពស្រាវជ្រាវលើ ផ្នែកជីវវិទ្យាសុខភាព សុខភាព សាធារណៈ ផ្តល់សេវាកម្ម(មន្ទីរពិសោធន៍ជីវៈវេជ្ជសាស្ត្រ ការចាក់វ៉ាក់សាំង ការវិភាគទឹក និងអាហារ) និងចូលរួមសកម្មភាពបណ្តុះបណ្តាលផ្សេងៗ។

វិទ្យាស្ថានប៉ាស្ទ័រកម្ពុជាកំពុងត្រូវការជ្រើសរើសបុគ្គលិកបំពេញការងារពេញម៉ោង ១ រូប​ ដែលមានតួនាទីជា អ្នកបើកបរ​ សម្រាប់កិច្ចសន្យាការងារ​​​រយៈពេលមួយឆ្នាំ(អាចបន្តបាន)។

* Main responsibilities:

- បើកបររថយន្តទៅកាន់កន្លែងបំពេញការងារក្នុងក្រុងភ្នំពេញ និងតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
- Drive a variety of cars to job sites in Phnom Penh and Provinces
- ជួយក្រុមការងារកំឡុងពេលចុះបេសកកម្ម
- Help the missionary during the mission
- មានតួនាទីថែទាំរថយន្ត និងគ្រប់គ្រងប្រពន្ធ័មេកានិច
- Take care of cars and mechanical control
- ត្រូវប្រាកដថារថយន្ត ត្រូវបានសម្អាតស្អាតគ្រប់ពេលវេលា
- Ensure that cars must be kept clean all the time
- ត្រូវធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យដំណើរការរថយន្តរាល់ពេលមុនធ្វើដំណើរ
- Perform preventative vehicle maintenance checks
- ត្រូវធ្វើការរាយការណ៍ជូនទៅប្រធានក្រុមរាល់ពេលមានបញ្ហា ឬការខូចខាតលើរថយន្ត
- Report all kind of defaults, issues or broken car parts to team leader
- ត្រូវរៀបចំ និងត្រៀមខ្លួនឲ្យបានរួចរាល់ក្នុងការចុះបេសកកម្មទាំងក្នុងក្រុងភ្នំពេញ រឺតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
- Must be prepared and ready to go on mission in Phnom Penh or Provinces
- អាចធ្វើការក្នុងថ្ងៃបុណ្យឈប់សម្រាក និងចុងសប្ដាហ៍
- Be able to work on public holidays and weekends
- បំពេញការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែក
- Perform other tasks assigned by managers
Job Requirement:
- មានសញ្ជាតិខ្មែរ
- Cambodian nationality
- ត្រូវយល់ដឹងយ៉ាងច្បាស់ពីគ្រប់ប្រភេទផ្លូវនៅក្នុងទីក្រុងភ្នំពេញ និងតាមបណ្ដាលខេត្ត
- Well understand of all kinds of road in Phnom Penh and Provinces
- ត្រូវមានប័ណ្ណបើកបរប្រភេទ D1 ដែលមានសុពលភាព(ប្រភេទឡាន១៥កៅអី)
- Hold a Valid driver’s license, category D1 (for minibus 15 seats)
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ផ្នែកបើកបរយ៉ាងតិច ៣ឆ្នាំ​
Have at least 3-Year driving experience

* Candidate Profile:

- មានជំនាញក្នុងការរៀបចំ និងគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលាបានល្អ
-Excellent organizational and time management skills
- ជាអ្នកដែលមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ និង​គោរពពេលវេលា
- Responsible and punctual person
- មានកាយសម្បទាររឹងមាំ និងមានសមត្ថភាពលើកទម្ងន់បានរហូត ៥០គីឡូក្រាម
- Excellent Physical and ability to lift up to 50 Kilograms
- មានភាពឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម អត់ធ្មត់ ចិត្តល្អ ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់ និង​ ប្រកបដោយវិជ្ជាជីវៈល្អ
- Diligent, persistence, kind, calm, firm, professional sense ​and sportive person
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និង សុច្ចរិត
- Honesty and integrity above reproach
- អាចធ្វើការងារជាក្រុមបានល្អ
- Ability to work well in team work
- មិនត្រូវសេពគ្រឿងស្រវឹង
- None-alcoholism person

លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌសម្រាប់ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើរសុំត្រូវមានលិខិតអមជាមួយនឹងការបញ្ជាក់ពីប្រាក់ខែដែលរំពឹងទុក​ និងច្បាប់ថតចម្លងសញ្ញាប័ត្រ(ប្រសិនបើមាន) លិខិតបញ្ជាក់ការងារ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេបជាមួយរូបថតថ្មី​ អត្តសញ្ញាណប័ណ្ណថតចម្លង

Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

Job Description: Job SummaryThe overall role of Senior Technician, Electrical and Automation is to carry out engineering tasks and collaborate with engineering team for continuous electrical operation improvement to ensure efficiency and profitability in order to support the overall operation goal and company objective.Key Responsibilities 1.	Perform daily engineering operation, perform maintenance requests, monitor building maintenance, and support operation team to ensure efficient plant operations2.	Execute maintenance plan and continuously implement it to ensure that all relevant maintenance parts are sourced and reported in a timely manner to minimize breakdown and operation runs smoothly3.	Examine needs on spare parts to minimize the unplanned stop with cost optimization. 4.	Work with facilities team, third party, and sub-contractors to ensure all assigned tasks are completed on time and complied with ISO (QMS, EMS, FSMS, GMP, and HACCP) standard requirement and Occupational Health and Safety. 5.	Implement 7S (5S, Safety and Security) at Plant areas to ensure the efficiency and improvements in the work environment.6.	Conduct Root Cause Failure Analysis (RCFA), identify problems, and take prompt action on reliable repair and maintenance service responding to problems occurred.7.	Seek for continuous improvement guidance for electrical technician, the expertise training, technical guidance, and clear responsibilities to support overall operation8.	Complete daily operation report, maintenance plan, and building maintenance and report to Officer, Electrical and Automation to monitor maintenance and inspection plans
Job Requirement: Qualifications 1.	Education: o	University degree in Electrical, Mechanical or equivalent2.	Experiences: o	2 years of experience in Technical Management or equivalent in FMCG Manufacturing3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Working knowledge of the principles of manufacturing management and interdependencies.o	Working knowledge of ISO, GMP, 5S and HACCP in a manufacturing environmento	Competencies in computer and Microsoft offices skillso	Good level of English (Writing, listening and Speaking)

Job Description: • Initiate and prepare a preliminary design concept based on   information and requirement provided.• Produce bills of quantities, labour, materials and equipment   taking off from the final design.• Review sub-contractors’ shop drawings and construction   drawings against the MEP design and specification.• Plan, oversee and manage the projects.• Attend project site progress meeting and technical meeting.• Manage the day to day work of the MEP team.• Achieve a detailed understanding of the Contract documents   (drawings and specifications), phasing plans, MEP systems   interrelationships, construction sequencing and project   schedule.• Facilitate problem solving, as may arise, between MEP   Subcontractors during construction.• Validate design issues related to MEP and suggest alternative   solutions.• Assist in the receipt and review of MEP submittals.• Log and post all MEP changes and as-built information on   field drawings.• Assist in the scope review, budgeting and justification of   MEP change work order.• Assist in the installation of MEP work.• Direct, monitor and control the activities of MEP   Subcontractor.• Liaison with Consultant MEP supervisory Engineers, Inspectors   and relevant staff.• Ensure that MEP Subcontractors provides and adheres to   relevant Quality documentation/records.• Ensure that MEP Subcontractors adheres to Project safety   regulations.• Assist in the testing and commissioning of MEP equipment.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor or Master Degree in MEP Engineering (HAVC,   Electrical, Sanitary & Plumbing) and other equivalent degree.• Working knowledge of plans, prints, specifications and   schematics associated with trade.• Min. 3 years experiences in construction industry;• Computer skills: Revit MEP, AutoCAD, etc.• Have good oral and written in English.• Have good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and   problem solving skills.• Ability to multi-task, work under pressure and meet deadlines   required.• Ability to work under pressure and flexibility to work long   hours, if situation demands.• Ability to work in a collaborative and diverse team   environment.

Job Description:
The Sales Representative is responsible for scheduling visits to outlets. HE/SHE initializes and manages relationships with customers, takes sales orders, sells in SKUs assortment. He/ she conducts merchandising activities and executes trade programs and activities to achieve the monthly targets and KPIs in the assigned territory.
●	Present, promote and sell products/services using solid arguments to existing and prospective customers
●	Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs
●	Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships
●	Reach out to customer leads through cold calling
●	Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction
●	Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule
●	Coordinate sales effort with team members and other departments
●	Analyze the territory/market’s potential, track sales and status reports
●	Supply management with reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.
●	Continuously improve through feedback 
●	Make daily schedule visit to outlets as assigned territory and PJP plan;
●	Execute the detailed merchandising, apply standard display, planogram and visibility of product in premises and on shelves.
●	Expand the coverage outlet and ensure the customer carry our products for all SKUs;
●	Keep the customer well informed to all launching promotion and ensure the effectiveness within the in-charge channel;
●	Attend meetings, submit reports whenever requested.
●	Any other duties relevant to the needs of the organization and as directed
Job Requirement:
●	Minimum Diploma / High School Education, preferably University degree in Sales or Marketing
●	Proven work experience as a Sales Representative
●	Highly motivated and target driven with a proven track record in sales
●	Converse well in Khmer
●	Ability to converse in English will be an advantage

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

Job Description:
The Procurement Manager will be responsible for: 
-	Ensuring Supply Chain Continuity
-	Cost Management.
-	Risk Management
-	Supplier Relationship Management
-	Quality Management

1.	Ensuring Supply Chain Continuity:
-	Ensuring that the organization has a reliable supply chain that can meet production requirements.
-	Developing contingency plans to address any disruptions in the supply chain.
-	Monitoring supplier performance to ensure that they meet contractual obligations.
-	Developing relationships with suppliers to ensure that the organization has a reliable supply chain.

2.	Cost Management:
-	Identifying opportunities for cost savings and process improvements.
-	Negotiating contracts and agreements with suppliers to obtain favorable terms and pricing.
-	Developing and implementing procurement policies and procedures to ensure that costs are managed effectively.
-	Monitoring procurement spend to ensure that it is within budget.

3.	Risk Management:
-	Identifying and assessing risks associated with procurement activities.
-	Developing risk management strategies to mitigate potential risks.
-	Ensuring that all procurement activities comply with legal and regulatory requirements.

4.	Supplier Relationship Management: 
-	Developing and maintaining relationships with suppliers to ensure that the organization has a reliable supply chain.
-	Conducting supplier performance evaluations to identify areas for improvement.
-	Addressing any performance issues that arise with suppliers.
-	Collaborating with suppliers to identify opportunities for process improvements and cost savings.
5.	Quality Management:
-	Ensuring that all procurement activities comply with quality standards and regulatory requirements.
-	Evaluating supplier performance based on quality metrics.
-	Developing and implementing quality management processes to ensure that products and materials meet quality standards.


6.	Managing personnel:
-	Providing guidance and support to staff members to ensure that they are working effectively and efficiently.
-	Conducting performance evaluations and providing feedback to staff members.
-	Addressing any disciplinary issues that arise with staff members.
-	Developing and implementing procurement strategies that are aligned with overall organizational goals and objectives.

7.	Any other tasks that may be assigned by the Head of Supply Chain, or Manager or Management Team from time to time.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor’s degree Business Administration, Supply Chain Management, Logistics, or similar.
-	4 - 6 years of managing experience in procurement.
-	Experience in Beverage Manufacturing or Industrial will be a plus.
-	Hands on experience with purchasing processes and cost control.

Job Description:
Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is seeking for one full-time Grant Office Manager to manage and coordinate the activities of IPC Grant and the actions related to the development of partnerships and fundraising of the Institute.
Created in December 1953, the Pasteur Institute of Cambodia (IPC) is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five
continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound.
The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5
research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training. In recent years, the development of the IPC has been accompanied by an increasing number of scientists and of grants requested and obtained from demanding donors (NIH, Wellcome Trust, Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, etc.). This endeavor of monitoring calls for projects, submitting, implementing and coordinating
projects administratively and financially mobilizes scientists more and more, often to the detriment of the
time they can devote to research. Hence, it appears necessary to support them in these tasks by creating a
new structure adapted to this mission, at the IPC, namely the “Grant Office” (GO).
Under the hierarchical authority of the Director, the GO Manager will have the responsibility to create this new entity in IPC and implement the GO’s various activities, with the support and guidance of the Grant Office of the Institut Pasteur in Paris.

* MISSIONS AND TASKS

The GO Manager is responsible for ensuring the proper functioning of the GO through several actions:

General
- Develop the Grant Office by recruiting an assistant with a suitable profile
- Create data base to make available the important IPC’s documents that may be necessary for grant applications: activity reports, financial reports, statutes, various charters (Pasteurian values, IT, etc.)
- Adapt the operation of the GO to external needs and constraints. Carry out a watch on the skills necessary for the GO.
- Manage GO budget
- Interact with IPC scientists to understand their needs
- Set up internal procedures taking into account IPC rules and funders’ requirements, in particular ANR, EU and NIH
- Train support service staff in the regulatory/financial/legal aspects of donors
- Map the regional and international grant opportunities and shape an annual calendar of important dates

* Identification of calls of interest
- Identify calls for proposals across a wide range of funding sources (Welcome Trust, NIH, European Union, etc.)
- Check eligibility and deadlines and share this information consistently with IPC researchers
- Notify the team IPC scientist about the calls’ openings
- Compile regularly lists of eligible calls with application dates

* Support of proposal writing and submission
- Manage administrative requirements of big funders (NIH, EU, ANR…)
- Ensure that grant application files are compliant, complete and submitted on time. Ensure in particular that the funder's’ requirements are correctly documented and that the grant application files are correctly filled in the donor database
- Make sure budget spending aligns with rules and regulations of funder (overhead, procurement procedures, eligibilities…)
- Resolve complex grant scenarios by consulting and liaising with principal investigator (PI), IPC’s Finance and Administration Departments, and if necessary, IP Paris’ legal department.
- Assist researchers on applications regarding admin requirements (registration in the systems, admin forms, insurances, etc.).
- Assist researchers in filling applications in the right format for each call (e.g.: adapt budget provided by researcher to the template of a given call)
- Help to correct the proposal and submit it
- Help in administrative part of grant submission by being knowledgeable of the different web-based interfaces of the big funders (NIH, EU, ANR…).

* Follow up of a project after grant approval
- Be the main focal point between research teams and funders. Establish subcontracts.
- Help to administratively supervise the progress of the projects (monthly and annual financial reports, and other required documents)
- Ensure budget spending aligns with rules and regulations of funders (overspend, underspend, carry over, changes of budget lines, procurement procedures, eligibilities of expenditures, etc.), in close collaboration with PI, Chief Financial Officer (DAF), and Accounting Department.
- Participate in weekly/monthly [to be specified] Program Team staff meetings.
Job Requirement:
- Full time with one year Fixed duration contract (renewable and/or modifiable in a permanent contract)
- Salary: Based on experience and the salary grid of IPC
- Funding Source: Institut Pasteur du Cambodge
- Available to start: ASAP

* CANDIDATE PROFILE
Training and professional experience:
Different candidate profiles can be considered: rather scientific but with administrative/accounting experience, rather administrative but with project management experience:
- Administrative (e.g., MBA)
- or, Holder of a doctorate in science
- or Master's degree in European Affairs or equivalent experience desirable
- Professional experience in an international and high-level scientific environment
- Experience in setting up and/or coordinating projects is essential
- administrative experience

* Required skills
- Excellent knowledge of administrative, financial and legal rules
- Excellent knowledge of project management (preparation, submission, etc.)
- Excellent communication skills
- Proficiency in English and French (bilingual)
- Ability to understand different areas of research
- Ability to collect, select and prioritize information and tasks as needed
- Ability to synthesize and highlight ideas, to structure written and oral communication
- Ability to organize work to meet deadlines
- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, especially with Excel
- Experience in data base programs (e.g., Power BI) would be beneficial

* Abilities
- Availability, responsiveness, autonomy, ability to adapt to change
- Ability to multitask and work independently and collaboratively to meet deadlines
- Professional, flexible, and a can-do attitude
- Rigor and strong organization skills
- Sense of analysis / strength of proposal
- Synthesis and communication skills
- Good in building and maintaining professional relationships, know how to adapt to his interlocutor
- Ability to organize and conduct trainings
- Ability to maintain confidentiality and impartiality
Company Profile: The Institut Pasteur du Cambodge (IPC) is a Cambodian non-for-profit research institution established in 1953, IPC is today a scientific research establishment declared of public utility placed under the high patronage of the Ministry of Health of the Kingdom of Cambodia and under the responsibility of the Institute Pasteur on the scientific and technical levels. The IPC is a member of the Pasteur Network, which brings together 33 institutes present on five continents. It shares the Pasteurian values and the ethical charter to which the Pasteur Institutes are bound. The IPC has more than 250 employees, including about 30 expatriates of 10 nationalities and includes 5 research units. It carries out research activities in health biology, public health and service activities (Medical Biology Laboratory, vaccinations and water and food analyses) and training.

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description: Job SummaryThe overall role of Operator, Line is to operate, monitor process, trouble shoot of equipment in packaging process to ensure the right quality and quantity and restore the basic condition of plant equipment. Key Responsibilities 1.	Execute CILT (Clean, Inspection, Lubrication and Tightening) and monitor daily running of packaging line as noodle production schedule to ensure production line runs smoothly. 2.	Ensure scheduling the preventive maintenance, repairing on lubrication, pneumatic devices, plumbing, heating, low-voltage electrical systems to restore basic condition of noodle packaging machines. 3.	Contribute and investigate Root Cause Failure Analysis by following the operation manual and troubleshooting of packaging line to ensure the production run smoothly with high productivity and with Occupational Health and Safety manner.4.	Ensure the sustainability in the actual practice of ISO (QMS, FSMS, EMS), GMP and HACCP to achieve highest quality and food safety in the noodle production process. 5.	Improve and maintain 7S (5S + Security & Safety) and Visual Management within Production Area to enhance housekeeping, hygienic, and harmonizing.6.	Complete documentation of machine operation to keep tracking machine performance.7.	Support the performance and attendance of casual staff to manage work allocation
Job Requirement: 1.	Education: o	University degree in Food Science, Engineering, Agro Industry or equivalent2.	Experiences: o	Fresh graduate or 1-year experience in production or equivalent in FMCG Manufacturing3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Working knowledge of the principles of manufacturing management and interdependencies.o	Working knowledge of ISO, GMP, 5S and HACCP in a manufacturing environmento	Competencies in computer and Microsoft offices skillso	Good level of English (Writing, listening and Speaking)
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Chan Sokunthearoth  061997333 recruitment@vital.com.kh Building No. 888K, Road 598, Sangkat Toul Sangke, Khan Russey Keo,Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 061997333

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

Job Description:
- Ensure accurate and efficient teller transactions are offered with professionalism
- Give clear instruction and guidance to subordinates
- Check the daily cash count with teller and briefly report to Branch Manager / Chief of Cash Operation Department
- Ensure that security and operational guidelines are followed by the teller staff

- Inspire and motivate team work

- Ability to work in a team environment
- Negotiation and internal relationship building
- Understanding of basic banking products and services
- Computer literacy
- Good command in English

Company Profile:
Corporate Information

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. With yes superior internet network, our customers can enjoy the best 4G internet xperience you deserve wherever you are in Cambodia.

Our 27 yes hub nationwide is an all-in-one xperience center to all new digital users. Our yes hub warmly welcome everyone for any support, whether it’s questions about how to use the phone, sign up for Facebook page or tips on how to run a successful YouTube channel.

yes has partnered with top global brands like YouTube, Facebook, Google, top OEMs like Apple, Samsung, Hauwei, Xiaomi, Vivo and Oppo, and top payment partners like Alipay, WeChat Pay, Union Pay, VISA and MasterCard to bring exclusive experience for our customers.

yes housed more than 1,000 employees both local and expatriate. We take pride in being inclusive, leveraging and engaging collective genius to create a positive experience in digital life for all. yes aspires everyone, our colleagues, our partners and our customers to become #DigitalCitizen by using yes network as their digital identity to communicate, access digital content and perform financial transactions.

Say yes and let’s #forwardtogether!

Job Description: - មានចំណេះដឹងទាក់ទងនឹងគ្រឿងទូរគមនាគមន៍។- តំឡើងអង់តែន RRU, BBU។- តំឡើងប្រព័ន្ធភ្លើង AC/DC។- ប្រើប្រាស់ម៉ាស៊ីនស្លាយអ៊ុបទិក នឹងម៉ាស៊ីនចាក់ម៉ែត្រខ្សែ។- បើកបររថយន្តក្នុងបេសកកម្មការងាររបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
Job Requirement: - មានចំនេះដឹង​ ឬបទពិសោធន៍លើផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។ - ព្យាយាម និងតស៊ូលើការងារ។- អាចបើកបររថយន្តជាការប្រសើរ។​
Company Profile:
Corporate Information

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. With yes superior internet network, our customers can enjoy the best 4G internet xperience you deserve wherever you are in Cambodia.

Our 27 yes hub nationwide is an all-in-one xperience center to all new digital users. Our yes hub warmly welcome everyone for any support, whether it’s questions about how to use the phone, sign up for Facebook page or tips on how to run a successful YouTube channel.

yes has partnered with top global brands like YouTube, Facebook, Google, top OEMs like Apple, Samsung, Hauwei, Xiaomi, Vivo and Oppo, and top payment partners like Alipay, WeChat Pay, Union Pay, VISA and MasterCard to bring exclusive experience for our customers.

yes housed more than 1,000 employees both local and expatriate. We take pride in being inclusive, leveraging and engaging collective genius to create a positive experience in digital life for all. yes aspires everyone, our colleagues, our partners and our customers to become #DigitalCitizen by using yes network as their digital identity to communicate, access digital content and perform financial transactions.

Say yes and let’s #forwardtogether!
Contact Info: Contact Information Recruitment Team   018 970 1010/ 010 838 739 jobs@yes.com.kh #149, St 432, Village 5, Sangkat Boeung Trabek, Khan Charmkamorn, Phnom Penh 018 970 1010/ 010 838 739

Job Description:
•	Communicate with tenant related to Sales & Marketing Activities. 
•	Event and Sale Promotion Management. 
•	Researching and Developing Sales & Marketing opportunities and plan to understand customer requirement. 
•	Propose and implement advertising, promotional programs and public relation events Handle complaints and problems from customers, ensure that all claims are in line with company policy. 
•	Analyze sale of business performance. 
•	Other tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirement:
•	At least 2 years’ experience in related Sale &Marketing, Real Estate Industrial, Food and Beverage Industrial and retail store business.	 
•	Bachelor Degree in Business Management. 
•	Acknowledge in Digital Marketing and Social Media. 
•	Be patient, self-motivated and team building capabilities.
•	Team Work, Interpersonal, customer service skill and Strong Communication Skill. 
•	Knowledge of data analysis and report writing. 
•	Hard working and be able to work with shift schedule (including weekend and public holiday).
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្នែកហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Financial benefits:
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងគ្រោះថ្នាក់24ម៉ោង /​ Private 24/7 accident insurance after probation.
- សេវាធានារ៉ាប់រង បសស NSSF (Work related injury and health care)
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តពីរដងក្នុងមួយឆ្នាំ / Bonus Twice per year
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភថ្លៃសាំង / Gasoline Allowance
- ការដំឡើងប្រាក់ខែប្រចាំឆ្នាំ / Annual Salary Increment
- ប្រាក់ថែមម៉ោង / Overtime
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាពការងារ / Seniority Payment
- ប្រាក់បំណាច់បញ្ចប់កិច្ចសន្យា / Severance Payment
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភចូលរួមរំលែកទុក្ខពេលមានមរណភាព /Mourning Allowance
- ប្រាក់ឧបត្ថម្ភពេលសម្រាលកូន/ Maternity Allowance

អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗក្រៅពីហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ / Non- Financial benefits:
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំខែ ៨-៩ថ្ងៃក្នុង១ខែ / 8-9 days Off per month
- អាហារមួយពេលក្នុង០១ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ / 01 meal per working day
- ច្បាប់សម្រាកពិសេស / Special Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកប្រចាំឆ្នាំ ១៨ថ្ងៃក្នុង ១ឆ្នាំ / Annual Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកមាតុភាព / Maternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកបុរសពេលភរិយាសម្រាលបុត្រ / Paternity Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកពេលរៀបអាពាពិពាហ៏/ Marriage Leave
- ការឈប់សម្រាកឈឺពេលខ្លី និងឈឺពេលវែង / Short term and long term Sick leave
- ការលើកទឹកចិត្តសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិកដែលមានអតីតភាពការងារវែង ៥ឆ្នាំ ១០ឆ្នាំ .... / Long Year Service Award (5 years, 10 years,…)

ផ្សេងៗ / Others:
- ដំណើរកំសាន្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំសម្រាប់បុគ្គលិក / Annual Staff Trip
- ការជប់លៀងចុងឆ្នាំ / Year End Party
- ឱកាសអភិវឌ្ឍន៍អាជីពការងារ / Career Development Opportunity
- ការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលក្នុង និងក្រៅប្រទេស / Local and Oversea Training
Contact Info: Contact Information Ly Samedy  010 511 106 careers@aeonmall-kh.com AEON MALL Sen Sok City 010 511 106

Job Description: •	Develop and manage business development strategies and plans for assigned product range. •	Manage and monitor the implementation of business action plans to achieve the business targets.•	Manage team to coordinate and support the marketing activities (group presentation. customer meeting/ symposium etc.)•	Manage and supervisor Consumer Team.•	Analyze and evaluate market changes, competitor’s activities and propose the amendment aligned with the company’s regulation.•	Allocate business targets to the assigned Sales Representative based on the business analysis and potential territories and resources. •	Inform the supervised employees the relevant policies and regulations relating to business & customers to ensure timely implementation.•	Build up customers development strategies to develop good relationship with them.   •	Handle customer feedback and requirement timely. •	Other task assigned by Business Manager & Business Unit Head.
Job Requirement: •	Bachelor's degree in marketing or sales. •	2-5 years' work experience in selling products and team management •	Good command of written and spoken English.  •	Proficiency in MS Office. •	Share the vision •	Concise inspiring communicator •	Flexible sales person •	Performance management •	Committed people developer •	Motivational Leader •	Team builder •	Location : Icon Building (Chamkar Morn, Phnom Penh) •	Salary rank : $600-$800•	Working Hour : 8am to 5pm•	Working Days : Mon to Fri and Sat (Half Days)
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh 1st Floor of Altos Hotel, St.148 Corner St.19, Sangkat Phsar Kandal II, Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

Job Description:
•	Tracks sales data and works to achieve sales team goals. 
•	Communicate with tenant related to Sales & Marketing Activities. 
•	Contributes information, ideas, and research to help develop marketing strategies. 
•	Research and collects trends, data, demographics, pricing strategies, and other information that can potentially improve marketing and sales performance. 
•	Creates and presents regular performance reports for management. 
•	Keep yourself updated with each tenant’s sales and promotion activity. 
•	Implements and adheres to company policies and procedures. 
•	Maintains excellent relationships with tenants and other departments. 
•	Other tasks assigned by the management. 

Required Qualifications:
Job Requirement:
•	At least 1 years’ experience in related Sale &Marketing, Hospitality, Food and Beverage Industrial and retail store business. 
•	Bachelor Degree in Marketing, Business or a Related Fields. 
•	Knowledge in Digital Marketing, Social Media and Microsoft Office. 
•	Knowledge in making data analysis reports and fluent in Presentation Skill. 
•	Be challenging, self-motivated, problem solving and able to work under pressure. 
•	Goal driven and be able to work with flexible working schedule.

Job Description: •	Sell products throughout pharmacies, clinics, hospitals, and other customers.•	Meet Doctors, Pharmacist, and other healthcare workers in order to detail the company products.•	Build good relationship with customers.•	Plan and implement with Doctors and Pharmacy meetings for the promotion of the products.•	Create demand for the products at hospitals, clinics, pharmacy and other health care outlet.•	Joint and perform all other marketing activities.•	Regular feedback on the promotional strategies of the company.•	Prepare and submit sales receipt and other supporting document.•	Maintain daily record of the promotional materials issued by the company.•	Maintain daily report, tour plan, and Dr’s dairy.•	Maintain all other Kits, including uniform, working bag, literature etc. •	Prepare report to Sales Supervisor.  •	Other task assigned by Sales Supervisor and Business Manager.

job title: អ្នកជំនាញអប់រំកុមារពិសេស
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: អ្នកជំនាញអប់រំកុមារពិសេស
Job Description: អ្នកជំនាញអប់រំកុមារពិសេស មានភារកិច្ចទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារសំខាន់ៗដូចខាងក្រោម៖ក. គ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីរៀន និងបង្រៀនខ. ការងារជំនាញអប់រំពិសេសគ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងរដ្ឋបាលឃ. ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងទូទៅង. ការងារប្រាស្រ័យទាក់ទងក្នុងក្រុមច. ការរៀបចំកម្មវិធី និងចាត់ចែងក. គ្រប់គ្រងកម្មវិធីរៀន និងបង្រៀន​  1. បង្កើត និងរៀបចំកម្មវិធីសិក្សាទៅតាមកម្រិត និងបញ្ហារបស់សិស្ស។  2. រៀបចំគ្រូ និងសិស្សទៅតាមកម្រិតថ្នាក់។  3. ពិនិត្យ និងរៀបចំសម្ភារឧបទេសបង្រៀនដល់លោកគ្រូ អ្នកគ្រូតាមតម្រូវការ និងការស្នើសុំ។  4. រៀបចំកញ្ចប់សិក្សាទៅតាមតម្រូវការរបស់សិស្ស។  5. ប្រមូល និងពិនិត្យកម្មវិធីសិក្សារបស់គ្រូតាមខែនីមួយៗ។  6. Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences.
