Job Description:
• Read and publicize all official memo(s) to students, attend all meetings and orientation at the beginning and/or throughout the term (meetings and orientation are mandatory).
• Teach Literacy and numeracy along with personal, social and emotional skills.
• Employ a variety of instructional techniques and teaching strategies to meet different aptitudes and interests of students, including whole group/ small group or individual learning.
• Follow course syllabus provided by Aii Language Center.
• Help with the integration of technology into the classroom, helping set up computers and projectors, for example.
• Be well planned for her/ his class. Design and follow a complete teaching plan.
• Initiate, plan, organize, and participate in activities, including extracurricular activities, training, and workshops (extracurricular activity is mandatory if required).
• Work in collaboration with Aii Language Center management team.
• Assist in developing a curriculum that takes an overall approach to English/Chinese study and focus on a specific aspect of language use.
• Teach students English/Chinese skills, such as listening, reading, writing and speaking.
• Establish and maintain communication between parents of students and the school in the program.
• Engage parents and families in their student’s learning and acting as an ambassador for the school in the community.
• Contribute productively to the school as a whole.
• Write student report cards using the online continuous assessment with their overall performance.
• Organize learning materials and resources.
• Use a variety of activities and instructional methods.
• Assess student’s performance and progress to ensure they are mastering the skills on regular basis.
• Monitor children’s interactions and nurture cooperation and sharing.
• Follow and comply with teaching standards.
• Establish and enforce rules for behavior, and procedures for maintaining order.
• Adapt teaching methods and instructional materials to meet students’ varying needs and interests.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor degree in Education or equivalent
• Master degree is a plus
• Excellent problem-solving skills, and able to use initiative
• Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views
• Ability to calmly manage and prioritize multiple tasks
• An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude
• Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite and proficient with Social Media
• Ability to employ technology
• Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English
• Strong administrative and organizational skills

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
SVI is a leading EMS service provider and a highly esteemed Public Limited Company founded in 1985. Our company has since been providing total Electronics and Manufacturing solutions in Thailand with additional regional and global operations across South East Asia, Europe and USA. Presently, SVI is recognized as a market leader in these global markets.

Our operations cover specialized EMS manufacturing and solution oriented services; including but not limited to, Industrial Electronics, Micro-Electronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies and medical technologies industries.

Within these specialist EMS areas, SVI’s highly experienced EMS teams leave no stone unturned in our client’s EMS analysis so we can meet their every need. As a result, our EMS experts are able to continuously deliver the most competitive operational costs offering true value to all our client’ operations.

In order to adequately serve these EMS markets cost effectively and logistically, SVI’s primary operations are strategically located just 45 minutes from Bangkok’s main international airport and only 90 minutes from Thailand’s busiest and most advanced seaport.

At the heart of SVI’s solution based services and operational excellence is a professional company culture working to build amicable business relationships and partnerships.

position: ប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកបច្ចេកទេសរៀបចំសួន និងបាញ់ថ្នាំកម្ចាត់សត្វល្អិត និងកណ្ដៀរ
Job Description: • គ្រប់គ្រង និងរៀបចំដំណើរការការងារទូទៅផ្នែកទំាងមូលឱ្យដំណើរបានល្អ។• ការងារផ្តោតទៅលើ៖• ការងារសួនច្បារ រៀបចំឱ្យមានផ្កា និងរុក្ខជាតិគ្រប់រដូវកាល បណ្តុះបន្ថែម មានផ្កាគ្រប់ប្រភេទ• ការងារសម្អាតលម្អិត សម្អាតកញ្ចក់ សម្អាតស្នាមប្រឡាក់ខ្លាំង សម្អាតស្នាមច្រេះ សម្អាតស្លែខាត់ការ៉ូ និងសម្អាតទូទៅគ្រប់ប្រភេទ សម្អាតទីខ្ពស់ៗ• ការងារបាញ់ថ្នាំសម្លាប់សត្វល្អិត និងមេរោគ• ការងារកម្ចាត់សត្វល្អិតចង្រៃស៊ីគ្រឿងសង្ហារិម• ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងសត្វកណ្តៀរកុំឱ្យមានការបំផ្លាញគ្រឿងសង្ហារិម• ការងារការពារ និងរត់ប្រព័ន្ធទុយោមុនពេលសាងសង់អគារ• ការងារដាក់នុយកណ្តៀរ• រៀបផែនការការងារឱ្យក្រុមការងារបច្ចេកទេសធ្វើតាមជំនាញ (ការងារបន្ទាន់ និងមិនបន្ទាន់)។• ចុះសិក្សាគម្រោងទៅលើ សួនច្បារ សត្វល្អិត សម្អាតលម្អិត និងកណ្តៀរគ្រប់ប្រភេទ។• ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព រាល់ការងារដែលទទួលបានតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំថ្មីៗ និងការងារតាមកាលវិភាគ ដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការបន្តដល់ក្រុមការងារបច្ចេកទេសចុះបំពេញការងារ។• សហការជាមួយអ្នកស្នើសុំ តំាងពីចាប់ផ្តើមគម្រោង រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់គម្រោង។• សហការជាមួយផ្នែកលទ្ធកម្ម ឬម្ចាស់គម្រោងនៅពេលមានការស្នើសុំទិញផ្កា ឬរុក្ខជាតិដាក់តាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឬមានគម្រោងសម្ពោធអគារផ្សេងៗ។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើឯកសារទូទៅ មុននឹងបញ្ជូនទៅថ្នាក់លើ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ។• សហការជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីផ្តត់ផ្គង់សម្ភារឱ្យស្របទៅតាមតម្រូវការ នៃការប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងផ្នែក៖• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើឯកសារស្នើសុំទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើរបាយការណ៍បើកសម្ភារចេញពីស្តុកប្រចាំខែ• ចូលរួមរាប់សម្ភារក្នុងស្តុក ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិប្រចាំខែ (តាមការងារជាក់ស្តែង)• ចងក្រងគោលការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិស្តង់ដា ក្នុងផ្នែកដើម្បីងាយស្រួលដល់ប្រតិបត្តិការ ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• ចូលរូមប្រជុំជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ដើម្បីដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងទទួលបានព័ត៌មានចែកចាយក្នុងផ្នែក។• តាមដានជំរុញ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ក្រុមការងារ និងផ្តល់ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់នៅពេលដែលក្រុមការងារដោះស្រាយមិនចេញ។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការណែនាំបុគ្គលិកចូលថ្មី (ច្បាប់ទម្លាប់ផ្សេងៗ)។• ប្រជុំប្រចាំខែដើម្បីចែកចាយព័ត៌មានជូនកូនក្រុម និងពង្រឹងច្បាប់ទម្លាប់ការងារទូទៅក្នុងផ្នែក។• រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំខែ។• រៀបចំសមិទ្ធផលការងារសម្រេចបានធំៗក្នុងផ្នែក។• ការវាយតម្លៃការអនុវត្តការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ការយល់ឃើញផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។• រៀបចំផែនការថវិការប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។• ស្នើសុំកម្លាំងបន្ថែមពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ នៅពេលមានការខ្វះខាត់កម្លាំង។• សិក្សាតម្លៃដើមខាងក្នុង និងតម្លៃទីផ្សារខាងក្រៅ។• រៀបចំផែនការទីផ្សារខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ។• គ្រប់គ្រង និងបង្ហោះព័ត៌មានសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃចូលក្នុង Facebook Page។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវសម្រេចចិត្តពេលមានក្រុមការងារ សុំអនុញ្ញាតច្បាប់ ប្តូរថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាក ចុះបេសកកម្ម និងទម្រង់នៃការភ្លេចឆូតកាតចេញ-ចូល។• រៀបចំមេរៀន និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់ផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។• ថែរក្សាសម្ភារ ឬបរិក្ខារ និងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ទាំងអស់នៃផ្នែកគេហកិច្ច។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះបញ្ហា លើទីតាំងដែលកំពុងបំពេញការងារ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងអនុវត្តច្បាប់ឯកសណ្ឋានចំពោះបុគ្គលិក។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យអាកប្បកិរិយា គុណភាពការងារបុគ្គលិក និងវាយតម្លៃ។• រៀបចំទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារបុគ្គលិក (JD) ឱ្យត្រូវទៅតាមសម័យកាលបច្ចុប្បន្ន។• ចងក្រងច្បាប់ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុង (គោលការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិស្តង់ដា)។• ស្នើសុំជួសជុល ឬទិញបង្គ្រប់ចំពោះឧបករណ៍ និងសម្ភារបរិក្ខារដែលខូចខាត ឬខ្វះខាត។• ដោះស្រាយ និងសម្របសម្រួលទៅផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ (នាយក ចាងហ្វាង ប្រធានគ្រូ…) តាមរយៈទូរសព្ទ ឬតេលេក្រាម។• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមរយៈទូរសព្ទ ឬតេលេក្រាម និងដោយផ្ទាល់។• រៀបចំសួនផ្កា និងបណ្តុះរុក្ខជាតិបន្ថែមនៅថ្នាលបណ្តុះដើម្បីផ្តត់ផ្គង់តាមអគារនីមួយៗ។• ស្វែងរកផ្កាដាំលម្អតាមអគារឱ្យត្រូវតាមរដូវកាល។• របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃអំពីសកម្មភាពការងារទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែក។• ដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងបាញ់ថ្នាំកណ្តៀរប្រចាំខែគ្រប់សាខា។• ទទួលផែនការការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ឬពីថ្នាក់លើ
Job Requirement:
• សកម្ម និងរហ័សរហួន មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងមានការអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់
• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេសគ្រប់គ្រង កសិកម្ម ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៨ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Email បានល្អ
• ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស និយាយបាន សរសេរបាន
• ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់
• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
• ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា
• ការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងពីដើមរហូតបញ្ចប់
• ការតាមដាន និងជំរុញការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព និងគុណភាពខ្ពស់
• មើលបញ្ហាឃើញជាបញ្ហា ហើយដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
• ការបែងចែកការងារឱ្យត្រូវតាមជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសជាងជំនាញ
• ជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា និងចាត់ចែង និងជំនាញនៅក្នុងការចរចា និងវាយតម្លៃ
• យល់ដឹងអំពីដំណើរការនៃការងាររដ្ឋបាលទូទៅ
• ងាយយល់អំពីស្តង់ដាដំណើរការនៃការគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
SVI is a leading EMS service provider and a highly esteemed Public Limited Company founded in 1985. Our company has since been providing total Electronics and Manufacturing solutions in Thailand with additional regional and global operations across South East Asia, Europe and USA. Presently, SVI is recognized as a market leader in these global markets.

Our operations cover specialized EMS manufacturing and solution oriented services; including but not limited to, Industrial Electronics, Micro-Electronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies and medical technologies industries.

Within these specialist EMS areas, SVI’s highly experienced EMS teams leave no stone unturned in our client’s EMS analysis so we can meet their every need. As a result, our EMS experts are able to continuously deliver the most competitive operational costs offering true value to all our client’ operations.

In order to adequately serve these EMS markets cost effectively and logistically, SVI’s primary operations are strategically located just 45 minutes from Bangkok’s main international airport and only 90 minutes from Thailand’s busiest and most advanced seaport.

At the heart of SVI’s solution based services and operational excellence is a professional company culture working to build amicable business relationships and partnerships.

position: ប្រធានក្រុមផ្នែកគេហកិច្ច Supervisor, Housekeeper
Job Description: • គ្រប់គ្រង និងរៀបចំដំណើរការការងារទូទៅផ្នែកទំាងមូលឱ្យដំណើរបានល្អ។• ការងារផ្តោតទៅលើ៖• ការងារសួនច្បារ រៀបចំឱ្យមានផ្កា និងរុក្ខជាតិគ្រប់រដូវកាល បណ្តុះបន្ថែម មានផ្កាគ្រប់ប្រភេទ• ការងារសម្អាតលម្អិត សម្អាតកញ្ចក់ សម្អាតស្នាមប្រឡាក់ខ្លាំង សម្អាតស្នាមច្រេះ សម្អាតស្លែខាត់ការ៉ូ និងសម្អាតទូទៅគ្រប់ប្រភេទ សម្អាតទីខ្ពស់ៗ• ការងារបាញ់ថ្នាំសម្លាប់សត្វល្អិត និងមេរោគ• ការងារកម្ចាត់សត្វល្អិតចង្រៃស៊ីគ្រឿងសង្ហារិម• ការងារគ្រប់គ្រងសត្វកណ្តៀរកុំឱ្យមានការបំផ្លាញគ្រឿងសង្ហារិម• ការងារការពារ និងរត់ប្រព័ន្ធទុយោមុនពេលសាងសង់អគារ• ការងារដាក់នុយកណ្តៀរ• រៀបផែនការការងារឱ្យក្រុមការងារបច្ចេកទេសធ្វើតាមជំនាញ (ការងារបន្ទាន់ និងមិនបន្ទាន់)។• ចុះសិក្សាគម្រោងទៅលើ សួនច្បារ សត្វល្អិត សម្អាតលម្អិត និងកណ្តៀរគ្រប់ប្រភេទ។• ធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព រាល់ការងារដែលទទួលបានតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំថ្មីៗ និងការងារតាមកាលវិភាគ ដើម្បីរៀបចំផែនការបន្តដល់ក្រុមការងារបច្ចេកទេសចុះបំពេញការងារ។• សហការជាមួយអ្នកស្នើសុំ តំាងពីចាប់ផ្តើមគម្រោង រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់គម្រោង។• សហការជាមួយផ្នែកលទ្ធកម្ម ឬម្ចាស់គម្រោងនៅពេលមានការស្នើសុំទិញផ្កា ឬរុក្ខជាតិដាក់តាមអគារនីមួយៗ ឬមានគម្រោងសម្ពោធអគារផ្សេងៗ។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើឯកសារទូទៅ មុននឹងបញ្ជូនទៅថ្នាក់លើ និងផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ។• សហការជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ ដើម្បីផ្តត់ផ្គង់សម្ភារឱ្យស្របទៅតាមតម្រូវការ នៃការប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងផ្នែក៖• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើឯកសារស្នើសុំទិញសម្ភារចូលស្តុកប្រចាំខែ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងចុះហត្ថលេខាលើរបាយការណ៍បើកសម្ភារចេញពីស្តុកប្រចាំខែ• ចូលរួមរាប់សម្ភារក្នុងស្តុក ជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិប្រចាំខែ (តាមការងារជាក់ស្តែង)• ចងក្រងគោលការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិស្តង់ដា ក្នុងផ្នែកដើម្បីងាយស្រួលដល់ប្រតិបត្តិការ ការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• ចូលរូមប្រជុំជាមួយផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ ដើម្បីដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និងទទួលបានព័ត៌មានចែកចាយក្នុងផ្នែក។• តាមដានជំរុញ និងលើកទឹកចិត្តដល់ក្រុមការងារ និងផ្តល់ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់នៅពេលដែលក្រុមការងារដោះស្រាយមិនចេញ។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវក្នុងការណែនាំបុគ្គលិកចូលថ្មី (ច្បាប់ទម្លាប់ផ្សេងៗ)។• ប្រជុំប្រចាំខែដើម្បីចែកចាយព័ត៌មានជូនកូនក្រុម និងពង្រឹងច្បាប់ទម្លាប់ការងារទូទៅក្នុងផ្នែក។• រៀបចំផែនការសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំខែ។• រៀបចំសមិទ្ធផលការងារសម្រេចបានធំៗក្នុងផ្នែក។• ការវាយតម្លៃការអនុវត្តការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ការយល់ឃើញផ្ទាល់ខ្លួន។• រៀបចំផែនការថវិការប្រចាំឆ្នាំ។• ស្នើសុំកម្លាំងបន្ថែមពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗ នៅពេលមានការខ្វះខាត់កម្លាំង។• សិក្សាតម្លៃដើមខាងក្នុង និងតម្លៃទីផ្សារខាងក្រៅ។• រៀបចំផែនការទីផ្សារខាងក្នុង និងខាងក្រៅ។• គ្រប់គ្រង និងបង្ហោះព័ត៌មានសកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃចូលក្នុង Facebook Page។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវសម្រេចចិត្តពេលមានក្រុមការងារ សុំអនុញ្ញាតច្បាប់ ប្តូរថ្ងៃឈប់សម្រាក ចុះបេសកកម្ម និងទម្រង់នៃការភ្លេចឆូតកាតចេញ-ចូល។• រៀបចំមេរៀន និងបណ្តុះបណ្តាលដល់ផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ។• ថែរក្សាសម្ភារ ឬបរិក្ខារ និងឧបករណ៍ប្រើប្រាស់ទាំងអស់នៃផ្នែកគេហកិច្ច។• ទទួលខុសត្រូវចំពោះបញ្ហា លើទីតាំងដែលកំពុងបំពេញការងារ• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងអនុវត្តច្បាប់ឯកសណ្ឋានចំពោះបុគ្គលិក។• ត្រួតពិនិត្យអាកប្បកិរិយា គុណភាពការងារបុគ្គលិក និងវាយតម្លៃ។• រៀបចំទំនួលខុសត្រូវការងារបុគ្គលិក (JD) ឱ្យត្រូវទៅតាមសម័យកាលបច្ចុប្បន្ន។• ចងក្រងច្បាប់ និងបទបញ្ជាផ្ទៃក្នុង (គោលការណ៍ប្រតិបត្តិស្តង់ដា)។• ស្នើសុំជួសជុល ឬទិញបង្គ្រប់ចំពោះឧបករណ៍ និងសម្ភារបរិក្ខារដែលខូចខាត ឬខ្វះខាត។• ដោះស្រាយ និងសម្របសម្រួលទៅផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ (នាយក ចាងហ្វាង ប្រធានគ្រូ…) តាមរយៈទូរសព្ទ ឬតេលេក្រាម។• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗតាមរយៈទូរសព្ទ ឬតេលេក្រាម និងដោយផ្ទាល់។• រៀបចំសួនផ្កា និងបណ្តុះរុក្ខជាតិបន្ថែមនៅថ្នាលបណ្តុះដើម្បីផ្តត់ផ្គង់តាមអគារនីមួយៗ។• ស្វែងរកផ្កាដាំលម្អតាមអគារឱ្យត្រូវតាមរដូវកាល។• របាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃអំពីសកម្មភាពការងារទៅកាន់ប្រធានផ្នែក។• ដឹកនាំក្រុមការងារធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងបាញ់ថ្នាំកណ្តៀរប្រចាំខែគ្រប់សាខា។• ទទួលផែនការការងារពីប្រធានផ្នែក ឬពីថ្នាក់លើ
Job Requirement:
• សកម្ម និងរហ័សរហួន មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
• មានគំនិតច្នៃប្រឌិត និងមានការអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់
• បញ្ចប់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឯកទេសគ្រប់គ្រង កសិកម្ម ស្ថាបត្យកម្ម ឬជំនាញពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ
• មានអាយុចាប់ពី ២៨ឆ្នាំ ដល់ ៥០ឆ្នាំ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍រយៈពេល ០៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធី Ms Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Email បានល្អ
• ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស និយាយបាន សរសេរបាន
• ធ្លាប់ទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាលទាក់ទងជំនាញបច្ចេកទេស និងមានឯកសារដែលទទួលស្គាល់
• អាចបត់បែនតាមពេលវេលា ម៉ោងធ្វើការរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន ការងារមិនមានដែនកំណត់
• មានការព្យាយាម ភាពអត់ធ្មត់ក្នុងការងារ និងមានភាពរួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ និងទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ
• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ
• ការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា
• ការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារ និងការគ្រប់គ្រងគម្រោងពីដើមរហូតបញ្ចប់
• ការតាមដាន និងជំរុញការងារឱ្យមានប្រសិទ្ធភាព និងគុណភាពខ្ពស់
• មើលបញ្ហាឃើញជាបញ្ហា ហើយដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា
• ការបែងចែកការងារឱ្យត្រូវតាមជំនាញបច្ចេកទេសជាងជំនាញ
• ជំនាញគ្រប់គ្រងពេលវេលា និងចាត់ចែង និងជំនាញនៅក្នុងការចរចា និងវាយតម្លៃ
• យល់ដឹងអំពីដំណើរការនៃការងាររដ្ឋបាលទូទៅ
• ងាយយល់អំពីស្តង់ដាដំណើរការនៃការគ្រប់គ្រងសន្និធិ
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile:
SVI is a leading EMS service provider and a highly esteemed Public Limited Company founded in 1985. Our company has since been providing total Electronics and Manufacturing solutions in Thailand with additional regional and global operations across South East Asia, Europe and USA. Presently, SVI is recognized as a market leader in these global markets.

Our operations cover specialized EMS manufacturing and solution oriented services; including but not limited to, Industrial Electronics, Micro-Electronics for telecommunications components, specialized electronic assemblies and medical technologies industries.

Within these specialist EMS areas, SVI’s highly experienced EMS teams leave no stone unturned in our client’s EMS analysis so we can meet their every need. As a result, our EMS experts are able to continuously deliver the most competitive operational costs offering true value to all our client’ operations.

In order to adequately serve these EMS markets cost effectively and logistically, SVI’s primary operations are strategically located just 45 minutes from Bangkok’s main international airport and only 90 minutes from Thailand’s busiest and most advanced seaport.

At the heart of SVI’s solution based services and operational excellence is a professional company culture working to build amicable business relationships and partnerships.

Job Description: Academics- Be responsible for collecting, compiling and maintaining documents, continuing to ------- communicate and collaborate well with all generations of alumni.- Work directly with President and Principals in charge by campus.- Prepare, implement plan, monitor the implementation plan, correct the shortcomings and re-implement.- Find sponsorship and request budget for the events.- Coordinate and arranging processes with alumni.- Be a good ambassador between school and alumni.- Submit monthly report to vice president and president.- Find sponsorship partner for all AIS alumni member.- Promote alumni program on Social Media, Face book, Instagram, Tik Tok, Telegram Chanel, Link In and so on.- Develop Short-Term and Long- term strategic plans.- Collaborate with Head Principals to collect all alumni data for conducting a sharing session about benefit for alumni.- Keep contact with all alumni and collaborate with them to share their experiences to next generations.- As an advisor of AIS Student Council (AISSC), advice, give comment, and coordinate with AISSC to make the event running smoothly.Management- Empower and ensure that the school committee meets the desired standards.- Maintain accurate staff records.- Assist the school committee in the set-up of the center and ensure all resources are kept properly.- Organize meetings, trainings and workshops on request. These might include an overview to the AIS academic program, current teaching methodology refreshers and develop the new program.
Job Requirement: Job Requirements- Master degree in Education or related field- 3+ years of management experiences in education and related fields- Excellent problem-solving skills, initiative and ability to multi-task- Ability to patiently work with people from a variety of backgrounds, cultures, religious views- An approachable and friendly spirit, easy to smile and a can-do attitude- Excellent computer skills with the MS Office Suite, Google Apps and proficient with Social Media- Excellent communication skills, both verbal and written in English- Strong administrative, organizational, interpersonal, communication and collaboration skills.
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

company_name: SMALL AND MEDIUM ENTERPRISE BANK OF CAMBODIA (SME)
Job Description: ** JOB OVERVIEWTo provide overall independent, effective & efficient internal audit functions, carry out the audit assignment & complete audit fieldwork** JOB DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES- Manage auditing work in disciplines, coordinating, reviewing, and reporting of the work of audit teams; and providing expertise in auditing standards and performance criteria, and audit requirements.- Plan, assign and supervise the daily activity and work of the auditors’ department and develop and maintain productive client and staff relationships.- By collaborating with stakeholders to develop policies, procedures, schedules, priorities, and programs for achieving audit objectives and risk management objectives.- Identify, and document processes and procedures surrounding internal controls to safeguard the SME Bank operation.- Ensure that all internal policies and procedures are fully complied with by the Management and all staff members.- Advise the Management on the implication of risk inherent with new products or activities and mitigation plan.- Prepare and update a comprehensive risk-based audit plan for evaluating the effectiveness of controls in place to manage significant risk exposures.- Establish procedures and plan for conducting internal control audits.- Report findings to the audit committee.- Coordinate activities with external auditors to support their audit and review procedures.- Provide training, coaching and guidance to internal auditors in conducting audit and other related issues.- Review the teamwork as agreed timeframe & audit report.- Communicate or assist in communicating the results of the audit via written reports and oral presentations to management and ensures management response and action to auditfindings and recommendations as agreed timeframe.- Maintain confidentiality of SME Bank and customer affairs in accordance with standards of professional conduct of auditor
Job Requirement: ** PERSON SPECIFICATION KNOWLEDGE & EXPERIENCES- Preferred level of Experience (by years/function/industry):- Degree holder within Accounting/ Finance/Banking / financial industry.- Basic understanding of overall banking policy, process, manual, and flows** SKILLS & ABILITIES- Be a good team player with a sense of responsibility and adaptability.- Good computer literate (MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Email, and Internet);- High proficiency in English knowledge.- Ability prioritizes, multi-task, and work well under pressure to meet deadlines.- Skills in managing, communicating, reporting, solving problems, and interpersonal skills.- High committed, confident, and talent to work.- Complex analytical, problem solving & decision-making skills,- Strategic planning & organizing skills,- Influential communication & presentation skills.
Contact Info: Contact Information Talent Acquisition Unit HR Manager 093768111 recruitment@smebankcambodia.com.kh MEF Business Development Center, OCIC Street, Khan Chraoy Chongvar, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.  093768111

Company Profile:
Corporate Information

yes, the FIRST and BEST Digital Service Provider, is the only telecommunication company in Cambodia with 100% 4G VoLTE network. Our network is designed for ultra-high-speed usage. With yes superior internet network, our customers can enjoy the best 4G internet xperience you deserve wherever you are in Cambodia.

Our 27 yes hub nationwide is an all-in-one xperience center to all new digital users. Our yes hub warmly welcome everyone for any support, whether it’s questions about how to use the phone, sign up for Facebook page or tips on how to run a successful YouTube channel.

yes has partnered with top global brands like YouTube, Facebook, Google, top OEMs like Apple, Samsung, Hauwei, Xiaomi, Vivo and Oppo, and top payment partners like Alipay, WeChat Pay, Union Pay, VISA and MasterCard to bring exclusive experience for our customers.

yes housed more than 1,000 employees both local and expatriate. We take pride in being inclusive, leveraging and engaging collective genius to create a positive experience in digital life for all. yes aspires everyone, our colleagues, our partners and our customers to become #DigitalCitizen by using yes network as their digital identity to communicate, access digital content and perform financial transactions.

Say yes and let’s #forwardtogether!

Job Description: • The Accounting manager ensure that all financial and accounting process within an accounting department run smoothly. They oversee the work of junior accounting staff, review financial statements to ensure accuracy, and reconcile general ledger accounts. • The Accounting Manager's responsibilities include recruiting and training accounting staff, assisting in their task assigned, and instituting disciplinary measures against poorly performing employees. The Accounting Manager should also be able to keep abreast of the latest developments in accounting technologies and software to streamline accounting processes. • To be successful the Accounting Manager should be able to process large amounts of numerical data and have strong leadership skills. Ultimately, the Accounting Supervisor should have sound knowledge of accounting principles and practices and demonstrate excellent analytical and problem-solving skills.
Job Requirement: - Bachelor’s Degree in Accounting and Finance - Minimum 4-year experience in Accounting and Finance or related field- Understanding generally accepted accounting principle - Mathematical comprehension - Data analysis - Cambodia Taxation Law knowledge - Strong planning, critical thinking, problem-solving, and task and time management skills.

Company Profile:
The INRM project objective is to promote integrated landscape management for the conservation and sustainable use of biodiversity, natural resources and ecosystem services in the northern part of Cambodia. The intent is to generate multiple landscape benefits including effective conservation of globally threatened species and high conservation forests, improve management of natural resources and ensure the maintenance of ecosystem services. It is aimed specifically at improving the management of protected areas and ensuring their financial sustainability, enhancing the productivity of production and agricultural lands and improving local livelihoods. Increasing demand for forest, agricultural and wildlife products, crop land and agriculture monocultures, and infrastructure and transportation development has accelerated in recent years thereby, rapidly changing the landscape with consequential threats to biodiversity and ecosystem services. The project is thus aimed at addressing these multiple threats by harmonizing socio-economic
development, sustainable management of land, forests, natural resources and biodiversity conservation through an integrated management approach, with water as a catalyst, in Northern Landscapes of Cambodia. To achieve these, actions will be taken to – strengthen policies and
institutional capacity at the national and sub-national levels to ensure the integration of biodiversity and ecosystem services in sector and sub-national socio-economic development planning. This will be achieved within a five-year project commencing from July 2020 and expected to end in June 2025. The interventions will be mainly implemented by the project consultants, pre-identified
partners and small grant partners over three inter-related components:
- Component 1: Systemic and institutional capacity for integrated landscape management;
- Component 2: Effective management of Protected Areas and surrounding riparian and multiple use production landscapes in Norther
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    keosamnang.tiep@gmail.com PMU of INRM project, Ministry of Environment: Third floor, Morodok Techo Building (Lot 503 ) Tonle Bassac, Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia

Job Requirement:
Education: 
- Master’s degree in Water Resources Management, and/or other related fields.

Experiences: 
- At least 5 years progressive experience in planning and managing large-scale water resources management programs
- Familiarity with GEF and UNDP procedures an advantage

Competencies 
- Proven track record in similar assignments
- Proven ability to promote cooperation between and negotiate with a range of stakeholders, and to organize and coordinate multi disciplinary teams;
- Strong leadership and team building skills;
- Self-motivated and ability to work under pressure;
- Demonstrable ability to organize, facilitate, and mediate; technical teams to achieve stated project objectives;
- Strong computer skills;
- Flexible and willing to travel as required.

Language Requirements:
- Excellent communication and writing skills in English and Khmer.

Gender 
- Woman is encouraged to apply

Interested individual should submit a cover letter, CV and support reference no later than July 13, 2023 (5:00 PM) to the PMU of INRM project, Ministry of Environment: Third floor, Morodok Techo Building (Lot 503 ) Tonle Bassac, Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia and / or email to: keosamnang.tiep@gmail.com . Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.

Job Description:
- Duty Station: Phnom Penh
- Expected Places of Travel: Kampong Thom, Siem Reap and Preah Vihear provinces
- Duration: August to January 2024

The Communication Specialist will be responsible for the following specific tasks, but not limited to:
a. Conduct KAP assessment of the stakeholders at the target areas
- Review and document the existing Communication Strategies for mainstreaming biodiversity and ecosystem services of relevant projects;
- Review available existing Knowledge, Management and Communication (KMC) including awareness raising materials and Action Plan
- Assess, identify and document the potential partners at the project target areas for collaborative partnership with national governments, NGOs and local communities to
achieve broad support for integrated natural resources management across landscapes;
- Conduct consultation meeting on KAP report finding with relevant stakeholders.

b. Develop Knowledge, Management and Communication (KMC) Strategy and its action plan for Northern Region Landscape
- Using KAP report finding to develop KMC strategy and its action plan for Northern Region Landscape that includes media outreach and social media content creation;
- Propose practical platform/channel for an effective project usage and communication.
- Integrate gender, coordination, and budgeting plan into KMC action plan to mainstream biodiversity conservation and protection, natural resource management for inclusion into
key sectors (agriculture, agro-industry, tourism, water resources, …)
- Conduct consultation meeting with relevant stakeholders;

c. Consultation workshop and validation
- Work with PMU to organize consultation and validation workshop to finalize KMC Strategy and its action plan.

d. Other tasks may require.

Interested individual should submit a cover letter, CV and support reference no later than July 13, 2023 (5:00 PM) to the PMU of INRM project, Ministry of Environment: Third floor, Morodok Techo Building (Lot 503 ) Tonle Bassac, Chamkarmorn, Phnom Penh, Cambodia and / or email to: keosamnang.tiep@gmail.com . Only short-listed candidates will be contacted for interview.

Job Description:
About this role:
The position objectives are to develop and implement effective distribution management strategies in AIA agency offices to achieve business goals.

Roles and Responsibilities:
1. Implements agency-wide and location-based sales initiatives in order to achieve Agency location key result areas in 
- Monthly and Yearly ANP achievements
- Number of Active LPs, 
- Activity Ratio, 
- Recruitment of new LPs
- Persistency of existing business
2. Manages, leads and develops a team of BDMs and BDEs to achieve team performance effectiveness, personal career development and future succession planning 
3. Engages Agency Leaders and producers regularly to build strong partnership relationships
4. Implements incentives to direct the sales behavior of agency distributors towards achieving key result area objectives.
5. Enforces agency performance standards to promote business quality
6. Identifies and groom aspiring agency producers to become agency leaders
7. Formulate strategic plan and business initiatives to achieve business goals
8. Drive Agency to reach sales/recruitment target
9. Initiate tactical campaigns and agency activities to drive sales
10. Act as projects lead not limit to quality recruitment, MDRT, Leader’s development to formalize plan and execute the plan with members (BDMs, trainers, and recruitments team)
11. Communicates agency directions and information to Agency forces, but not limit to leaders and LPs

This role also performs other responsibilities and duties periodically assigned by immediate manager in order to meet business requirements.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's degree in Business or related field is preferred
•	At least 5 years of working experience in leadership and management
•	At least 3 years of experience in life insurance
•	Strategic thinking
•	Good financial and commercial acumen
•	Coaching & people management
•	Influencing skills
•	Project management skills
•	Understand market trend
•	Good exposure to a combination of the following business disciplines; finance, marketing, strategy, customer service, operations, distribution and financial services products
•	Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.  
•	Good understanding of insurance related financial metrics.
•	Willing to travel extensively to provinces
Company Profile:
AIA Cambodia is part of the AIA Group, which is currently the largest independent publicly listed pan-Asian life insurance group and the largest life insurance company in the world by market capitalisation. With our various campaigns and programs so far, we have positively impacted the lives of many thousands more. 

The scale and reach of our business provide a springboard for you to build the right skills and to grow professionally and personally. Join our bold team of young, passionate and talented individuals who thrive to invent positive impacts that uphold our brand promise – help Cambodians live healthier, longer and better lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   070 949 111 kh.careers@aia.com Phnom Penh  AIA CAMBODIA HEAD OFFICE  GIA Tower,31st Floor,Sopheak Mongkul Street,Phum 14,Sangkat Tonle Bassac,Khan Chamkar Morn,Phnom Penh,the Kingdom of Cambodia 070 949 111

Job Description: Job Overview: Branch Manager carries a sense of reliance, service, security and fullfillment to customers, dealers, and staff. Branch Manager is responsible for supervising the cahsier functions, retail financing processing and customer service duties, and ensure to achieve overall branch performance.Responsibilities- Achieve overall performance of Branch in according to the set budget with HoD;   Plan and develop action plan for own branch in order to achieve Branch’s budget;- Assist HoD and other relevant HoS by feeding input, market feedback and idea for HoD to develop department plan and strategy;- Each achievement of budget and profit budget of the amount of sales/profit/dealer development/member recruitment/card issuing/ delinquent credit management and expenses;- Facilitate, participate and drive for excellent execution for all company strategy and initiatives, which are related to branch operation. This shall include all initiatives from relevant section;- Matters related to assessment and credit control in branch;- Work processing and asset management in branch;- Ensure excellent grooming and dressing/uniform as per regulation among all staff under direct supervision;- Monitor the operational risk and business risk of own respective branch;- Matters related to HR and administration job for branch;- Market information collection and analysis of operational areas in charge;- Collection and monitor market competition and set counter-measurement for continuous growth;- Cash management on Personal Loan service and reporting to relevant sections;- Monitor dealer settlement performance ; loan disbursement and assessment speed to ensure stakeholder’s satisfaction;- Set Clear KPI for branch staff performance and monitor for improvement purpose;- Recruit, train, develop and retain branch staff;- Perform other tasks assigned by line manager
Job Requirement: Requirement- Bachelor Degree in Management, HR, or related field- Minimum 03 to 05 years experience in similar role- Experience in managing banking operations, KPIs and cost structures are advantage- In-depth knowledge of the Cambodia banking industry.- Be proactive, commitment and able to travel cross province as business needs- Good knowledge of preparing and monitoring the business plan- English proficiency with MS. Office (Word, Excel. Power Point, etc.)- Strong inter and intra personal skill, problem solving skill, critical thinking skill, and motivation/energetic skill

Job Description:
-	Partners with the leadership team to understand and execute the organization's human resource and talent strategy particularly as it relates to current and future talent needs, recruiting, retention, and succession planning.
-	Provides support and guidance to HR generalists, management, and other staff when complex, specialized, and sensitive questions and issues arise; may be required to administer and execute routine tasks in delicate circumstances such as providing reasonable accommodations, investigating allegations of wrongdoing, and terminations.
-	Manages the talent acquisition process, which may include recruitment, interviewing, and hiring of qualified job applicants, particularly for managerial, exempt, and professional roles; collaborates with departmental managers to understand skills and competencies required for openings.
-	Analyzes trends in compensation and benefits; researches and proposes competitive base and incentive pay programs to ensure the organization attracts and retains top talent.
-	Creates learning and development programs and initiatives that provide internal development opportunities for employees.
-	Oversees employee disciplinary meetings, terminations, and investigations.
-	Maintains compliance with local employment laws and regulations and recommends best practices; reviews policies and practices to maintain compliance.
-	Maintains knowledge of trends, best practices, regulatory changes, and new technologies in human resources, talent management, and employment law.
-	Performs other duties as assigned.
Job Requirement:
-	A minimum of a bachelor’s degree from an accredited institution with relevant 
experience in human resources management.
-	Minimum 12 years HR working experience in production & logistic industry
-	Have Knowledge and clear understanding in Cambodia Labor Law and Regulation.
-	Ability to implement and manage HRM functions, in line with current labor law process and procedures.
-	Proficiency with or the ability to quickly learn the organizations HRIS and talent management systems.
-	Ability to act with integrity, professionalism, and confidentiality.
-	Strong command of English language required.
-	Excellent verbal and written communication skills.
-	Excellent interpersonal, negotiation, and conflict resolution skills.
	Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail.
-	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
-	Ability to prioritize tasks and to delegate them when appropriate.
-	Proficient with Microsoft Office Suite or related software.

job title: Assistant Manager, Authorization & Card Risk Management
position: Assistant Manager, Authorization & Card Risk Management
Job Description: Job Overview:This role will be responsible for assisting day to day operation with managing matters related to card scheme daily transaction monitoring 24/7/365, support customer query and analyst the card transaction performance, card risk management analyst/card fraud analyst and managing dispute & chargeback.Responsibilities or Duties:- Control and support day to day back-office of authorization operation to ensure that 24/7/365 days is smoothly operating.- Control and support inbound and outbound calls inquiry from cardholder/customer to ensure meet customer satisfaction.- Lead and provide supporting any issues of card transaction for cardholder/customer.- Developing essential operation by keeping amendment on error/loophole and implementing improvements of Authorization by complying with bank Policies & Procedures. Such as Policies/Procedures/Operational Flows establishment.- Control and review daily card declined transaction for further appropriate - -------- - improvement of card transaction performance.- Lead and support the team for investigating/raising system issue and functionality if any to avoid interruption of daily working process of operation.- Provide and support the day to day back-office operation for card risk management.- 8. Support and monitor on abnormal transaction performance trend to prevent risk & fraud transaction.- Support and keep tracking with all fraud/risk which happen to cardholder/customer.- Reviewing system reports to minimize suspicious/fraudulent transaction risk involved.- Control and support card transaction dispute and chargeback to ensure properly processing, follow rules, and timeframes to comply with Visa Dispute Resolution.- Monitoring the update rules & regulation to comply with Visa card scheme.- To work closely with relevant stakeholders to solve any complaints including transaction disputes, card issues, and revert to both internal and external.- To support closely with IT, relevant stakeholders/related departments for system enhancement or project implementation to ensure all system related issues/problems are resolved on time.- To produce daily/weekly/monthly/yearly reports if any requirements.- Other tasks assigned by management such as reporting Line Manager/Head of Department.
Job Requirement: Requirement or Qualifications:- Bachelor’s degree in Business Management/Administration/Banking/or a related field- Minimum 3-4 years or above experiences in Cards, Authorization, Dispute & chargeback Management, Card risk & fraud management, or any related skills.- Experienced in managerial function and high capacity and ability in leading the team.- Honest, proactive, well-organized, matured, strong commitment, and good interpersonal skills- Good communication skills including English proficiency and good knowledge in Ms. Office such as word, excel, and email.- Adaptable, flexible and committed attitude and able to work under pressure/deadline.- Able to work under pressure and be self-motivated

LinkedIn: Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd
Facebook: Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description: - Financial Planning and Analysis: Financial managers are responsible for developing and implementing financial plans and strategies that help the organization achieve its goals. This involves analyzing financial data and market trends, developing budgets, and forecasting financial performance.- Investment Management: Financial managers are responsible for managing the organization's investments and ensuring that investment decisions are aligned with the organization's goals and objectives. They may also be responsible for managing the organization's relationships with investment firms and other financial institutions.- Risk Management: Financial managers are responsible for identifying and managing potential risks that could impact the organization's financial health. This involves developing risk management strategies, monitoring financial performance, and ensuring compliance with regulations and laws related to risk management.- Financial Accounting and Reporting: Financial managers are responsible for overseeing financial accounting and reporting, ensuring that financial statements are accurate and comply with accounting standards and regulations.    Cash Flow Management: Financial managers are responsible for managing the organization's cash flow and ensuring that there is sufficient liquidity to meet financial obligations. This involves developing cash flow projections, managing debt and financing, and managing relationships with banks and other financial institutions.- Compliance and Regulation: Financial managers are responsible for ensuring that the organization complies with financial regulations and laws. This involves staying up-to-date on changes to financial regulations and laws, developing compliance policies and procedures, and monitoring compliance with regulatory requirements.

At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Job Description:
To carry out the reception and control of merchandise and its storage in the stockroom, in addition to store replenishment according to company procedures, in order to ensure the store has the right product at the right time.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:

STOCKROOM MANAGEMENT

To receive and confirm boxes every day in an optimal manner.
To open the boxes received in an organised and systematic manner, according to store needs.
To organise and allocate the merchandise received according to stockroom guidelines.
To perform daily replenishment on a continual basis, according to store needs.
To reorganise stockroom space in an optimal manner according to the stage of the season and store needs – start of the season, sale period, etc.
Responsibility for maintaining a clean and tidy stockroom.
To carry out the re-labelling of garments as required (sale period, promotions, etc.).
To perform transfers and pickings quickly and specifically according to instructions from managers.
To participate actively and systematically in the end of season return, according to company guidelines.
Responsibility for controlling and monitoring stockroom materials - alarms, Pathfinder, adhesive tape, etc.
To collaborate in other store maintenance tasks, as required.o be able to deal with individual store requests quickly and efficiently.

PRODUCT

To be familiar with the products of each season - collection, initial order, colours, sizes, etc.
To use the different product lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, transmission, initial order, etc.).
To participate in updating the Merchandising and Rotation rail.
To collaborate in preparing all the material required to perform the store changes.
To be able to recommend alternative garments when out of stock items are requested.
To report to the team any issues that may affect sales (entries of repetitions, catalogue garments, etc.).
Responsibility for organising and re-allocating surplus clothing.
To be aware at all times of the newest products and what has been withdrawn to the stockroom.
To deal with flaws in accordance with company standards.
Job Requirement:
Proactive and able to take the initiative.
Organised with a certain degree of autonomy.
Flexible, adapts to the needs of the stockroom and the store.
Good communicator – listens actively and communicates in a clear and structured manner.
Manages his/her time efficiently.
Committed and willing to improve.
Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
Goods reception and handling standards and protocol.
Procedure for transfers and goods returns.
To be familiar with the different lists for managing the stockroom (pending packages, initial order, out of stock items, repetitions, etc.).
Partial inventories protocol.
Basic Customer Service Standards.
The entire collection - references, models, sizes, colours, etc.
The Rankings and the most important product lists – Best Sellers, replenishments, etc.
Organisation and application.
Able to prioritise and commercially oriented.

company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
Job Description: Job SummaryThe LnD Business Partner works closely with employees and business leaders to identify, design, deliver, develop and evaluate learning solutions that build and enhance individual and organizational capabilities to drive the success and growth of the employees and company.Key Responsibilities 1.	Work closely with line leadership to understand the business and talent pressures in order to identify individual and organizational capability gaps.2.	Collaborate with business leaders and subject matter experts to design, develop, deliver and evaluate learning and development (L&D) solutions so that the business strategy and objectives can be achieved.3.	Ensure the alignment of goals and objectives of the L&D solutions with the goals and needs of individuals and business to maximize individual and organizational performance. 4.	Diagnose and solve individual and organizational performance issues so that the individuals and organizations can achieve their desired performance and growth levels. 5.	Identify capability gaps in employees and manages and propose learning and development solutions to close the gaps and drive performance, development, engagement and retention. 6.	Drive talent development processes (individual development plan, career planning, etc.) to ensure that employees’ level of performance and capabilities meet current and future needs.7.	Support the implementation of learning management system (LMS), platforms, tools and processes to foster learning and high-performance culture.8.	Provide data-driven people and organizational insights so that line leadership team can make informed talent and capability development decisions.9.	Service as a trusted advisor on performance and capability development matters to line leadership so that they are empowered to deal with employee performance and career development issues.10.	Partner with HR Business Partners, HR Shared Services and Community of Practices to deliver great employee and manager experience of L&D services.Key Challenges 1.	Keep employee learning and development needs aligned with business needs2.	Design and deliver engaging and impactful learning and development programs3.	Ensure learning application back on the jobs4.	Balance learning and development program costs and effectiveness
Job Requirement: 1.	Education: At least Bachelor's degree (Master’s is preferred) in Human Resource Development, Business Administration, Organizational Development or related field2.	Experiences: o	3-5 years of work experience in the field of human resource management, preferably 1 or 2 years working in a HR-business partnership model.o	 Work experience in private sector, preferably in FMCG, supply chain management or manufacturingo	Experience in using LMS or other learning-related systems3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Deep expertise in business acumen, talent strategy, organizational effectiveness and data analysiso	Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including talent development, performance management, organizational development, and etc.o	People skills (broad understanding of human behaviors, motives and/or practical psychology)o	Relationship building, o	Consulting,o	Project management, o	System thinkingo	Coaching and mentoringo	Strong organizational skillso	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.o	Excellent commination and networking skills o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o	Language: Strong command both Khmer and English
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

job title: Assistant Manager, Talent and Organizational Development
company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
position: Assistant Manager, Talent and Organizational Development
Job Description: Job SummaryThe Assistant Manager, Talent and Organizational Development work closely with business leaders to ensure that the organization has the capable and well-qualified talent to drive business growth and continuity and to identify organizational performance and development gaps and develop, implement, and evaluate the required interventions to close the gaps.Key Responsibilities 1.	Analyze the supply and demand of talent through the organization and partner with business leaders to identify, develop, retain, and engage critical talent to help drive business growth and continuity. 2.	Generate and maintain a talent pool so that talent on demand is available to meet requirements for high quality talent to provide for management succession. 3.	Develop the organization as an employer of choice so that high quality talent is attracted, recruited and retained. 4.	Prepare and develop talent for future managerial and leadership positions to ensure continued business growth and success. 5.	Develop performance management framework and processes to raise individual and organizational performance and foster high-performance culture. 6.	Develop and implement organizational competency framework to provide for the foundation for strategic talent processes, including talent planning, resourcing, talent identification, talent development, career and succession planning and performance management. 7.	Develop and implement career development pathways so that talented people can advance their careers withing the organization by moving laterally, vertically or diagonally upward. 8.	Design jobs and develop roles that give people opportunities to apply and grow their skills and provide them with autonomy, interest and challenge. 9.	Plan and implement talent engagement and retention programs to enhance organizational satisfaction, commitment and loyalty. 10.	Identify organizational performance and development gaps and develop, implement, and evaluate the required interventions to close the gaps. 11.	Develop and implement change programs to achieve organizational effectiveness and promote high-performance culture.
Job Requirement: Qualifications 1.	Education: At least Bachelor's degree (Master’s is preferred) in Human Resource Management, Business Administration, Organizational Development or related field2.	Experiences: o	5-8 years of work experience in the field of human resource management, preferably 2 or 3 years working in a HR-business partnership model.o	 Work experience in private sector, preferably in FMCG, supply chain management or manufacturing3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Deep expertise in business acumen, talent strategy, organizational effectiveness and data analysiso	Working knowledge of multiple human resource disciplines, including talent management, performance management, organizational development, succession planning, career planning, coaching and mentoring, and etc.o	People skills (broad understanding of human behaviors, motives and/or practical psychology)o	Relationship building, o	Consulting,o	Project management, o	System thinkingo	Coaching and mentoringo	Strong organizational skillso	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.o	Excellent commination and networking skills o	Computer literacy (Microsoft office and other useful software) o	Language: Strong command both Khmer and English

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall N/A

Job Description: - Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources - Verify and discuss with FBP, superior on payment to client on time base on payment term contractual. And share to stakeholder. • Ensure team on simply way of working on documents activity for issue Debit Note to client - Check the source of discount, promotion scheme by clients - Check and accrual A&P Fund & Market Hygiene for suppliers by suppliers - Check Price Structure and provide LTP to Invoices team to create price list and set on systems - Check Rebate whether it absorbs by clients - Check with supplier contract for clarifications - Check other documents that provide service to supplier - Prepare DN/Invoice (Signed by BUC) for reimbursement or confirming to deduct from A&P funds - Work with team on ensure to submit hard copy of Debit Note and supporting document to suppliers - Confirm to suppliers even email after sending all the documents - Check and follow up with clients for payment overdue through email or phone call- Discuss with BUC or DCF for the disputing of Debit Note - Prepare supplier account report and send to DCF for checking
Job Requirement: Education:Diploma or basic certification in Accounting/Finance or a related discipline (preferred)Functional skills and knowledge:Demonstrate basic knowledge and understanding of the business and industryDemonstrate a basic knowledge in managing accounts payable and application of local/international accounting standards, principles and practicesProven hands-on experience in SAP accounting applications is an advantageDemonstrate strong attention to detail and basic analytical skillsDemonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spokenLeadership responsibilities:Drive self-learning and improvement in the area of Accounts Payable and DKSH behavior as part of continuous learningDelivery growth - in Asia and beyond . Join DKSH.DKSH’s strength lies in our great diversity of services, industries, clients, products, regions and employees from various nationalities. We are proud of our people: they are the reason we are successful. Our people are the best in the industry. They are passionate about their career growth and about business success. They work as part of an energetic and committed team, positively impacting millions of lives through the products and services we provide. Join us today if you are ready to “Drive growth. Be the Difference.” With DKSH, you will experience a world of learning and development, own your career and take business responsibility and have a positive impact that touches people’s lives.
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root
Contact Info: Contact Information DKSH Cambodia Administration Manager 087800338 jobs.kh@dksh.com Phnom Penh No. 797, Corner Preah Monivong Boulevard and Street 484, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 087800338

job title: Terms of Reference for Administration Assistant (Project period from July 2023 until Oct 2026 )
position: Terms of Reference for Administration Assistant (Project period from July 2023 until Oct 2026 )
Job Description:
The duties and responsibilities of administration assistant set out as the followings:

1.	Interpretation and translation between English and Khmer;
-	Interpretation in meeting, workshop and so on,
-	Translation for legal document such as related to cyber resilience, digital transformation and telecommunication, official letter, and so on,
-	Drafting meeting minutes in English on meeting, workshop and so on.

2.	Facilitation and correspondence with relevant organization for project activity;
-	Daily communication with Counterpart such as officer of General Department of ICT and other general department in MPTC,
-	Schedule coordination with Counterpart and relevant organizations for the meetings of Task forces and Joint Coordinating Committee,
-	Preparation of letter and email for requesting and reporting to relevant organization, 
-	Correspondence with government officers, JICA and/or relevant institutions or individuals for project activity

3.	Logistic support for the project activity based on instructions from Japanese experts;
-	Transportation arrangement such as Car, Flight, and so on,
-	Accommodation arrangement,
-	Coordination with relevant government organizations for extension of VISA and Passport of Japanese Experts 

4.	Collection and organization for information for cyber resilience such as cybersecurity, cybercrime and relevant issues;
-	Collection and translation official gazette in relevant for road management sector
-	Clipping news of the issues from web-site and news paper
-	Filing digital data and hard copy as above

5.	Accounting support based on instruction from Japanese experts;
-	Collecting quotation from service provider for proper procurement procedures,
-	Assist to check and filing accounting slip,
-	Calculating and organizing for accounting record

6.	Research on environmental and social consideration and related matters in Khmer and other countries;
-	Supporting research of Japanese experts, 
-	Summarize information of road management sector from Website, books and so on according to project activity,

7.	Secretarial work for Japanese experts of the Project;

8.	Advice on project activities; and

9.	Any matters which, Japanese experts think, are beneficial for the Project.

Job Description:
•	To provide legal advice and support Legal Manager in the varied, dynamic and fast-paced areas of telecommunications. 
•	To draft, review and negotiate a wide variety of commercial contracts with domestic and international partners. 
•	To draft, review, negotiate and advise on contracts within a corporate environment on a wide array of topics such as litigation and intellectual property matters, general contract law and telecommunications-related issues. 
•	To liaise with external counsel where necessary. 
•	Other related tasks upon Legal Manager’s requests.
Job Requirement:
•	A good Law Degree from recognized university in Cambodia. Having Master Degree is an advantage.
•	A legal assistant/consultant with 3-to-5-year experience in a leading law firm or in the legal department of a major company. 
•	Having experience in regulatory affairs with the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications and Telecommunication Regulator of Cambodia is an absolute advantage. 
•	Having enthusiasm in the TMT (Technology, Media, and Telecommunications). 
•	Proactive individual with an analytical mind, an eye for details and sound knowledge of general corporate law, contract law, intellectual property law and litigation and corporate secretarial matters. 
•	Able to work independently and effectively under pressure. 
•	Excellent drafting, vetting and negotiation skills.

job title: Instructor of Khmer Language for Professional Purposes
position: Instructor of Khmer Language for Professional Purposes
Job Description:
Description: We are searching for an Instructor for a new 300-level General Education course, “Introduction to Khmer Language for Professional Purposes.” The interdisciplinary course covers Khmer language and protocols in the areas of law, business, economics, politics and international relations, governance, public administration and media communications. Through a series of assignments, practical activities, and immersion experiences, students will be introduced to formal Khmer through reading, writing, speaking, role play, and site visits to the vocabulary and protocol necessary for preparation into the professional world of Cambodia.
The effectiveness of the course will depend upon immersion activities in the form of site visits, for observation and real-life practice in using newly acquired skills in language and presentation. Some possible site visits include Parliament/Council of Ministers; the Legal Documentation Center/ECCC Resource Center, and the Sosoro Museum of Economy and Money, and other contexts where students have opportunity to hear, understand, respond to and rehearse their Khmer language skills.

* Responsibilities are as follows:

- Teach one section (3 credit hours/45 hours) of “Introduction to Khmer Language for Professional Purposes.”
- Plan and create interactive and engaging lectures, in-class discussions, site visits and other appropriate activities and assignments.
- Grade student assignment and provide timely and constructive feedback.
- Assess students’ overall performance based on their attendance, participation in class/performance on course assignments, and examinations.
- Report results, post assignments and notices, and make full use of Canvas as the Learning Management System for student communication.
Job Requirement:
- Eligible candidates must have a Master’s degree or PhD in an appropriate discipline (Khmer literature and languages; linguistics; etc.).
- Minimum three years’ teaching or related experience with online teaching/in person teaching experience.
- Fluency in spoken and written Khmer and English.
- Personal experience working with protocol in various sectors (government, law, business, etc.) in Cambodia.
- Proficient Learning Management System (Canvas) or similar technology skills.
- Candidates able to teach related courses in English or Khmer (Khmer literature, history and film, Cambodian governance, etc.) are especially encouraged to apply.
Company Profile: American University of Phnom Penh (AUPP) is an independent, private, English language higher education institution, based on the American model of liberal arts education, grounded in the culture of Cambodia and fostering an environment that embraces cultural diversity.  The University offers high quality undergraduate and graduate liberal arts and professional education.  The University educates students in an environment of academic excellence, preparing them to be outstanding ethical leaders who will make significant contributions to Cambodia, the ASEAN region and the world.
