Job Description:
•	Controlling budgets for security operations and monitor expenses
•	Ensure that all security operations are conducted in a legally compliant, professional, ethical, and profitable manner in accordance with company policies and procedures.
•	Analyse and evaluate security operations to identify risks or opportunities for improvement.
•	Create or implement security standards, policies, and procedures
•	Developing work schedules, allocating tasks, and monitoring personnel performance.
•	Provide virtual or on-site guidance to security guard (Armed and Unarmed) as required
•	Review written reports and activity summaries of security for completeness and accuracy.
•	Meets as needed with stack holders to proactively address security, emergency, and safety matters.
•	Responsible for orientation and training of Security guard and other personnel.
•	Plays a central role in ensuring a safe, healthy, and secure workplace.
•	Serves as the key point of contact to ensure the delivery of high-quality security services; initiates any necessary corrective actions in a timely manner
•	Determine risks and develop mitigation strategies
•	Manage the security systems, including card access system, CCTV, fire alarms, etc.
•	Prepare reports or make presentations on internal investigations, losses, or violations of regulations, policies, and procedures.
•	Conducts regular security inspection
Job Requirement:
•	Willing to continue building skills through training opportunities 
•	Strong problem solving, critical thinking and coaching
•	Good computer skills (Ms. Office, MS. Outlook…etc.)
•	Manages a team and has advanced leadership skills.
•	Remains calm in fast-paced and stressful situations.
•	Demonstrates attention to detail and is diligent.
•	Works well independently and has strong project management skills.
•	Communicates well and has excellent written and verbal communication skills
•	Availability to respond to security alerts outside of business hours
•	Master/Bachelor’s Degree or minimum of three (4) years’ supervisory experience/expertise in law enforcement, public safety, or security in lieu of a degree
•	Good communication skills in English (Spoken & Written)

Job Description:
To work with the School Leaders and Head of Department, Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy Co., Ltd. (SCIA), a Cambodia registered subsidiary of SIM International Academy Pte. Ltd., The Intern Account receivable is reporting to Assistant Manager Finance & Corporate Services and is responsible for:

JOB PURPOSE:
* Invoicing
- Issue invoice and credit note and ensure all supporting are attached and issued on timely basis.
- Issue statement of account/ Reminder letter to students for outstanding payment
- Update the sale listing and ensure that sale listing is verified with invoice issue, supporting documents.

* Cashiering
- Ensure that collection modes are proper collected.
- Verified banknotes (USD or cheque) is valid and not fake.
- Issue receipt and verify of the amount received.
- Ensure all official receipts issue have supporting attached.
- Ensure that cash float keep safe.
- Daily cash hand over to the Supervisor.
- Updates the weekly outstanding balance.
- Report over/under between actual collection and collection reports
- Supporting work area is clean, secure, and well-maintained.
Job Requirement:
● Academic Education / Training / Experience
- Undergraduate in Finance or Accountancy
- Good in English and computer skills related to accounting.

● Personal Attributes
- Willing to work flexibly in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
- Excellent interpersonal, communication, people management skills
- Strong ability in teamwork and problem-solving
Company Profile:
Singapore (Cambodia) International Academy (SCIA) endeavours to be the centre of excellence in education and higher learning. SCIA is a member of the Singapore Institute of Management (SIM) Group, the leading provider of a diverse range of education pathways and professional training in Singapore. Recognising the importance of nurturing future leaders in Cambodia, SCIA offers the following programmes to cater to the different needs of learners:
- Early Childhood Education
- Primary Education
- Secondary Education
- Pre-University Education

With the expertise of trained Singapore and international educators, SCIA provides a holistic and rigorous education with a global perspective.

SCIA is a registered school of Cambridge Assessment International Education, and appointed by the Singapore Examinations and Assessment Board (SEAB) as an Overseas Examination Centre to conduct the Singapore International Primary School Examination (iPSLE). SCIA is also appointed by the University of London as the first and only Recognised Teaching Centre in Cambodia to offer the International Foundation Programme (IFP).
Contact Info: Contact Information HR & Admin   +855 61 777 808 careers_corporate@scia.edu.kh One Park, Phnom Penh City Center, No.58, Street R8, Sangkat Srah Chak, Khan Doun Penh, Phnom Penh +855 61 777 808

Job Description: Job Summary:Support Business Unit Controlling in FMCG reporting, analysis, performance tracking and issue management, decision support, budgeting/planning, and working capital controlJob Responsibilities:• Target and estimate accuracy, working capital control, business performance (top line, costs and EBIT), currency impact• Support manager in managing day-to-day operating expenditures against operating budgets to ensure efficient usage of resources• Prepare and consolidate information on Business Unit monthly performance based on various data sources (SAP, Lighthouse, Power BI etc.) for analysis purposes• Gather and compile financial data to support Business Unit on client performance review, profitability analysis, internal and external presentations, issues tracking and management• Furnish financial/management information as inputs to analyses of key financial items such as advertising and promotion spend, working capital utilization and cost development• Assist in the preparation of relevant information/analysis for monthly meeting internal and external• Implement Business Unit continuous improvement initiatives to streamline Business Unit controlling processes/reporting and improve efficiencies through a better utilization of automated systems (SAP, Lighthouse)
Job Requirement: ob Requirements:• Degree or professional qualification in Accounting, Finance or a related discipline• Minimum one to two years’ experience in a similar role, preferably with country controlling exposure• Demonstrate good working knowledge and understanding of the business and industry• Proven hands-on experience in SAP accounting applications is an advantage• Demonstrate basic research and analytical skills, including statistical computations• Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word and PowerPoint)• Demonstrate fluency in local language and ideally in English, both written and spoken
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Job Description:
** Your assignments will mainly focus on:
- Produce and maintain a map of threats.
- Monitor all critical system(s) and infrastructure’s vulnerability.
- Analyse incident reports and alerts, in relation with VINCI CERT.
- Perform system and application audit and produce assessment reports.
- Identify and industrialize the treatment of security flaws.
- Manage projects related to the implementation of cybersecurity solutions.
- Propose new processes and systems to modernize security management.
- Keep update with IT trends in terms of technology relevant for solutions to solve and improve security efficiency.
- Peep IT staff capacity and capability update-to-date with adequate training on cybersecurity.
- Administrate EDR, Antivirus, Firewall, Backup solutions
- Manage systems security projects as MFA, SSO, AD harderning, AD tiering, Patching.
- Produce and update security procedures, based on the Airport’s ISSP (Information Systems Security Policy)
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology
- Experience in IT project management skill (PMO) is an advantage. and ISO 27.001 certification is a plus.
- Experience in producing cybersecurity processes, threats map and action-plan.
- Strong experience in maintaining network, servers infrastructure and endpoint.
- Extensive experience working with SQL, Active Directory, Microsoft WSUS or SCCM, Sybase, MS. Net, Windows Server, VMware.
- Previous Cisco programming, Database or Scripting experience
- Experience in Aeronautical Information Technology is a plus.
- Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks and handle emergency situations
- Ability to learn new technologies quickly
- Ability to work independently, confident and highly motivated person
- Good contact with internal customers, able to explain clearly the work performed

** PLEASE SEND YOUR APPLICATION BEFORE 16 Jul 2023

Job Description:

-Complete other work-related tasks assigned by Chief Retail Business Officer

Job Description:
 Ensure Disbursements by products/Portfolio/# of clients/Net Profit/PAR/ Asset backed product/Productivity per CO/write off collection/key ratios achieved as per BP.
 Monitor and verify the list of potential customers from each branches and strategizing with Deposit Department to mobilize the deposit balance.
 Ensure that digital products have been in sales well.
 Ensure the good repayment rate of loans.
 Follow up all product performance of each branch to make sure it is growing as the set plan.
 Initiating/ guiding business strategies to branches under his supervision to achieve higher results.
 Build relationship/partnership with Merchants, authorities, and other parties to improve the business’s opportunities.
 Survey competitor products and services; and find strategies to deal with them.
 Identify the barriers and reason why each product cannot be performed better than its actual
performance.
 Regularly visit branches under supervision to identify the weaknesses, improve the weaknesses and strongly support them.
 Report to management all the issues related to business operation in the areas.
 Conduct regular meetings with branches to review their performance and take corrective actions.
 Conduct market spot check to ensure that each branch can maintain good relationship with merchants, appropriate branding display at merchant shop and good customer service
management.
 Identify potential market and/or customer segment and advise to management for finding strategy to grab the market opportunities.
 Strengthening the staff capacity on internal control.
 Strengthen branches to strictly follow credit policies and procedures.
 Review staffing plan and encourage branches to closely cooperate with HR in staff recruitment.
 Perform other tasks which assigned by Head of Business Department.
Job Requirement:
 BA/MBA in Marketing, Finance and Banking, Management or equivalence.
 Minimum of 05-year field experiences a branch manager.
 Understanding how to use financial and operational tools such as Field Visit Report (FVR), Loan Provision Report, Monthly Operation performance in making decisions is highly preferred.
 Working knowledge of local and international laws and regulations - banking and finance, obligation and contracts, etc.
 Knowledge of administrative and accounting procedures and systems such as word processing, managing files and record, designing forms, and other office procedure and terminology.
 Good commitment and hard-working.

Job Description:
• Prepare project plans, estimate resource requirements, analyze project cost (Capex and Opex).
• Monitor and report to management on project milestones.
• Manage outsourcer and sub-contractor for maintaining systems and applications.
• Propose improvement and new systems to support operations and their new requirements,
• Keep update with IT trends in terms of technology relevant for solutions to solve and improve operational efficiency and excellency.
• Keep IT staff capacity and capability update-to-date with adequate training and skill development plans.
• Manage business system and application integration, improvement & development of Management Information System (MIS).
• Identify and resolve the project issues.
Job Requirement:
• Bachelor’s degree in information technology.
• Experience in IT project management skill (PMO) is necessary.
• Experience in Aeronautical Information Technology.
• Strong experience in maintain network, IP telephone, computer equipment.
• Extensive experience working with Access, SQL, Sybase, MS. Net, Windows Server, VMware.
• Previous Cisco programming, Database or Scripting experience is a plus.

• Ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks and handle emergency situations.
• Ability to learn new technologies quickly.
• Ability to work independently, confident and highly motivated person.
• Good contact with internal customers, able to explain clearly the work performed.
• Ability to report clearly to superior.
• Cybersecurity Awareness.

Job Description:
-	Work closely with business function staff and management to understanding each process of the business
-	Identify the control weakness and control gap of each process of the business
-	Propose new control to close the gap found during the understanding each process of the business
-	Document each process of the business in hard file by highlight the key risk in each process and the control should be implemented to mitigate the risk
-	Follow up the business function to ensure the agreed Risk and Control Register Framework has been implemented
-	Document the finding of control breakdown by business function of not adhering to agreed Risk and Control Register Framework.
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor degree in Accounting and Finance or pursuing ACCA
-	1 to 2 years experiences in external or internal audit or risk management function
-	Have some knowledge of risks identification and assessment
-	Have some knowledge of control frameworks and the ability to design and evaluate effectiveness of controls embedded within business processes
-	Be honest, highly committed, and flexible
-	Able to work under pressure, independently as well as in team
-	Fluent in written and spoken Khmer and English, Chinese is a plus.

Job Description:
- Assist GRA Manager to manage and review company’s policies and SOP to ensure they are 
aligned with Business Strategy and Governance
- Assist GRA Manager in reviewing Business Process Flows Proposal to ensure for effectiveness
- Assist GRA Manager in reviewing and updating the Risk and Control Register Framework
- Assist GRA Manager to monitor the Key Risk Indicators (KRI) to ensure the Company is able to 
timely response and prevent the potential risks
- Assist GRA Manager to validate the Self-Control Risk Assessment (RCSA) for each core process
- Collect and review the Loss Event Data (LED), analyze the main reasons, and provide sufficient 
appropriate recommendations as necessary.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Accounting and Finance or pursuing ACCA
- 3 to 4 years experiences in external or internal audit or risk management with construction, 
shopping mall or Hotel industry
- Have knowledge of risks identification, assessment, and management frameworks.
- Have knowledge of control frameworks and the ability to design and evaluate effectiveness of 
controls embedded within business processes
- Be honest, highly committed, and flexible
- Able to work under pressure, independently as well as in team
- Fluent in written and spoken Khmer and English, Chinese is a plus.

Job Description:
-	Planning and performing operational and financial audits.
-	Identifying business process risks.
-	Developing testing methodologies to evaluate the adequacy of controls.
-	Documenting the results of the evaluations.
-	Developing recommendations and reports based on audits and presenting these ideas to senior management.
-	Formulating professional development and educational plans for junior staff members.
-	Planning and allocating resources and individuals in accordance with skills and schedules.
-	Manage relationships with senior management business partners.
-	Support the development of the rolling audit plan and performing business risk assessments.
-	Provide risk, control and governance consultancy to business management on strategic initiatives.
-	Provide management over a portfolio of clients and deliver high quality audit and assurance service, including preparing and reviewing audit plans and work.
-	Achieve team and individual budgets and business plan/ performance objectives.
-	Manages project financials, including budgets, timely billing and collection and variance recognition.
-	Takes a leadership role in professional, business or community organizations.
-	Coach, train and develop auditing staff to upgrade their knowledge.
-	Other tasks assigned by management.
Job Requirement:
-	Professional accounting qualification and/or a Bachelor degree and Master degree in Accounting.
-	ACCA qualification.
-	Strong background and experience with audit methodologies and techniques.
-	Minimum 4 years’ of working experience in property/real estate management or related fields
-	At least 2 year experience in managing/leading team
-	Good written and verbal communication skill in both Khmer and English, Chinese is a plus
-	Ability to effectively communicate both orally and in writing with peers, managers and clients
-	Self-organize, good teamwork and problem- solving skills
-	Strong organizational and interpersonal communication skill

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Company Profile: Urban Hub Cambodia is a multi-award-winner and one of Cambodia’s biggest fully licensed real estate developers. We are committed to developing projects that provide the new generations of Cambodia with exceptional modern living and experience of the first world that focuses on “LIVE, WORK, PLAY” yet preserving the Cambodian tradition and identity of community living.Registered in 2017, Urban Hub Cambodia is a joint venture between a Hong Kong-based conglomerate, Goldfame Group, the largest Hong Kong investor in Cambodia since 1992, and a Cambodian-American real estate company, Urban Living Solutions. Urban Hub Cambodia has quickly become a leading mixed-use property developer and the first developer ever from Cambodia to win the most awards including two major regional awards, “Best Condo Development in Asia 2019” and “Best Co-working Space in Asia 2020” at Asia’s longest-running and most respected property awards organized by PropertyGuru. Urban Hub Cambodia is behind the four most award-winning Cambodian projects both locally and regionally, including Urban Loft, Factory Phnom Penh, Urban Village Phase 1, and Urban Village Phase 2. More projects are expected in the near future.

Job Requirement: - Bachelor degree in Engineering of Mechanic, Electric, Automotive or related.- Automotive service experience or background in Technical Support, at least 3 years- Ability to put out customer’s needs first and do everything necessary to accommodate their concerns and requests with the highest level of service, courtesy and respect- Understanding of basic automotive techniques related to repair and servicing of automobiles- Ability to follow oral and written instructions with attention to detail
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  010 656 242 sokhim.pek@onionev.com Phnom Penh HQ: , #93B, St590, Vllage13, Sangkat Boeng kok, Toul Kork, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 010 656 242

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description: Executive Summary: These primary responsibilities are to plan, implement and lead the sales team to carry out the sales activities, build the company’s brand name and grow the business sustainability and through strategic planning and managing sales, marketing and resources. He/she must have strong knowledge of technical and scientific products, a passion for sales, and the ability to travel. Role Responsibilities: - Manage and ensure the profitability business of the assigned segment/product. - Work closely with vendors on sale forecast, report, market analysis, strategic plan and target.  - Delegate responsibility for product handling to sales and application personnel. - Monitor customer visit and approach of the sales team. - Provide support, training and coaching to the sales & application team. - Set individual sales targets for sales team and monitor their achievement. - Accountable for budget achievement and performance of the team. - Ensure team's competencies and ability in performing their roles well through training, coaching and other relevant supports. - Cooperate with relevant team to carry out the large-scale project when necessary. - Conduct market, competitor, and customer analysis to identify business opportunities. - Prepare business plan, budget plan, reports to Business Director. - Lead Sales team in Planning and implementing the business strategy.

Job Description:
PEOPLE MANAGEMENT
• To organise and distribute tasks and positions to each member of the team.
• To communicate actively with the team, according to requirements.
• To ensure a good level of customer service in the team.
• To participate in the recruitment of store personnel and learn to do it on your own.
• To actively collaborate in the correct integration of all new employees
• To detect the potential of each employee and mentor them in their development.
• To support with the effective management of personnel administration duties.
• To monitor and ensure the correct personal and professional image of the team.
• Wherever necessary, to manage potential conflict in the correct manner.
• To ensure compliance with the regulations and the legislation.

BUSINESS MANAGEMENT
• To actively participate in planning the required measures in order to meet targets.
• To analyse management indicators and costs in order to improve them.
• To continuously monitor sales and customer service.
• During busy periods, to dedicate time to direct selling alongside the team.
• To supervise and apply administrative procedures according to the internal regulations.
• To apply all instructions received (HQ, supervisor, etc.) and report on them (if necessary).
• To carry out strict supervision of the entire cash desk procedure.
• To participate in the optimisation of internal resources and try to minimise expenses e.g.
optimisation of the workforce, suppliers, etc.
• To communicate and pass on any information that may affect sales.

PRODUCT AND MERCHANDISING
• To be familiar with the collection and maximise sales (initial order, entries, etc.).
• To participate in the implementation of Merchandising standards.
• To know the profitability of the store and furniture displays in order to maximise sales.
• To be familiar with and apply the replenishing standards of the store.
• To respect and monitor compliance with merchandising and furniture display guidelines.
• To produce stylings, silhouettes and combinations on a regular basis.
• To control and manage stock (both in transit and in the stockroom) and inventories.
• To ensure the correct end of season return (inventories).
• To ensure compliance with the store image, maintenance and window dressing standards.
• To provide product feedback (his/hers and customers’).
Job Requirement:
• Basic knowledge of the business indicators.
• Customer Service Standard and Service Policy.
• Knowledge of the collection and awareness of fashion.
• Merchandising Standards.
• Cash register programme and Pathfinder operation.
• Internal regulations and some knowledge of employment legislation.
• Product awareness and commercial orientation.
• Organisation, management and planning.
• Able to analyse and offer solutions.
• A motivator with leadership qualities.
• Communicative and persuasive.
• Customer and image-oriented.
• Ability to adapt – energy and speed.
• Is enthusiastic, friendly, cordial and polite.
• Shows initiative and decision-making/problem-solving ability.
• Acts quickly and is multi-disciplinary.
• Self-motivating and self-critical.
Company Profile:
Since starting out in 1947, Jaspal Group has substantially diversified from import home linen distribution to a highly diversified textile driven conglomerate with interests in manufacturing, trading, retailing and real estate. The Group is known for a range of products from sophisticated to chic
ranging from men & ladies fashion, bags, fashion accessories to lifestyle home fashion and bedding
products for better living.

One of the most successful companies under Jaspal Group is Jaspal Company Limited, the top leading fashion retail company in Thailand engaging in designing, manufacturing, and marketing of several clothing and accessories brands. With over 2,350 professional staff and a network of 350
shops and corners all over Thailand, the Company has also proclaimed its reputation across Asian markets, as well as other major cities in the world.

Jaspal Group has stepped forward to expand its business to Cambodia under the name of Jaspal Fashions (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. and introduced four stores namely Jelly Bunny, Lyn, Lyn Around and CC-OO to AEON Mall, Phnom Penh. We are now ready to take a new challenge to introduce more stores to AEON Mall 2.

In this occasion, we are pleased to invite the qualified candidates who are passionate about fashion to join us and become a part of the greater success.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chin Panha  N/A kh-hr@jpsfashions.com Chip Mong 271 Mega Mall N/A

Contract negotiation

- Excellent relationship management and communication skills necessary for interaction with the Demonstrate knowledge of, and experience with, laws dealing with government and/or commercial contract administration, particularly contract negotiation, preparation and administration;

- Good planning and organization skills

Job Description:
GrThe Key Account Executive is responsible for:
-	Manage Kaiia accounts:
-	Sales forecasting: 
-	Market insight survey:
-	Build and maintain excellent customer relationships:
-	Negotiation and Agreement: 
1.	Manage Kaiia accounts:
-	Act as the point of contact for KA accounts and discuss their requirements.
-	Deliver high sales results versus targets and achieve good monthly performance according to set KPIs.
-	Execute trade programs as planned and propose effective promotions to get them implemented in the in-charge accounts.
-	Manage all aspects of the relationship with key accounts, including sales, marketing, and customer service.
-	Develop and implement strategies to grow sales and increase market share.
-	Monitor sales performance against targets and take corrective action if necessary

2.	Sales forecasting: 
-	Use market research and other data to forecast sales trends and identify potential opportunities for growth.
-	Collaborate with other departments, such as product development and marketing, to develop new products and services that meet customer needs.
-	Execute detailed merchandising, apply standard display, planogram, and visibility of the product in premises and on shelves.
-	Expand the coverage outlet and ensure the customer carries our products for all SKUs.
-	Keep the customer well informed of all launching promotions and ensure their effectiveness within the in-charge channel (Stock control, Customer database management).

3.	Market insight survey:
-	Lead market insight survey and provide feedback on a daily basis to the supervisor.
-	Suggest innovative ideas to increase sales and improve customer experience.
-	Conduct market research to identify industry trends and customer needs.
-	Use the research findings to develop new products and services that meet customer needs.
-	Collaborate with other departments, such as product development and marketing, to develop new products and services.
Job Requirement:
4.	Build and maintain excellent customer relationships:
-	Maintain dialogue with customers and handle negotiation during outlet call visits.
-	Identify and build relationships with key accounts, including retailers, wholesalers, and other distributors.
-	Develop a deep understanding of their business needs and requirements.
-	Provide excellent customer service to ensure that they are satisfied with the company's products and services.
-	Resolve problems and handle complaints in a timely manner.

5.	Negotiation and Agreement: 
-	Negotiate agreements and keep records of sales and data.
-	Attend meetings, submit reports whenever requested.
-	Ensure budget and time requirements are met.
-	Negotiate contracts with key accounts to ensure that they are profitable for the company.
-	Ensure that all terms and conditions are clearly defined and agreed upon by both parties

6.	Another taks might assigned by Head of Sales or Management team from time time. 
*Competencies Required 
●	Preferably University bachelor’s degree in Sales or Marketing or related fields	
●	Proven experience as an Account Executive, or similar sales/customer service role	
●	Knowledge of market research, sales and negotiating principles
●	Functional good knowledge in selling & negotiation skills and merchandising
1.	Excellent Comunnicaton Skills 
2.	Have a strong Collaboration and teamwork
3.	Be Flexblel and good at Negotiation Skills 
4.	Strong Leadership
5.	Attention to detail 
6.	Problem Solving Skills 
7.	Performance Management 
8.	Strategic 
9.	Project Management 
10.	Outstanding knowledge of MS Office;

Job Description:
The Sales Operation Manager will response for: 
-	Sales Support 
-	Sales Operation 
-	Order Processing and Fulfillment
-	Data Analysis and Reporting
1.	Sales Support
-	Develop and implement sales support policies and procedures to ensure that the sales team has the resources they need to be successful.
-	Manage relationships with vendors who provide sales support services, such as lead generation and customer relationship management (CRM) software.
-	Develop and implement training programs to ensure that sales support staff have the skills and knowledge needed to perform their jobs effectively.

2.	Sales Operations
-	Oversee the day-to-day operations of the sales support team, including managing workload and delegating tasks.
-	Develop and implement policies and procedures to ensure that sales support operations are efficient and effective.
-	Manage relationships with other departments, such as marketing and finance, to ensure that sales operations are aligned with overall company objectives.

3.	Order Processing and Fulfillment
-	Oversee the order processing and fulfillment process to ensure that orders are processed accurately and in a timely manner.
-	Manage relationships with vendors who provide order processing and fulfillment services, such as shipping and logistics providers.
-	Develop and implement policies and procedures to ensure that the order processing and fulfillment process is efficient and cost-effective
Job Requirement:
4.	Data Analysis and Reporting
-	Develop and implement data analysis and reporting policies and procedures to ensure that sales data is accurate, complete, and up-to-date.
-	Analyze sales data to identify trends and opportunities for growth.
-	Prepare regular reports on sales performance for senior management.

5.	Another task might be assigned by  Head of Sales or Management team from time to time

●	Preferably University bachelor degree in business management or administratio	.

Job Description:
Job Description
• Instruct the set curriculum and prepare in advance all materials and lessons
• Create a classroom environment that is conducive to learning by utilizing a variety of appropriate teaching strategies.
• Prepare a monthly overview document outlining what will be covered in the class (scope and sequence)
• Complete student report cards in each term/semester for each student
• Create newsletters and/or other communication materials for the class
• Maintain facilities, resources, and materials in his/her classroom and the school
• Provide care and ensure the safety and well-being of every child in the school, ensuring adequate supervision of a safe recreation and play period for the students during class recess or break times.
• Organize Parent-Teacher conferences at the end of each term/semester
• Attend all school functions, public seminars and other professional development activities
• Perform other reasonable tasks requested by the school management

Ethical Responsibilities:
● Observe strictly the FIS Policies, Internal Rules and Protocols
● Make use of constructive criticism and avoid the use of sarcasm, undue criticism, inappropriate language and behaviour.
● Observe professional lines of supervision and communication at all times, inside and outside the school and the community.
● Respect and protect the confidentiality of student records and information.
Job Requirement:
● Bachelor Degree in Education or relevant field with a valid teaching license
● Experienced in teaching the Cambridge International Examinations (CIE) Program.
● English as a first language or proof of excellent professional English proficiency
● Passion for teaching and working with children and young people
● Demonstrated professional and personal integrity
● Clean criminal record/background check from home country
Company Profile:
Footprints International School is an educational institution licensed with the Ministry of Education and registered under Eduinvest International Co. Ltd. The school currently operates in central Phnom Penh with one campus in Tuol Kork and another Tuol Tom Poung. Both campuses serve students from nursery to year twelve, covering the Cambridge International Curriculum and the Khmer National Program.

Accredited by the Western Association of Schools and Colleges (WASC), our community considers innovative approaches to teaching and learning the centric method to gear students’ towards our school wide learner outcomes. We support students in developing a growth mindset leading to lifelong habits in learning and a global mindset through which students adopt 21st century skills and sustainable living practices. Creativity is fostered through an integrative and experiential learning approach to Sciences, Technology, Engineering, the Arts and Mathematics (STEAM).

Our school highly values community engaged learning and experiences, with a special emphasis on Khmer Language and Culture. Through this program we aim to ensure that our learning is local, authentic and relevant. The holistic approach of these educational anchors is embedded in our vision, mission and values – and help guide the daily teaching and learning practices of Footprints.

Our core values are Responsibility, Compassion and Determination.

Job Description:
JOB PURPOSE
Providing seamless support to the Deputy CEO, VP & CEO, including but not limited to: diary management, arranging meetings and calls, report and document preparation, preparing detailed international and domestic travel itineraries, making bookings and generally being proactive to ensure the Deputy CEO, VP & CEO is well prepared for all meetings on a day to day basis.

DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
- To facilitate the organization of meetings by scheduling the meeting, inviting participants, ordering refreshments, booking equipment and meeting rooms, preparing and distributing agendas and taking minutes, and greeting visitors so that meetings are efficiently and effectively organized.
- Ensure meetings are both regular, which can be scheduled well in advance, and ad hoc, responding to urgent requests for support.
- Meetings are organized efficiently and to the satisfaction - Key support to the Deputy CEO in preparation for board committee meetings and other formal meetings.
- To organize, plan and facilitate Guest according to the instructions of Deputy CEO, VP & CEO. 
- Manage smoothest flow of document submission for approval.
- Arrange and attend Meeting, Company visit, Lunch and Dinner with guests.
- Manage travel itineraries; air ticket, hotel booking, car rental, budget planning, trip schedule, expenses clearing.
- Manage company and personal confidential data (soft and hard copies).
- Deliver message from Top management down to all related persons and ensure for the returned quick response.
- Supervise PA team to ensure the smooth operation on a day to day basis.

ORGANIZATION RELATIONSHIPS
- Reports directly to the Deputy CEO, VP and CEO’s office.
Job Requirement:
QUALIFICATIONS
- A bachelor degree with a major in business or Admin.
- At least 5 years of relevant secretarial experience to Top management in a large company with culturally diversified environment.  
- Good communication skills and the ability to work with people are essential.
- Strong leadership skills. 
- Familiarity with personnel laws and regulations is required.
- Strong planning skills.
- Great negotiator, good interpersonal skills, strategic yet hands-on in getting things done, caring and a good listener, enjoys working within a multi-cultural environment.  
- Fluent spoken and written Chinese (Is preferable).
- Quick response to the tasks given with strong problem-solving skill.
- Able to travel both business and personal trips.
- Overseas work experiences will be advantage.
- Able to work flexible hours.

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: - Bachelor's degree in engineering or a related field.- 10+ years of experience in manufacturing, with at least 5 years in the electric vehicle industry.- Strong leadership and management skills.- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.- Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.
Company Profile: MVL is a blockchain-based mobility company that started in 2018 that aims to build a reliable mobility ecosystem by recording data through innovative blockchain technology. Starting as a vehicle ride-hailing platform company under the name TADA, we have a business model that increases the application of blockchain technology through each new service we build.ONiON Mobility, a subsidiary of MVL, provides electric vehicles and related infrastructure mainly in Cambodia. TADA, another subsidiary, provides ride-hailing services mainly in Singapore, Cambodia and Vietnam and is building a mobility ecosystem by improving the profit structure of drivers through a new model that is completely different from existing companies.ONiON Mobility is actively conducting business in Cambodia by launching the T1, an eco-friendly version of the three-wheeled passenger vehicle “Tuk-Tuk”. We have established an EV factory to mass-produce our T1’s, and are operating electric vehicle charging stations all over the city of Phnom Penh. In addition to expanding our business throughout Cambodia, we are expanding our business to overseas regions by diversifying our product lineup, including the T1c for eco-friendly cargo transportation and eco-friendly bikes. In particular, the T1 provides a mileage of more than 100km and is an eco-friendly vehicle that does not have the inconvenience of long charging times by adopting a battery exchange method instead. ONiON has gained popularity in the local market by reducing maintenance costs of our E Tuk-Tuk’s by about 40% of the normal internal combustion vehicles because there is no need of frequent replacement of parts and high oil price. In addition, ONiON Mobility plans to collect and utilize all data generated from vehicles and stations for efficient operation and management at the MVL group level as well as to share the benefits to all the participants in the ecosystem created by MVL.

job title: Operation and admin officer (location: Teuk Thla, urgent)
position: Operation and admin officer (location: Teuk Thla, urgent)
Job Description:
* This position has manager to train you for 1st week, when you joined. And you will have a chance to work the following tasks and report to manager:

1) Issue quotation, invoice and delivery order/note
2) Review and monitor project expenses and petty cash
3) Count stock and arrange stock
4) Handling administration work in office
5) Control attendants and record leave
6) Collect payment
7) Assist director for project schedule and collection
8) Check the site and monitor the work progress to issue payment to suppliers
9) General sales report and customer data
Job Requirement:
1) Able to speak English is a plus and must able to use excel formula
2) Must have few years of working experience in operations and documentation
3) Able to work on detail and follow up closely each tasks assigned
4) Responsible person and able to work under deadline
5) Independent and able to deal with different level of people
6) Honest and passionate to work with positive minded set
7) Able to control documentations properly and carefully
8) Co-ordinate sales team and customers
9) Have experience on customer service 

Note: Able to assist the job as assistant to supervisor (not come to learn). 

Apply via telegram to 089 227 710 or send CV/resume to holzercareers@gmail.com
Company Profile:
About us:

Holzer Design was founded in 2001 by Mr. Alvis as originally exported wood floor to Hong Kong and Indonesia. Today is one of the leading brand in Cambodia with its main focus is on floor, wall and closet.  

Holzer Design has expanded consistently over the years and continues to provide high-quality products and services. Our clients are inclusive of Royal Palace, LBL, ISPP, TK Royal One Condominium and so on. 

Our’s management philosophy is based on committed to quality and continued thrive in changing environment. The company aims to become a leader in quality interior works and home solutions.

In order to achieve the company’s vision, we are looking employees who are responsible, committed, highly motivated, willing to work as a team and accept challenges.

Job Description: • ធ្វើការជាប់lលាប់ជាមួយដុកទ័ររាល់ពេលដុកទ័រធ្វើសេវាកម្មជូនដល់អតិថិជន​ មើល រៀបចំ នឹងថែររក្សា មាស៊ីន និងសំភារះបរិក្ខាពេទ្យ។• រៀបចំ កត់ត្រា ឯកសាររប្រវត្តិជំងឺរបស់ភ្ញៀវ សំរាប់រៀងរាល់ការណាត់ជួបជាមួយដុកទ័រ និងការធ្វើសេវាកម្ម ផ្សេងៗ• ពន្យល់ភ្ញៀវអំពីរបៀបប្រើប្រាស់ថ្នាំ តាមវេជ្ជបញ្ជារបស់ដុកទ័រដែរបានដាក់ចេញអោយភ្ញៀវ។• ក្រៅពីជំនួយដុកទ័រ ត្រូវមានតួនាទីកាន់ម៉ាស៊ីន ឡាសែរ ម៉ាស៊ីនធ្វើសេវាកម្ម ការចាក់ថ្នាំ ការព្យួស៊ីរ៉ូម ។ល។
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការ• មានបរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ រឺបរិញ្ញាប័ត្ររង ឆ្មប រឺគិលានុបដ្ឋាក• មានបទពិសោធន៏ធ្វើការនៅ គ្លីនិកកាន់តែប្រសើរ• មានអាយុចាប់ពី 20-40ឆ្នាំ• ស្ទាត់ជំនាញការចាក់ថ្នាំ ព្យួរស៊ីរ៉ូម &ការប្រើប្រាស់ម្ជុល• រូបសម្បត្តិសមរម្យ រួសរាយរាក់ទាក់ មានភាពអត់ធ្មត់ខ្ពស់• អាចធ្វើការពេញម៉ោង ចាប់ពីម៉ោង ៩ព្រឹក-៧យប់<ត្រូវចេះគោរពពេវេលានិងអោយតម្លៃលើការងារ។

Job Description:
- Manage daily stock refill for retail shop and ensure the physical inventory and stock management system are maintained accurately at the beginning of every business day
- Do monthly and annual stock planning and initiate the strategies to ensure to maintain stock levels for supporting the sale demand;
- Manage and develop stock policy with clear process and ensures the stocks are manage effectively;
- Ensure the implementation of stock policy is accurate and followed by all team members
- Ensure the risks are minimized and avoided frauds such as cheating
- Engage and lead stock team by monitoring and checking /following up the team’s work to ensure effectiveness and efficiency of the operation department
- Manage and maintain stock systems to ensure the stocks are well organized and sufficient stock for daily business operation at retail business partner;
- Review the bar code system of each product and check the number of actual products and quality of products, ensure the products are kept in warehouse properly
- Provide training or coaching session to stock team and relevant sales staff at each shop regarding excesses and shortages of products
- Review and check the inflow product and outflow product report based on the actual flow of products
- Submit monthly stock report to the Managing Director and propose the recommendations if needed
- Verify stock in and Stock out report submit by stock keeper, and take action in case stock error between in system and stock report on hand.
- Finding stock error or mistakes occur by take in & take out and provide and recommend stock problem solving.
- Alert to Operation for any risks that will be happened to the company and propose the best solution for taking appropriate actions
- Other job assign by Managing Director
Job Requirement:
1- BA in Business Administration or other related field
2- At least 5 years experiences in inventory Management,
3- Competence in Computer skill (Ms. Word and Excel) and stock management system
4- Demonstrate the ability to communicate and negotiate
5- Demonstrate the ability to do the analysis and forecasting about the products movement.
6- Analytical skill
7- Attention to detail
8- Effort and reliability
9- Problem solving skill
10- Ability to prioritize and manage time effectively
11- Possess mathematical skill

- Working Day: Mon-Sat, Day off: Sun
- Working Hour: 08 hours per day.
- Gross Salary: 500-Up (Negotiation)

* Other Benefit:
- A/L: 18 Days, SL: 6 Days, Reserve Leave: 7 days
- Vacation 1 Week-2 Weeks
- Annual Bonus & Gift
- Training & Development
- Insurance 24 hours
- Annual Party
- Annual Increment
- Other benefit

Company Profile:
The Essilor Group has put its expertise at the service of good vision in designing, manufacturing and distributing quality products and services through innovative business models. Today we provide solutions to correct and protect the visual health of the 7.4 billion people in the world.

To achieve this ambition, we place our mission of improving lives by improving sight at the heart of everything we do, respecting the values and principles that have shaped the Group for near 170 years. Our mission unites our 67,000 employees across the world, drives our strategy, stimulates innovation and guides

our commitments to each of our stakeholders. Essilor group has a wide variety of job areas and functions: sales, marketing, R&D, engineering, operations, production or instruments and equipment as well as finance, HR, information systems… With a fast-growing global presence in its historical lenses activity, but also in new markets with their own specific business roles – sunwear, reading glasses, photochromic lenses and online sales – the company offers a multitude of career paths, often international, that will develop your skills and grow you permanently.

To support our growth, we’re recruiting new team members with a variety of skills and complementary talents… Why not you?

Read more on https://www.essilor.com/

Job Description:
- Implement action plans (e.g. make regular calls/visits, take orders, etc.) to achieve sales targets for assigned businesses/territories
- Track individual progression against key performance indicators and sales plans through BI system. Prioritize and review daily sales activities performed
- Execute sales activities for assigned businesses
/territories, including product portfolios and marketing plan introductions, order taking, marketing display set-ups and in-store merchandising

- Execute continuous improvement activities to enhance sales processes, sales plans, customer satisfaction.

- Respond to customer orders and queries. Inform current and prospective customers of promotions and new/upgraded products
- Work with internal stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of products. Support internal stakeholders in relationship development with key customers

Company Profile:
Established in 2021, Mango Finance PLC is a digital microfinance startup based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia, capitalized by an investment from Vipar Auto FZCO, Dubai. With direct access to over 100,000 customers, we are capturing the opportunity to lend digitally and securely.

Mango Finance PLC intends to transform the microfinance landscape in Cambodia by leveraging the powers of technology and data. We believe in improving access to capital for the unbanked in Cambodia, with our proprietary credit scoring engine.

Mango Finance PLC is a licensed Microfinance Institution, regulated by the National Bank of Cambodia. Please visit www.mangofinance.net for more information.

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description:
•	Ensure smooth mall operation and provide a safe, secure, convenient and comfortable shopping mall to customers by collaborate with nominated contractor. 
•	Monitor nominated contractor's staff and outsourced staff to deliver tasks on time with good service performance by measuring with agreement and scope of work or KPI. 
•	Implement the management system related to Tenant's responsibilities and ensure their activities are completed in compliance with the company and mall's rule and regulation. 
•	Prepares plan, training material and procedure for abnormal situation, emergency case and accident case then keeps plan updated and preparedness; And conduct training/drill to related parties. 
•	Handle complaints and problems from customers and request from tenant, ensure that all claims are in line with company policy 
•	Contributes and analyze information, ideas, and research to help develop operation workflow and reduce operation expenses. 
•	Other tasks as assigned by the superiors.
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor's Degree in Management or any other relevant. 
•	2-year Experience in human and organizational performance (HOP) would be beneficial. 
•	Experience in systematic and compliance standard awareness is a plus. 
•	Computer literacy MS Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Team and Internet/Email. 
•	Fluency in English both writing and speaking. And fluent in Presentation Skills is a plus. 
•	Good communication and negotiation with levels authorities/entities. 
•	Goal-driven, strong commitment and accountabilities. 
•	Strong organizational and leadership skills. 
•	Be patient, self-motivated and problem solving, team building capabilities. 
•	Be able to work with a flexible working shift schedule (including weekends & public holidays).
Company Profile:
AEON MALL is the Japan’s Largest Specialist Shopping Mall Developer. We not only develop but also operate over 150 shopping malls throughout Japan and other countries. On expanding retail business across Asia, AEON MALL has opened our third biggest shopping mall in 2022.

Job Description:
Provide day-to-day  IT support for desktop computers, laptops, printers, and associated software.
- Perform physical cable management and cables installation such as network, telephone, and security cameras in the company.
- Perform physical service support for computer moving and printer or other IT equipment during there are any office move.
- Assist as help desk and technical support for all users.
- Installation & preparation of computers for newcomers with appropriated software and antivirus software.
- Assist IT Manager to implement the new project as per company business requirement.
- Make order IT spare part, maintenance, and replacement a part to the server, computer workstation and others IT devices (Sometimes included plotter printer repair and others company printer as much as possible) with IT Manager.
- Manage IT documents and users' request forms.
- Other Tasks assigned by top management.

•First year student or just graduate.

•Performing network, System, CCTV, support users fixing computer software & hardware.

Company Profile: Volumecocomo Apparel (Cambodia) Inc. (VCAC) was formed in Cambodia in 2006 by U.S. shareholders as an apparel manufacturing company selling women’s garments to U.S. wholesaler.  It performs all apparel manufacturing functions including patterning, marking, making samples, material purchasing, production, IT, shipping, administration and accounting.  Cocovol Apparel Cambodia, Inc. (”Cocovol”) took over VCAC’s operation in 2014.

Company Profile:
Hong Lai Huat Group Limited (HLH Group) is a well-established and reputable real estate and property developer with 30 years of successful track record. Established since 1998, the Group has completed numerous projects in Singapore ranging from public and private resident developments, to commercial and industrial building. Some of its notable developments include D’Ecosia, D’s Fresco, D’s Castilia, D’Almira, D’ Lithium, D’Kranji Farm Resort and D’Centenial.

In 2008, the Group diversified into the agriculture sector in Cambodia and had since completed the development of a 10,000 hectares farmland that cultivates cassava, as well as invested in a cassava starch production factory.

The Group also expanded into property development in Cambodia with the development of its first freehold mixed-used project- D’ Seaview, in Sihanouk Ville. One of the largest mixed-use developments in Sihanouk Ville, D’Seaview comprises 737 residential units and 64 commercial units. HLH Group was listed on the Mainboard of the Singapore Exchange on 21st June 2000.

job title: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម
company_name: ជាង បាក់ វណ្ណ ហុង
position: បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម
Job Description:
Main purpose of the job (គោលបំណងចម្បងនៃការងារ):
បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជាទិញសម្ភារៈ ឧបករណ៏ និង សេវាកម្ម មានតួនាទីជួយសម្រួលការងារក្នុងផ្នែកដូចជា៖
- ធ្វើការត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងធ្វើការវិភាគសំណើពីអ្នកស្នើរសុំ
- វិភាគទីផ្សារ និងស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ 
- ប្រៀបធៀប និងវិភាគសំនើរដែលបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ចរចារកិច្ចសន្យាព្រមព្រៀងតម្លៃ និងធ្វើការបញ្ជាទិញ
- តាមដានលើការបញ្ជាទិញដែលនាំមកនូវគុណភាព និង សេវាកម្ម 
- និងរៀបចំឯកសារនិងរបាយការណ៍ពាក់ព័ន្ធផ្សេងៗ

Main Duties (ភារកិច្ចចម្បង):
- ស្វែងរកអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់ដែលមានសក្កានុភាព
- ប្រៀបធៀប និងប៉ាន់ស្មានបានពីអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- ស្វែងយល់ពីលក្ខខណ្ឌនៃការដឹកជញ្ចូនទំនិញ និងការទូទាត់
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពនៃទំនិញដែលបានបញ្ជាទិញ
- ធានាអោយបាននូវការកត់ត្រាថ្មីៗនៃទំនិញដែលបានទិញ ពត៌មានការដឹកជញ្ជូន និងវិក័យបត្រ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍លើការបញ្ជាទិញ រួមបញ្ចូលទាំងការវិភាគថ្លៃដើម
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យកម្រិតស្តុក 
- ផ្តល់ពត៌មាននៃការអភិវឌ្ឍថ្មីៗក្នុងការិយាល័យបញ្ជាទិញដូចជាការប្រែប្រួលតម្លៃ លក្ខខ័ណ្ឌទីផ្សារ និងផលិតផលថ្មីៗ
- រក្សាតារាងដេញថ្លៃ ឯកសារតម្លៃទំនិញ ឯកសារអាជីវកម្ម និងឯកសារវិភាគសំណើរផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមតម្រូវការសម្រាប់ប្រតិបត្តិការដែលមានប្រសិទ្ធិភាពនៃការងារបញ្ជាទិញ
- បង្កើតPO ក្នុងប្រពន្ធ័អេឡិចត្រូនិច NAV 
- រៀបចំបែបបទនិងឯកសារនៃការបញ្ជាទិញ និងបញ្ជូនទៅផ្នែកគនេយ្យដើម្បីធ្វើការទូទាត់ជូនអ្នកផ្គត់ផ្គង់
- គោរពគោលការណ៏ និងអនុវត្តន៏ក្រមនិតិវិធីនៃការបញ្ជាទិញអោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន

Occasional Duties (ភារកិច្ចម្តងម្កាល):
- ការងារផ្សេងៗទៀតតាមដែលថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រងផ្តល់អោយធ្វើ

job title: Officer, Fuel and Spare Part Control
company_name: One Fraternity Co., Ltd. (Vital Premium Water, Mee Chiet)
position: Officer, Fuel and Spare Part Control
Job Description: Job SummaryThe overall role of this role is to monitor daily use of vehicles’ spare part and fuel liquid, track stock movement and prepare report to superior to make sure fleet operation is running smoothly following ISO standard.  Key Responsibilities o	Monitor vehicle spare pare daily to ensure the availability for vehicle repairing.o	Fill diesel to vehicle tank and prepare report daily.o	Track fuel and spare part stock movement o	Prepare and process Purchase Requesto	Monitor GPS to make sure drivers drive in right direction.o	Other tasks assigned by superior or manager.
Job Requirement: Qualifications 1.	Education: o	Bachelor or Associate Degree in Administration, Accounting, or Automotive Mechanic is a plus.  2.	Experiences: o	Two years' experience in spare part or fuel stock control or a similar industry.3.	Skills and knowledge: o	Spare part or fuel stock control knowledge.o	Be able to use Advance Excel, Outlook and SAP.o	Reporting and document control knowledge.o	Demonstrate good mathematical calculationso	Be able to use English language in communication.o	Know geographical roadmaps and Monitor GPS.
Company Profile: One Fraternity is a Cambodian-owned company specializing in sales, distribution, and marketing of a wide range of consumer products. Since the establishment in 2010, we have extensive experiences and affiliations with diverse stakeholders, including government institutions, businesses, wholesalers, retailers, agents, and customers across Cambodia. With broad distribution channels and industry expertise, from market research and analysis, assessing customer needs, sales, marketing, or distribution, we help build the strategy that works for our business partners who want to grow their businesses in new and existing markets in Cambodia.

job title: ជំនួយការរដ្ឋបាលនិងគណនេយ្យ
position: ជំនួយការរដ្ឋបាលនិងគណនេយ្យ
Job Description:
-	កត់ត្រារាល់ប្រតិបត្តិការទាំងអស់តាមឯកសារយោងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវនិងទាន់ពេលវេលា
-	ពិនិត្យការកត់ត្រាក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធប្រចាំខែ ដើម្បីធានាបាននូវភាពត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៌ប្រចាំខែ សម្រាប់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
-	អនុវត្តការរក្សាឯកសារកំណត់ត្រានិងឯកសារយោងផ្សេងៗអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	ទទួលខុសត្រូវគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុកសម្ភារៈនិងបរិក្ខាភស្តុភា អោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	ធ្វើការកត់ត្រា រាល់ការចេញចូលនៃស្តុកសម្ភារៈនិងបរិក្ខាភស្តុភា
-	អនុវត្តការងាររដ្ឋបាលទូទៅដើម្បីសម្រួលការងារដល់ការដ្ឋាន
-	ការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
-	បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សា ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ និងធនាគារ ឬផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារយ៉ាងតិច 01ឆ្នាំ ផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ឬផ្នែកពាក់ព័ន្ធ
-	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់កំព្យូទ័រ កម្មវិធី QuickBooks, Microsoft Word, Excel

company_name: Rep Office of Target Global Sourcing Limited
Job Description:
** PRIMARY FUNCTION
- Deep knowledge of product compliance, quality & regulatory requirements with a focus on product
- Responsible for proactive and preventive quality assurance and control, delivering end to end result through QMS activities
- Factory elevation through technical support to drive for continuous improvement of manufacturing processes
- Ensure vendors deliver safe and quality owned brand product
- Leverage analysis and reporting on vendors & factories performance with a feedback loop
- Actively influence decision-making and address business needs through active engagement with CFT/business partners
- Conduct calibration activities on process and product for 3rd parties, vendors and factories
- Sit in the round table with cross function team and provide product & technical knowledge to ensure aligned with sourcing goal

** PRINCIPAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
1. Key Competency Expectation
* Product and Technical knowledge
- Category level product knowledge; understand the guest expectation/brand expression through product standards, specification, approved samples and testing requirement/
protocols to support field operations
- Ensure Target products are good & healthy, safe to use, guest friendly and durable & functional through product lifecycle
- Knowledge of product and manufacturing process risk assessment and mitigation to support product development Identify and validate key quality and capability callouts (e.g., manufacturing variability, critical to quality, manufacturability to scale) from product development stage through a robust MCP
- Deep understanding of capacity analysis – annually as well as during production readiness to ensure appropriate capacities are allocated, both holistically and at a program level.
- Ability to understand diverse and ever evolving manufacturing processes
- Understand process management - able to determine the critical processes to quality and its controls to prevent or mitigate potential issues/risks
- Knowledge of tools from Lean/6 Sigma/TOC/SPC to assess factory's performance to support OBSD strategy
- Technical ability to assess and resolve product and inspection issues
- Build one's own technical expertise in a structured and systematic way
- Understanding of cost engineering to support factory’s drive towards efficiency and right first time quality

* Quality Strategy and Management
- Understand and be able to assess the effectiveness of a factory’s preventive QMS and its sustainability, across diverse manufacturing processes
- Drive continuous improvement of a factory’s quality management system, shifting focus from detection to prevention.
- Plan for quality through preventive product risk mitigation, factory capability assessment and capacity validation prior to production.  
- Strategic overview of the factory’s performance in order to prioritize and identify areas of opportunity to drive elevation
- Evaluate the health of the factory’s QMS
- Support 3rd party escalation, disposition and CAPA reviews for continuous improvement
- Understand the guest expectation through voice of the guest
- Support ME initiatives focusing on efficiency and right first time quality

* Data/Reporting and Analytical thinking
- Ability to review data and conduct statistical analysis
- Leverage data to identify opportunities for calibration, continuous improvement and problem-solving
- Drive cost of poor quality reduction with a focus on greater efficiency and right first time quality
- Understand industry and share business intelligence with CFT teams when needed
- Engage in proactive sourcing and category management from technical, quality and engineering perspective to drive robust business placement decisions
- Extensive use of quantifiable data and KPIs in decision-making; to provide performance feedback to vendors/
factories.

2. Communication/CFT Collaboration/Training
- Share lessons learned in quality planning activities and core processes
- Support calibration activities for 3rd parties, vendor and factories
- Act as technical liaison between HQ PSQA, Vendor/Factory partners and cross functional teams
- Ensure transparency and adherence to escalation process when required
- Provide ongoing support to PSQA HQ for continuous improvement, issue resolution and problem solving
- Successfully navigate through tough choices and be able to articulate a strong point of view both internally and externally - to leaders, peers, team members and vendor/
factories.
- Engage in factory matrix optimization and influence business decisions through CFT collaboration based on business needs and quality performance
- Steer decision effectiveness and efficiency; take smart risk based on facts, figures and guest insights through critical thinking
- Provide expertise to validate CFT’s business decision and increase supply matrix visibility through factory assessment
- Engage in new vendor/factory vetting and exploration process that supports sourcing decision-making and long-range business plan

3. Operational Excellence and Brand Reputation
- Adapt to change and adhere to Target strategy, direction and business goals Continually focus on and demonstrate commitment to concepts of value creation through COQ/Lean/
Six Sigma tools/efficiency
- Ensure transparency and adherence to escalation process when required
- Demonstrate the highest level of ethics; make ethics a mantra for TGT and supply chain
- Escalate critical issues concerning ethics, through the proper channels
- Provide ongoing support to PSQA HQ and PSQA QMS Team for continuous improvement, issue resolution and problem solving
- Support HQ through product investigations and activate on guest data analysis appropriately.
- Investigate quality issues, ensure effectiveness of CAPA and validate vendor/factories are driving toward continuous improvement.
Job Requirement:
MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS:                                                                                      
·       Bachelor degree in engineering
·       Technical disciplines equivalent in retail compliance/manufacturing
·       Quality management, raw material, product, and manufacturing industry experience/knowledge in apparel and hardlines & home
·       Minimum 5-8 years’ experience in garment industry, experience in hardlines & home is an advantage
·       Background in quality and technical/engineering perspective
·       Knowledge of quality tools RCA/Fishbone/Lean/Six Sigma/Industrial Engineering Experienced in line setup
·       Good communication skills and strong interpersonal skills
·       Collaborative focus and ability to work successfully across functional areas
·       Language: fluent in English and local language
·       Working Knowledge of Technology, Data and analytics including Microsoft windows and Office software applications
·       Knowledge of Statistical analysis
·       Ability to travel often domestically and overseas

** DESIRED REQUIREMENTS:
·       Experience in retail purchasing operations or support (Sourcing, procurement, QA, development, etc.)
·       Certified Quality Engineer
·       Six Sigma or Lean certified preferred

** Benefits
Eligible team members will receive one of the best earnings packages anywhere, including competitive pay, all-around insurance coverage, training and development and many other perks and benefits. Target is an Equal Employment Opportunity Employer and is a drug-free workplace.
Company Profile: Target is an iconic brand, a Fortune 50 company and one of America’s leading retailers. Target Merchandising is evolving at an incredible pace. We are constantly reimagining how this $100 billion retailer offers the innovative, guest-inspiring items that Target is known and loved for. Our goal is to deliver exceptional value, quality and style to elevate Target as the premier retailer in a competitive global marketplace. Through intelligent and progressive business strategies that make the most of Target’s resources and partnerships worldwide, Merchandising works across product categories to create a localized shopping experience online and in our 1800 stores. Are you a creative problem solver who loves to see your work translate into real results? Can you collaborate effectively, execute a plan efficiently and positively influence how Target chooses and presents the right product in the right place at the right price? If so, you will have success on one of our dynamic teams.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department    saovanee.weeramaytangkoon@target.com Keystone Building- #146, 9th floor, Norodom Blvd, Tonle Bassac, Phnom Penh, Cambodia.

Job Description:
** Database Administrator:
-	Install server software
-	Configure database servers
-	Monitor and maintain system health, performance and security
-	Design backup processes for server and associated data
-	Create accounts for all users and assign security levels
-	Establish a disaster recovery protocol
-	Provide end-to-end technical support and problem resolution
-	Schedule and perform regular server maintenance

-	Research and deploy new database management tools, solutions and technologies.

-	Participating in system planning and optimization.
-	Participating in analysis and design of application programs related to the system part (server, storage, data backup / recovery).

-	Install and deploy new server resources for software projects Applications, operating systems: Windows Server, Linux, CentOS, Ubuntu, ...

-	Monitor, test, classify, evaluate and warn of the danger level of warnings arising from the network security monitoring system.
-	Administration, monitoring, troubleshooting on application security systems.
