Job Description:
* Position Title: HSEQ Assistant (Health, Safety, Environment & Quality)
* Reporting Line: HSEQ Manager

** Key Responsibilities:
- Follows-up HSEQ relevant cases if timely created, updated, acted and closed out. Establishes periodic review with concerned departments and summarizes the updates for presentation during each
- Assist in identifying high potential or high severity incidents and triggers analysis and actions.
- Highlights pending actions particularly the high priority ones until proper closure or completion is achieved.
- Organization /planning of HSE meetings, Management team safety visits & inspections
- Internal coordination with concerned department/site on scheduled HSEQ audits by a party internal to TEMC or the Group, or by an External party
- Planning/schedule/coordination of HSEQ trainings in coordination with the concerned department(s).
- Collation/follow-up of all type of HSEQ actions & reports from different departments (performance/activities
/incidents/audits)
- Drafting of internal communication on HSEQ news, new guidelines, Return of Experience and milestones
- Planned observation of emergency response exercises in the depots, HSE meeting in sites and HSEQ audits
- Coordination with concerned government agencies and with concerned departments in terms of compliance/reporting requirements
- Inventory, control & issue of PPEs
- Conduct safety tour, joint safety tour & night spot check
- Assist HSEQ manager for all the administrative works, follow up Opex, maintaining all the HSEQ files
- Other tasks which assigned by HSEQ manager

** Accountabilities:
- Responsible for all aspects of the HSEQ Department and by extension for the overall HSE strategy of the Company & Responsible for the implementation/maintenance of the
necessary HSE related procedures and also for Emergency response including the CMC
- Overall monitoring and follow-up of HSEQ activities/
program
- Breakdown times are minimized and accidental damage to equipment are identified and analyzed
- Enforce company ethics, rules and regulations over staff & contractors & Compliance to HSE and Technical Standards
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: Engineering Degree with at least 1 year experience administrative or project support functions
- Skill: Good Project Management Skills, knowledge on Contractor Safety Management & Good interpersonal & Supervisory skills
- Knowledge: MS Office, Auto CAD, MS Project, Internet and Email proficiency
- Language: Good Written and Oral English Communication Skills
- Valid driving license
Company Profile:
TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. (previously called TOTAL Cambodge) is an affiliate of TotalEnergies, a broad energy company that produces and markets energies on a global scale: oil and biofuels, natural gas and green gases, renewables and electricity. Our 105,000 employees are committed to energy that is ever more affordable, clean, reliable and accessible to as many people as possible. Active in more than 130 countries, TotalEnergies puts sustainable development in all its dimensions at the heart of its projects and operations to contribute to the well-being of people. 

TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been officially operating in Cambodia since 1993. Throughout the country, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd. has been involved in marketing various energy and lubricants products and services to its customers in both the private and public sectors. We offer a wide range of products through more than 100 service stations with over 52 Bonjour Shops, Industrial fuels, Aviation fuels and lubricants. Through the TotalEnergies Card, customers are offered a convenient way to make and manage fuel purchases. Other services offered include used oil analysis, tank installations and bulk deliveries to many of our Commercial customers.

In view of supporting its growth in Cambodia, TotalEnergies Marketing (Cambodia) Co., Ltd.  is looking for a talented and motivated candidate for the position as follow:


Applications should be submitted via email: sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com *Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms Lypy LY   sm-kh.hr@totalenergies.com ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St 271, Beoung Tumpun, Meanchey, Phnom Penh – CAMBODIA

Job Description:
* Internal Control & Audits:
- To ensure the internal control procedures of TotalEnergies are compliance with M and MS APMO procedures and guidelines
- To design, plan and execute the affiliate’s annual internal audit and control plan
- To assist all departments to promote and implement the relevant internal audit procedures
- To carry out internal audit reviews with each department, to help them identify the gaps that exist and produce action plans to remediate the situation as quickly as possible
- To participate audit missions as validated by the Managing Director
- Review and update existing controls based on risk analysis

* Business Support:
- Provide analytical assistance for department, looking at new projects for their conformity to the procedures
- Any major project due diligence works that may be required from compliance point of view
- Project valuation and investment file assistance as required (return on investment, cash
out planning, etc.)
- Monitor the internal controls of all departments and recommend changes to strengthen the internal controls/
processes as applicable
- Any business analysis and study ad hoc analysis that may be required from time to time by the Managing Director

* System Support
- Template light support coordination for all departments (eg management of profiles in case of conflicts in duty segregation)
- Optimize the usage and evolution of TL within the affiliate
- Promote good practices and exchanges among departments
- assist HR & CSR to put in place relevant training and refreshers to have continuous improvement in this area

* Risk Management:
- perform risk analysis and propose and follow up action plans to be closed

* Anther role
- Organize and carry out internal controls and audits of the relevant departments and make proposals for improvement
- Ensure proper financial analysis and reviews for development projects and optimize their financing structure
- Coordinate TL support to provide effective and efficient support to TL users in the business
- Organize ongoing SAP training and share best practices of the system among users optimization of time, given multiple tasking requirements, and identification of priorities
(in conjunction with the relevant managers)
Job Requirement:
- Educational background: Degree in Business/Finance/Account from a recognized tertiary institution
- Years of Experience: A minimum of 7 years of Experience in external or internal audit in multi business environment
- Skills: Fluency in both English writing and speaking. Master in French Language is added advantage
- Knowledge: Knowledge of overall SAP or experience in using and implementing SAP system, and good understanding of accounting principles and methods. Rigor, autonomy, patience, analytical skills, self-organization and strong communication skills

** Applications should be submitted via sm kh.hr@totalenergies.com or to our Head Office, ANINA Building 6th Floor, No 240, St. 271, B.P600, 12351 Phnom Penh, Cambodia
Please note that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for interview.

Company Profile:
Amret (https://www.amret.com.kh) is a leading microfinance institution established in 1991 that contributes to the economic and social development of Cambodia by providing a wide range of financial services to meet the needs of the large targeted customers. Amret has strong commitment and long-term business strategies to be a leading financial institution in the market by deploying ambitious digital strategies. 

Amret belongs to the Advans international group (www.advansgroup.com) a major shareholder and international shareholder (FMO and IFC). The Advans group serves over 750,000 clients, and has expanded its operations in nine countries such as Cambodia, Cameroon, Ivory Coast, Democratic Republic of Congo, Ghana, Myanmar, Nigeria, Pakistan, and Tunisia. 

Amret has more than 150 branches, located in 25 cities and provinces in Cambodia, and successfully serves 450,000 customers with around 4,000 highly dedicated employees.

Job Description: • Develop, review and ensure effective implementation of operational risk management (ORM) and non-financial risk policies and procedures. This includes outsourcing assessment, business continuity management.• Develop, monitor and review risk appetite for operational risk and non-financial risk;• Ensure effective implementation of ORM tools such as Risk Control Self-Assessment (“RCSA”) and Incident Management & Data Collection (IMDC) and provide challenge to departments to ensure RCSA adequately identify risk and implement risk control and mitigation measures;• Develop and monitor monthly key risk indicators (KRI). Review KRIs at least on annual basis to ensure KRI adequately identify and manage operational risk and non-financial risk• Establish and provide oversight on the implementation of Operational Risk Officers throughout ELIC.• Develop, review and implement business continuity management (BCM) policies and procedures;• Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements, ELIC, Maybank and Etiqa’s policies and procedures• Ensure all internal audit finding are addressed and resolved timely• Implement operational risk awareness program to increase and strengthen risk culture• Develop and implement learning development for staff• Provide advisory to business unit and support unit in product development and other areas;• Operational Risk Advisory and Assurance (Relationship Management) – provide consultation and guidance to the Business and Support Units in the development and implementation of operational risk management program
Job Requirement: Qualification:Level of Education: Minimum degree / degree equivalent professional qualification.Years of Experience: At least 5 years of experience preferably with both operational risks and business operations related background & at least 3 years in managerial position.Discipline/Related Field: Risk managementCompetencies:• Responsible for the development of the people he / she leads and to maximize talent and performance.• Demonstrate a strong/high inter-personnel skills and emotional quotient.• Drive the understanding of risk management requirements within the Business and Support Units.• Develop and undertake initiatives that would incorporate solutions to manage risk• Develop and introduce infrastructure that supports customer- focus strategies.• Collaborate with management across ELIC, regulatory bodies and Group.• Strong analytical skills and sound knowledge of banking products and in-depth experience in his/her functional area.• To drive continuous communication with the regulators and Head Office.• To drive the understanding of operational risk management requirements within the ELIC.• To drive the implementation of operational risk initiatives within the ELIC.

Job Description:
•Participate in the planning and formulation of design alternatives and solutions for major construction projects; provides conceptual estimates, feasibility studies, and cost estimates, and may coordinate the production of basic design plan and construction documents.
•Develop and/or administer project budgets and fiscal controls, contracts, and quality control provisions; perform project cost estimating and value engineering, as appropriate.
•Oversee all aspects of the day-to-day management of construction projects; monitor and coordinate work performed by architectural, engineering, and construction firms, as well as institutional, state, and local entities.
•Review and interpret proposed designs, architectural drawing, and building specifications for accuracy and appropriateness to required function and/or institutional standard, and initiates revisions where appropriate; advise consultants and clients as to how best to achieve required results.
•Ensure that project operations are in compliance with design specifications and with university, state, and federal policies and regulations.
•Establish performance and delivery criteria, ensuring that client and institutional requirements are being met; prepare project specifications, and coordinates procurement, as appropriate.
•Authorize the issuance of contracts, purchase orders, and change orders, and approves contractor invoices for payment.
•Direct work sequencing to expedite project delivery and to minimize disruption of ongoing institutional operations.
•Inspects, approves, and accepts completed projects for the institution, ensuring conformance with institutional standards, building and life safety codes, and architectural/engineering specifications.
•Represent the institution in business with customers, consultants, contractors, and other public and/or private agencies and organizations.
Job Requirement:
-Minimum-10 year experience in engineering management.                                                        -Preferred-Experience in foreign owned company                                                                                
-Minimum-University degree in Engineering/Architecture/Project Manager                                                       Preferred-Master or higher degree in 
-Experience with AutoCAD and MS Office Suites.
-Good organization and planning, multi-tasking skills.
-Strong management and delegation abilities.
-Capable in managing all relevant work to meet deadlines.
Language
High level of written and oral English (or Chinese) communication skills

Job Description: About the Role- To develop data analytics solution for each department to improve decision making and monitor company KPIs- To help business user improve operational processes and increase productivity by streamlining and automating processes with digital tools and/or RPA.- To monitor project KPIs and success metrics including managing risks that can impact the project scope, budget, or timelines.

Job Description: Job summary: Manage the day-to-day operations of inventory management to ensure inventory is planned at optimal level to meet target turns, working capital performance and revenue growthGeneral responsibilities	- Assemble and analyze all data pertinent to creating the sales forecast (historical sales, market trends, seasonality, promotions, and inventory levels)- Coordinate with Sales, Marketing/Brand, Trade Marketing, and Nutrition teams to ensure a required stable level of stock holding of current products and new launched products- Review Sales Forecast vs. Sales Target- Generate Purchase Orders and ensure they are supported by sufficient and valid information- Maintain Master Arrival Schedule of the planning Centers (ALOG)- Assist Arrange Monthly Sales & Operations Planning & Sales Forecast- Review Supply vs. Demand analysis for timing of stock arrival and stock replenishment- Prepare, report, and communicate forecast and inventory measurements to management (forecast accuracy, inventory plan vs. targets)- Follow up the shipments with Freight forwarders and provide invoice and packing list to clearance department- Other relevant tasks assigned by superiorLeadership responsibilities	- Guide team to ensure effective delivery of team’s goals- Drive and manage learning and development of team in the area of Supply Chain Management and DKSH behaviors to achieve team/function goals- Drive self-learning and improvement in the area of Supply Chain Management and DKSH behaviors as part of continuous learning
Job Requirement: Functional skills and knowledge	- Knowledge of the SAP system is an advantage- Good in data analysis and forecasting- Demand Management skill - Demonstrate appreciation and respect for cultural sensitivities, especially in international/cross-cultural interactions- Demonstrate proficiencies in office productivity tools (e.g. Excel, Word, and PowerPoint)- Demonstrate fluency in English, both written and spokenEducation	- Bachelor or Diploma/certificate in Supply Chain Management, Business Administration, Supply Chain, Logistics, or other related fieldsWork experience	- 2 - 5 years of experience in demand planning or a similar role- Experience in a managerial role is more advantage
Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile:
OYIKA is a Singapore venture-funded company which started working on a battery share concept for e-motorbikes in 2018. In 2019, OYIKA arrived in Cambodia and launched a service in the capital of Phnom Penh. The company is headed by its President, Carl Wong, and it plans to expand throughout the Kingdom and in SEA.

OYIKA offers a battery share concept and allows an e-motorbike rider to swap their leased depleted battery for a fully charged one at a swap station. So instead of topping up petrol at a kiosk when the vehicle runs out of fuel, the rider is now topping up on stored power. Battery share, therefore, replaces petrol and thus it is also cheaper.
OYIKA claims its battery share solution solves the issues of driver anxiety, battery degradation and upfront capital costs which also act as barriers to the adoption of electric vehicles.


Website : www.oyika.com
          www.kh.oyika.com
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  093 23 21 49 / 077 676 035  sreynich@oyika.com Unit B8, Stress 45, Sangkat Sras Chork, Khan Daun Penh 093 23 21 49 / 077 676 035

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information RMA CAMBODIA  017888390 recruitment.kh@rmagroup.net Phnom Penh #27, St. 134, SangkatMittapheap, Khan 7 Makara, Phnom Penh 017888390

Job Description: This position is to provide support on: • Product and Pricing support for Corporate Solution products which includes Group Term Life and Group Medical Reimbursement.• Accurate product and pricing support for new product and existing product enhancements.• Support new product and existing product enhancements implementation and system testing. • Support other actuarial related tasks.
Job Requirement: Roles and Responsibilities:Corporate Solution Product and Pricing support (50%)- Generate quotation for Corporate Solution products within the turnaround time.- Assist sales team with special requests.Assist with experience monitoring for the Corporate Solution products.- Collaborate with various functional departments to assist with product and pricing related enquiries.Provide actuarial support for new product/ initiative launch (20%)- Develop and propose product pricing template based on market and sales proposition.- Develop product approval document, user requirements and other related documents before new product go live.- Review and provide feedbacks for training materials, product submission documents to MEF and marketing materials to ensure they are align with the product pricing model.- UAT testing on iPos to make sure the premium calculation, all related wording or sentences in the sales quotation are fully align with the product pricing model.- UAT testing on IL/COAST system to make sure they are all align with the product pricing model.Support product enhancement related projects (20%)- Support the system testing and UAT for day2 items.- Support day2 feature such as requests for change payment mode, change sum insured and premium after policy issue.Other actuarial related support (10%)- Monthly tracking of the new product after launch.Calculate persistency for each sale channel for monthly reporting and compensation schemes calculation.- Handling other related customer service queries.Mentoring actuarial analyst and intern for the BAU tasks and support required.

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

Job Description: #NAME?
Job Requirement: #NAME?
Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.
Contact Info: Contact Information EFG Cambodia   017 888 349 efgcareer@rmagroup.net City Tower Building, 07 Floors, No.321, Mao Tse Tong Blvd, Psa Depo 1 Quarter, Toul Kok District, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia., Phnom Penh, Cambodia 017 888 349

Job Description: Job PurposeWe are seeking for talented Analyst/Intern to join the Advisory team. The Candidate will be based in Phnom Penh, Cambodia and will be a versatile position focused on supporting a wide range of strategic activities, including strategic planning, M&A and working closely with the Investment Team to access and execute investment opportunities in the Sub-Mekong region in Southeast Asia.Duties and Responsibilities•	Transactional sourcing and screening of investment opportunities for senior team members•	Developing and documenting of transaction rationale, including preparation and presentation of all Information Memorandum and presentation materials.•	Developing financial models and executing transaction recommendations •	Performing comprehensive and in-depth company and industry research, and peer benchmarking•	Participating in marketing and fundraising activities, including roadshow, internal training and prospective investor meetings.
Job Requirement: Qualifications•	Bachelor’s degree or master’s / MBA from a top-tier university •	Desire to pursue a Career in Corporate Finance / M&A / Private Equity. 1 to 2 Years of Experience at a reputable Firm will be advantageous. •	Strong knowledge of financial accounting; excellent analytical / modeling skills •	Demonstrate strong commercial acumen, excellent technical skills, confident presentation ability, and an inquisitive mind. •	Overall familiarity with the private equity industry and knowledge of various strategies would be a significant enhancement. Real Estate experience will be advantageous. •	Self-motivated and proactive, both with respect to managing workload and own professional development. •	Fluent in English is a must, bilingual in English and Chinese languages is added advantage.

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114 jobs@wingbank.com.kh Phnom Penh No. 721, Preah Monivong Blvd., Sangkat Beung Keng Kang 3, Khan Chamkar Mon, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 988 290 / 078 989 509 / 078 989 114

company_name: Belt Road Capital Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
Job Description: Job PurposeThis role is responsible to establish the creative vision for the production of any marketing assets (specifically video) to deliver a visually impactful storytelling. The candidate has to analyses the script to suit the development of the visual styles of the content.Additionally, the candidate guides the creative teams in delivering quality art and animation assets, as well as the creative process when planning promotional activities for developed content. The candidate must be adept in 2D and 3D art as well as stop motion, animation, and motion graphics to be able to guide the creative teams. The candidate will be responsible for working closely with the current team leadThis role requires a creative and bilingual thinking capabilities for representation of concepts based on the language used to express the visual art.This role is based in Cambodia, and on-site presence is compulsory. Written and verbal literacy in English and Mandarin is compulsory for ideation of English-first visual concepts and Mandarin-first visual concepts.Duties and Responsibilities•	Define the creative vision of the production in collaboration with the project owners.•	Develop the creative production schedule with inputs from respective project owners in line with the overall production schedule.•	Drive artistic direction, visual style and quality of production standards.•	Drive the communication of project schedule and timelines to the respective project owners and external agencies.•	Guide creative project teams or external agencies with inputs on the artistic direction and methods to achieve the creative vision.•	Oversee changes to creative scope and assets based on technical production requirements and constraints. - Provide iterative inputs for refinement by reviewing creative assets with the creative leadership.•	Sign-off creative assets after team lead and technical approval.
Job Requirement: •	Good command of written and spoken English and Mandarin (COMPULSORY, no either-or)•	A diploma / degree in art or other design disciplines, plus a working knowledge of copywriting.•	At least 2 years of being a CD / ACD where you have led and executed large integrated campaigns for real estate projects or corporate entity.•	Proficient in AutoCAD, 3D MAX, V-RAY / Lumion, and Adobe Creative Suite (Premiere Pro, Illustrator & Photoshop)•	A portfolio that showcases your excellent visual design and conceptualization skills (including links for videos conceptualized).•	An excellent storyteller, able to verbalize ideas to the respective stakeholders and articulate concepts into visualization.•	Able to work independently and collaboratively in a matrixed organization.•	Excellent project management and delivery skills, and ability to coordinate multiple projects and initiatives at one time.

Admin Operation Officer will be undertake the duties that controlling the school operation and assist HR and Admin Manager on tasks as the described below:

HR

Job Description:
People Leadership:
• Effective performance management of all direct reports, focusing on behavioral change that will both inspire and motivate individuals to deliver results.
• Responsible for the quality of maintenance work carried out by all indirect employees
• Develop a behavioral safety culture and promote a safe working environment by ensuring full compliance with Carlsberg SH&E and LOTO policy process.
• Recruit, lead, motivate and develop a flexible and agile multi-disciplined maintenance team.
• Carry out leadership led process confirmations, maximizing the opportunity to coach and engage teams during the process.
• Actively support other members of the Senior Management Team
Budgeting & Improvements:
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual maintenance budgets
• Prepare, gain approval for and manage annual utilities budgets
• Review maintenance practices, successes & failures with the objective of constantly moving the improvement of cost and performance.
• Analyze and review utilities consumption with the aim of constantly improving supply and operational consumption
• Actively participate in the site/country long term development plan (LDP) formation
• Identify and prepare capital projects for approval and in line with the LDP, which improve operational efficiencies and product profitability.
• Support and where required take the role in managing material and non-material waste and loss reduction, with cross-functional teams.
• Encourage and actively support standardized problem-solving methodologies, including Gemba Kaizen, RCA & EWO activities, to resolve day-to-day and chronic problems.
Performance:
• Prioritize maintenance and utility focus areas
• Ensure clear focus and communication of initiatives that relate to overall business and site targets, through effective policy deployment
• Ensure sufficient resource is allocated to key initiatives (internal or external)
• Drive correct target percentage compliance of autonomous/preventative maintenance through maintenance and operational teams.
• Utilize machine reliability measures of MTBF / MTTR for effective maintenance approaches with defined machine criticality view.
• Sets and communicate clear targets for team
• Ensure utilities consumption targets are part of each operational team targets and that operational teams have a concrete plan to improve
• Review performance through a structured MCRS and PMS system
• Be discipline in terms of meeting attendance and management of these meetings
• Ensure meeting TORs are agreed and adhered to and the plans and action logs are always reviewed according to schedule
Job Requirement:
Professional qualification and competencies:

1. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities KPI and the functional levers relating to people, cost, quality, and service
2. Significant experience and understanding of managing maintenance and utilities within a brewing and packaging environment.
3. In depth knowledge of regulatory requirements relating to Utilities.
4. Committed to Lean TPM and acts as role model in order to achieve organizational objectives through sustainable continuous improvements.
5. High level of Carlsberg leadership competencies:
• Driving for Results
• Customer/Consumer Focus
• Passion and integrity
• Analytical thinking
• Cross-team interacting and

Minimum Qualification Requirement:
1. Qualified to degree level or equivalent in Engineering, Maintenance and/or Utilities or have significant experience and a proven long-term record of managing maintenance and utilities with an FMCG company
2. Knowledge and experience of applying Lean TPM philosophies, tools, and techniques.
3. Knowledge of key

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

Job Description: Job PurposeThe Brand Ambassador at Business Center in SHV-Cambodia will play a crucial role in receiving guests, presenting the collaborative opportunities to potential investors and potential partners from various international markets, and facilitating events in order to enhance our business development.This position requires fluency in English along with proficiency in the respective mother tongue of the target market, such as Mandarin, Cantonese, Vietnamese, Tagalog, Malay, Korean, Japanese, Thai, Indonesian, or Cambodian. The Brand Ambassador will be responsible for presenting our projects and showcasing the unique value propositions to effectively engage and attract potential investors.Duties and Responsibilities• Conduct presentations and demonstrations: Present our real estate investment projects to potential investors in a compelling and informative manner. Clearly communicate the project's features, benefits, and investment potential.• Build and maintain relationships: Cultivate strong relationships with potential investors by providing personalized attention and addressing their inquiries and concerns. Act as a trusted advisor and maintain regular communication to build rapport and enhance the investor's experience.• Sales strategy development: Collaborate with the sales and marketing team to develop effective sales strategies and tactics tailored to the specific target market. Continuously monitor market trends and competitor activities to identify new opportunities and stay ahead in the industry.• Brand advocacy: Act as a brand ambassador for our real estate investment firm, representing our core values and mission to potential investors. Maintain a deep understanding of our projects, investment philosophy, and market position to effectively advocate for our brand.• Market research: Conduct market research to identify potential investors, understand their investment preferences, and analyze market trends. Use this knowledge to customize presentations and address investor concerns effectively.• Attend industry events: Participate in industry conferences, exhibitions, and networking events to expand professional networks, generate leads, and enhance brand visibility
Job Requirement: • Minimum bachelor’s degree in any discipline• Minimum 2-3 years of related working experience in real estate development• Must have exceptional written and verbal English communication skills,• Requires an enthusiastic passion for real estate asset sales and goal-oriented personality• Sales experience and presentation skill required• Proficiency in both English and Chinese a must and Vietnamese, Tagalog, Malay, Korean, Japanese, Thai, Indonesian, or Cambodian

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.

- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse

- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training

Company Profile:
RMA entered the Cambodian market in 1992 as an exclusive provider of dedicated system solutions for commercial and non-commercial enterprises in the sectors of infrastructure, energy and logistics. Gradually, the company has been growing alongside the development of Cambodia and expanded to automotive, agricultural and heavy equipment, warehouse solutions, financial services, car rental and food franchise management.  In addition to business expansion, RMA Cambodia has also focused its attention on human resources by providing internships and employment opportunities to approximately 2,000 local and professional staff with a number of expatriates working together to share their skills and expertise.

RMA Cambodia has also been very active within local communities. We consistently work with local authorities and organizations to provide financial and technical assistance in essential key sectors, such as health, environment, education and sports.

We aim to help Cambodia grow and prosper.

OUR SERVICES AND PRODUCTS:

RMA Cambodia and its affiliate Asia Vehicle Rental (AVR) are offering franchised car rental services through the global brand AVIS. Rentals are customized with brand-new Ford vehicles and experienced English-speaking chauffeurs. AVIS also offers car rental and leasing that meets all types of customers requirements for business trips, leisure or field work, with or without chauffeurs.

RMA Cambodia has a financing arm, RMA Financial Services, offers financing solutions to flexibly meet the needs of corporate and retail customers for the purchase of their own automotive and heavy equipment, agricultural machinery and warehouse solution equipment.

RMA Cambodia is also a provider of heavy equipment products and solutions in construction, road building and maintenance, and agriculture, namely JCB, Mitsubishi FUSO and John Deere. RMA Cambodia is an agent for the world’s leading brands in these industries.

job title: Product Promotion Officer  ( 01 in Kratie Province, 01 in Battambong)
position: Product Promotion Officer  ( 01 in Kratie Province, 01 in Battambong)
Job Description:
* THE ROLE 
In this job you work in several provinces. In the assigned area you monitor and coordinate distribution of seeds, set-up promotional vegetable fields and work together with spot promoters or people of the extension team. 

•	Implementing Demo, building a core farmer system for a field activity (Farmers meeting, Field Day, other events, Technical consultation.
•	Approaching farmers, nurseries deploying Demos, for products and promote the brand. (Traders, markets, consumers, processing facilities, media).
•	Meet with traders, consumers, collect information to create output for products.
•	Update market information (Cultivation slop, Capacity growing area, Crop competitors and Vegetable price).
•	Implement pre-commercial trial (PDS-2) and conduct technical experiments for some special varieties.
•	Planning and update on time for demo activities
•	Connecting local authorities, agricultural management agencies
•	Communication activities: hanging banners, posters, taking pictures, filming videos, social networks.
•	Work closely with sale team to conduct right crops demos
•	Support sales to check inventory at some agents.
•	Solve field problems, complaints from farmers, traders.
•	Ontime report with quality
•	New product introduction (Launching Event)
•	Customers visit (Farmers, Trader)
•	Fresh market visit
•	Market information update
•	Join PDS-/2 evaluation.
Job Requirement:
•	Fresh Graduate bachelor’s degree in Agronomy or any related field
•	1 year working experience in agriculture. 
•	Ambitious, active and eager to learn new things.
•	Passionately, Honest, Punctual and able to work under pressure 
•	Ability to communicate with all levels particularly clients 
•	Strong interpersonal skills are essential with a high degree of sensitivity for confidentiality; Good communication Skill
•	Able to coordinate with input dealer, collector and relevant partner 
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills in Cambodia language, English proficiency a plus
•	Computer literacy a plus
•	Motorbike driver’s license

* How to apply:

- Email : thavrath.rin@eastwestseed.com
- Tel.	: 092 61 60 11
- Address: No. 43, street 6, Borey Piphob Thmey, Kilometer 6, Khan Rouseey Keo, Phnom Penh
Company Profile:
The Company
The East-West Seed Group is an Asian based Privately owned Global leader in the tropical vegetable seeds business.  Using advanced breeding technologies, East-West Seed creates value for farmers by producing Better Seeds for Better Yield.  The company’s strategy is based on breeding locally adapted varieties that allow farmers to be more productive, increase their income and profits - thereby contributing to agricultural sustainability.  East-West seeds are planted in the fields of over 30 million farmers worldwide, with 200 billion seeds sold yearly. The company is Asia-based, but with global operations primarily in the tropical zone.  It employs 4,700 employees globally and maintain 15 R&D stations in 7 countries.  It  lives and work in the markets that it  serve.  To learn more about EWS please visit www.eastwestseed.com
Contact Info: Contact Information HR  092 61 60 11 (Telegram) thavrath.rin@eastwestseed.com No. 43, street 6, Borey Piphob Thmey, Kilometer 6,   Khan Rouseey Keo, Phnom Penh 092 61 60 11 (Telegram)

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. Job Description:
Position: Human resource Internship 
Located: Russey Keo Office
Department: HR: People Relation and Culture 

Responsibility:

- Employee engagement: learn how to develop and implement strategies to engage employees and promote a positive workplace culture. 
- Change management: The intern can learn how to communicate changes within the organization, such as changes in policies, procedures.
- Internal communication channels: learn about the various channels used for internal communication.
- Collaboration and teamwork: learn how to work collaboratively with other members of the internal communication team, as well as with other departments within the company.
Job Requirement:
Ideally Candidate for this role: 

- Fresh Graduated or under graduated student in HR, Public Relation, legal or related field. 
- Get more knowledge of how to create new design idea. 
- Curios to learn new thing and agile learning
- Be able to communicate in English and Chinese isa plus

Deadline: 30th July 2023
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.
Contact Info: Contact Information TALENT ACQUISITION TEAM  010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444 hrd@coca-cola.com.kh No.287, National Road 5, Mittapheap Village, Russey Keo District, Phnom Penh,  Kingdom of Cambodia. 010 325 777 / 096 48 99 677 / 096 355 6214 / 012 916 444

Company Profile:
At DKSH, our purpose is to enrich people’s lives by providing access to goods, services and insights. United by our vision to be the trusted partner, we help companies grow in Asia and beyond across our Business Units Healthcare, Consumer Goods, Performance Materials and Technology.

Delivering life-saving drugs to hospitals, bringing high-quality products to remote villages, installing technology that raises living standards and providing new formulations for healthcare products that make life easier. These are just a few examples of how DKSH touches people’s lives around the clock. We do this while helping our clients and customers grow by providing services including sourcing, market insights, marketing and sales, eCommerce, distribution and logistics as well as after-sales services.

Listed on the SIX Swiss Exchange, DKSH operates in 36 markets with 32,450 specialists, generating net sales of CHF 10.7 billion in 2020. Founded by Swiss entrepreneurs in 1865, we have been deeply root

Company Profile: C-Herald Property Service is a global leading property management company which was established as a joint venture company in 2017. Since its establishment, C-herald has introduced Phnom Penh City with the new concept of Japanese Property management and a rigorous service spirit. It combines the rich management experiences and management model of the international market with the local national culture and develop a management service model that meets local needs. The successful model of the country has crossed the international map of the ASEAN. To promote the spirit of service with a high degree of trust in Japan. Base in Japan’s advanced business philosophy, management model and high-quality services, it still maintains its leading position in the industry. Take care of every customer and every owner with professional spirit, innovative thinking, and excellent services. Our vision is to become the recognized, respected and successful property management organization in Cambodia.

Job Description:
- Secures financial information by completing database backups. 
- Protects organization's value by keeping information confidential. 
- Check on all payments (Cash and Check payments prepared by AP) 
- Follow up Aged Payable 
- Check daily payment report 
- Check payment request to top management 
-  Issue invoices to tenants 
- Collect payment from tenants 
- Follow up Aged Receivable and contact tenant for outstanding balance 
- Post receipt from tenant which include monthly rental and deposit 
- Post bank slip and money transfer to bank 
- Control on process of stock in and out handled by stock controller 
- Contact to suppliers to make purchase order 
- Close all cash receipt reports monthly 
- Close cash in bank and cash on hand report monthly 
- Close cash in Bank (Visa Card) 
- Have knowledge of QuickBooks, Peachtree, Microsoft Office, Internet, E-mail 
- Other tasks assigned by manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelors or higher degree in Accounting or Finance 
- Strong understanding of accounting theory 
- 2 +years accounting/finance experience
- Highly detailed oriented and organized in work 
- Ability to meet assigned deadlines 
- Excellent communication and interpersonal skills with a customer service focus Ability to act and operate independently with minimal daily direction from manager to accomplish objectives 
- Proficiency with email and Microsoft Office applications 
- Ability to work cooperatively and collaboratively with all levels of employees, management, and 	external agencies to maximize performance, creativity, problem solving, and results.

job title: មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់អភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ និង សរសេរកម្មវិធី (Senior Web Developer/Programmer)
position: មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់អភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ និង សរសេរកម្មវិធី (Senior Web Developer/Programmer)
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ     (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់អភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ និង សរសេរកម្មវិធី ចំនួន០២រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖

 គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
• មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច៣ឆ្នាំ នៅលើផ្នែកអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ និង សរសេរកម្មវិធី 
• មានចំណេះដឹងទូលំទូលាយលើផ្នែកភាសា PHP, .Net (C#, Visual Basic), Java, SQL, Python
• មានចំណេះដឹង និង អាចអភិវឌ្ឍដោយប្រើប្រាស់  SQL Server, MySQL និង Oracle 
• មានចំណេះដឹង និង បទពិសោធន៍ទៅលើការអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធនៃប្រព័ន្ធ ERP មានអាទិភាពខ្ពស់
• មានការច្នៃប្រឌិត និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានរហ័ស
• ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
• មានបទពិសោធន៏ចាប់ពី៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
• ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង បម្រើការបានយូរអង្វែង
• ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និង តស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និង ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
• បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ ។
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 

	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃអង្គារ ១កើត ខែទុតិយាសាឍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។

 ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម

Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។

job title: Brand & Public Relations Manager / Assistant Manager
company_name: Belt Road Capital Management (Cambodia) Co., Ltd
position: Brand & Public Relations Manager / Assistant Manager
Job Description: Job PurposeThe Brand & Public Relations Manager / Assistant Manager is expected to support the Head of Department in managing and directing all aspects of the company's communications strategy. You will also be responsible for crafting and implementing our branding campaigns, as well as managing public relations. Your strong writing skills and event management skills will play a key role in shaping our brand identity and enhancing our public image.Duties and Responsibilities•	Assist in developing and executing innovative public relations strategies			•	Coordinate with various departments to align branding strategy				•	Work closely with the Brand & PR HOD and other team members to identify potential PR opportunities					•	Create and deliver press releases, media relations content, executive bios, corporate newsletter content, and social media content					•	Conduct market research to stay updated on the latest trends and make appropriate recommendation•	Analyze and report on the performance and efficiency of campaigns and events•	Manage the development, distribution, and maintenance of all print and electronic collaterals•	Collaborate with team members to coordinate brand awareness and PR efforts	•	Coordinate with vendors and key personnel in event planning			•	Highlight to Brand & PR HOD and respond to crisis or communication-related issues in a timely manner
Job Requirement: •	5 years in international corporate plus PR agency•	Experience in real estate and FMCG•	Presentation Skill	•	Data Analysis	•	Project Management	•	Business Proposal	•	Press Release Writing	•	Branding Exercise	•	Presentation Development	•	Stakeholder Management	•	Public Speaking	•	Event Management	•	Language: English and Chinese are a must
Company Profile: Belt Road Capital Management (BRCM) is a private equity investment manager focused on the Greater Mekong Sub-Region. We partner with Real Estate investors and promising small- and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs) to support the achievement of strategic goals, facilitate sustainable growth and expand access to markets.
Contact Info: Contact Information Ms. Keoleakhena Puch  070 664 336 recruitment@beltroadcap.com Phnom Penh #282, Corner Preah Monivong Blvd (93) and Oknha men St (200), Sangkat Boeng Raing, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 070 664 336

job title: មន្ត្រីគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Junior Application System Administrator)
position: មន្ត្រីគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Junior Application System Administrator)
Job Description:
ធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ ចំនួន០២រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖

	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច៣ឆ្នាំ នៅលើផ្នែកអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធ និង សរសេរកម្មវិធី 
•	មានចំណេះដឹងទូលំទូលាយលើផ្នែកភាសា PHP, .Net (C#, Visual Basic), Java, SQL, Python
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និង អាចអភិវឌ្ឍដោយប្រើប្រាស់  SQL Server, MySQL និង Oracle 
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និង បទពិសោធន៍ទៅលើការអភិវឌ្ឍប្រព័ន្ធនៃប្រព័ន្ធ ERP មានអាទិភាពខ្ពស់
•	មានការច្នៃប្រឌិត និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានរហ័ស
•	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៏ចាប់ពី៣ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ
•	ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង បម្រើការបានយូរអង្វែង
•	ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និង តស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និង ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
•	បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ ។
Job Requirement:
 ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 

	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃអង្គារ ១កើត ខែទុតិយាសាឍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។
 ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : 087 247 476/ អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

job title: មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Senior Application System Administrator)
position: មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ (Senior Application System Administrator)
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ     (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីជាន់ខ្ពស់គ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖

	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងខាងវិទ្យាសាស្ត្រកុំព្យូទ័រ ឬ ជំនាញដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
•	មានបទពិសោធន៍យ៉ាងតិច៣ឆ្នាំ នៅក្នុងផ្នែកគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេ 
•	មានចំណេះដឹងប្រើប្រាស់បានទាក់ទងនឹងប្រព័ន្ធប្រតិបត្តិការ Linux និង Unix
•	មានចំណេះដឹងមូលដ្ឋានផ្នែកប្រព័ន្ធមូលដ្ឋានទិន្នន័យ ដូចជា Oracle Database, SQL Server, MySQL
•	មានចំណេះដឹង និង បទពិសោធន៍ទៅលើការគ្រប់គ្រងប្រព័ន្ធកម្មវិធីមេនៃប្រព័ន្ធ ERP មានអាទិភាពខ្ពស់
•	មានការច្នៃប្រឌិត និង ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាបានរហ័ស
•	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
•	ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង មានសីលធម៌ក្នុងការរស់នៅល្អ
•	ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និង តស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និង ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
•	បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ ។

	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ញាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
•	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 
	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃអង្គារ ១កើត ខែទុតិយាសាឍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។
 ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE ។
ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម សូមទាក់ទងមកលេខទូរស័ព្ទ ឬតាមអស័យដ្ឋានដូចខាងក្រោម៖
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ
បន្ទប់អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានកំណែទម្រង់ អគារ “គ” ជាន់ទី៧
ទូរស័ព្ទទាក់ទង : 077 359 949/ អ៊ីមែល: hr@pfm.gov.kh
Company Profile: ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែងដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដារអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយបច្ចុប្បន្នកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈដំណាក់កាលទី៣។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ គឺជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ មានមុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារ គោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ សាធារណៈ។ ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព ស័ក្ដិសិទ្ធិភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានត្រូវការចាំបាច់នូវមន្ត្រីបម្រើការងារមួយចំនួនដែលមានសមត្ថភាព មានជំនាញ និងមានបទពិសោធន៍សមស្របតាមការងារនីមួយៗ។
Contact Info: Contact Information Office  077 359 949 hr@pfm.gov.kh Street 92, Sangkat Wat Phnom, Khan Daun Penh, Phnom Penh 077 359 949

job title: មន្ត្រីអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីទូរស័ព្ទ (Android Developer /Programmer)
position: មន្ត្រីអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីទូរស័ព្ទ (Android Developer /Programmer)
Job Description:
ចាប់តាំងពីចុងឆ្នាំ២០០៤ មក រាជរដ្ឋាភិបាលកម្ពុជាដោយមានក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុជាសេនាធិការ បានចាប់អនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈជាជំហានៗ មានរយៈពេលវែង ដែលមានគោលបំណងកែលម្អប្រព័ន្ធគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈរបស់កម្ពុជាឆ្ពោះទៅរកស្តង់ដាអន្តរជាតិ។ ការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីនេះបានទទួលជោគជ័យជាបន្តបន្ទាប់ ហើយកំពុងបន្តអនុវត្ត ជំហានបន្ទាប់ទៀត។ អគ្គលេខាធិការដ្ឋានគណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ (អ.គ.ហ.) ជាសេនាធិការរបស់គណៈកម្មាធិការដឹកនាំការងារកែទម្រង់ការ   គ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈនៃក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុមាន មុខងារ និងភារកិច្ចសម្របសម្រួលការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តការងារគោលនយោបាយសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ ព្រមទាំងសម្របសម្រួល ការរៀបចំ និងការអនុវត្តកម្មវិធីកែទម្រង់ ការគ្រប់គ្រងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុសាធារណៈ។ 
ដោយមានចក្ខុវិស័យច្បាស់លាស់ និងក្នុងនាមជាសេនាធិការប្រកបដោយគុណភាព សក្ដិសិទ្ធភាព និងប្រសិទ្ធភាព អ.គ.ហ. មានត្រូវការជ្រើសរើស មន្ត្រីអភិវឌ្ឍកម្មវិធីទូរសព្ទ ចំនួន០១រូប ដែលមានគុណវុឌ្ឍិការងារដូចខាងក្រោម៖

	គុណវុឌ្ឍិទូទៅ
•	មានជំនាញក្នុងការសរសេរកូដភាសា Java ឬ Kotlin
•	មានចំណេះដឹងច្បាស់លាស់ផ្នែក Object-Oriented Programming
•	មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងប្រើប្រាស់ Android SDK ផ្សេងៗ
•	មានចំណេះដឹងក្នុងការប្រើប្រាស់ Framework: Flutter ឬ  React-Native
•	មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែក Database System និង ការប្រើប្រាស់ API
•	ធ្លាប់មានបទពិសោធន៍ផលិតកម្មវិធីទូរសព្ទសម្រាប់ ប្រព័ន្ធ Android (សូមភ្ជាប់ជាឯកសារយោង)
•	ត្រូវមានចំណេះដឹងភាសាអង់គ្លេសសមរម្យ
•	ត្រូវមានឆន្ទៈ និង មនសិការក្នុងការបំពេញការងារជូនស្ថាប័នរដ្ឋ និង មានសីលធម៌ក្នុងការរស់នៅល្អ
•	ត្រូវមានការព្យាយាម និង តស៊ូបំពេញការងារក្រោមលក្ខខណ្ឌពិបាក និង មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និង ម៉ឺងម៉ាត់
•	បេក្ខជន ត្រូវមានអាយុមិនលើសពី ៣០ ឆ្នាំ ។
	ឯកសាភ្ជាប់
បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍ សូមមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំចូលបម្រើការងារដោយភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ៖
•	ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV)  និង Cover Letter (ជាភាសាអង់គ្លេស) 
•	សញ្ញាបត្របញ្ជាក់ការសិក្សាថតចម្លង លិខិតបញ្ជាក់បទពិសោធន៍ការងារ និងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធនានា 
•	ភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយឈ្មោះអ្នកសំអាង (referees)ចំនួនពីររូប
Job Requirement:
	ការជ្រើសរើស 
ការជ្រើសរើសត្រូវធ្វើឡើងតាមរយៈការធ្វើតេស្តសមត្ថភាពលើការសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់ពីគណកម្មាធិការជ្រើសរើស។ ការជ្រើសរើសនេះត្រូវបានបើកចំហដល់បេក្ខជន ឬបេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់មកពីគ្រប់ក្រសួងស្ថាប័ន និងសាធារណៈជន។ 

	ការដាក់ពាក្យស្នើសុំជ្រើសរើស 
បេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលមានចំណាប់អារម្មណ៍សូមធ្វើបច្ចុប្បន្នភាពប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) ដោយបញ្ជាក់ពីជំនាញ បច្ចេកទេស និងបទពិសោធន៍ ដូចដែលមានចែងខាងលើ ព្រមទាំងឯកសារពាក់ព័ន្ធតាមរយៈសារអេឡិចត្រូនិច Email: hr@pfm.gov.kh យ៉ាងយូរបំផុតត្រឹមថ្ងៃអង្គារ ១កើត ខែទុតិយាសាឍ ឆ្នាំថោះ បញ្ចស័ក ព.ស ២៥៦៧ ត្រូវនឹងថ្ងៃទី១៨ ខែកក្កដា ឆ្នាំ២០២៣ វេលាម៉ោង៥ និង ៣០នាទី ល្ងាច។ អ.គ.ហ. ទទួលពាក្យស្នើសុំចុះឈ្មោះចូលបម្រើការងារតាមរយៈប្រព័ន្ធអនឡាញ (Online) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ។
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន/បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។
	ព័ត៌មានបន្ថែម
ចំណាំ៖ មានតែបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារីដែលបានជាប់ជម្រុះបឋម (Shortlisted) តែប៉ុណ្ណោះ ដែលនឹងត្រូវអញ្ជើញមកធ្វើតេស្តវិញ្ញាសារសរសេរ និងសម្ភាសន៍ផ្ទាល់មាត់។
សូមទាញយកលក្ខខណ្ឌយោងតាមគេហទំព័រ CLICK HERE
ក្រសួងសេដ្ឋកិច្ចនិងហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ	
ផ្លូវលេខ ៩២ សង្កាត់វត្តភ្នំ ខណ្ឌដូនពេញ រាជធានីភ្នំពេញ
